title: ARK Invest‚Äôs Massive Bet: Acquires 4.4 Million Shares in Ethereum Treasury Firm BitMine Immersion
body: BitcoinWorld ARK Invest‚Äôs Massive Bet: Acquires 4.4 Million Shares in Ethereum Treasury Firm BitMine Immersion The world of cryptocurrency is constantly buzzing with significant developments, and few entities command attention quite like ARK Invest , the innovative asset management firm led by the visionary Cathie Wood. Recently, the crypto community has been abuzz with news of a major strategic maneuver by ARK Invest that signals a deepening interest in the Ethereum ecosystem. This move highlights the firm‚Äôs ongoing commitment to disruptive innovation and its calculated approach to digital asset exposure. ARK Invest‚Äôs Strategic Plunge into Ethereum In a move that has sent ripples across the digital asset landscape, ARK Invest has reportedly acquired over 4.4 million shares of BitMine Immersion, a company uniquely positioned as an Ethereum treasury firm. This substantial purchase, as reported by Crypto Briefing citing recent trade disclosures from ARK Invest , highlights a growing institutional appetite for direct exposure to the Ethereum network, albeit through a company holding significant ETH assets rather than direct token purchases. This strategic investment by ARK Invest underscores a nuanced approach to navigating the crypto market, seeking exposure to underlying assets through established corporate structures. The acquisition of millions of shares in BitMine Immersion by ARK Invest is more than just a transaction; it‚Äôs a statement. It reflects a belief in the long-term viability and growth potential of Ethereum, a blockchain network that continues to evolve and expand its utility across various sectors, from decentralized finance (DeFi) to non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and beyond. For an asset management firm like ARK Invest , known for its forward-thinking investment philosophy, this action aligns perfectly with its mandate to identify and invest in companies at the forefront of technological change. What is BitMine Immersion and Why Does it Matter to ARK Invest? BitMine Immersion isn‚Äôt just any company; it‚Äôs a significant player in the Ethereum space, currently boasting an impressive treasury holding more than $1 billion worth of ETH. This makes BitMine Immersion a unique proxy for gaining exposure to Ethereum‚Äôs value proposition without directly holding the volatile cryptocurrency itself. For a firm like ARK Invest , known for its focus on disruptive innovation, investing in a company with such substantial Ethereum holdings aligns perfectly with its long-term growth strategies. It offers a pathway to participate in Ethereum‚Äôs growth while potentially mitigating some of the direct regulatory and custodial complexities associated with holding cryptocurrencies directly. Investment Approach Key Characteristics Potential Implications for ARK Invest Direct ETH Purchase Direct ownership of the cryptocurrency; high volatility; specific regulatory and custodial requirements. Greater direct exposure to price swings; potentially higher compliance hurdles for traditional asset managers like ARK Invest . BitMine Immersion Shares Equity investment in a company holding significant ETH; indirect exposure; potentially more familiar regulatory framework for ARK Invest . Access to Ethereum‚Äôs growth potential through a publicly traded entity; aligns with traditional investment mandates, offering a regulated pathway for ARK Invest . This approach allows ARK Invest to gain exposure to the underlying value of Ethereum through a corporate entity, which might be perceived as a more traditional and less volatile investment vehicle compared to direct cryptocurrency holdings. It also signals a potential shift in how large institutional investors are choosing to interact with the crypto market, favoring structured investments over direct token acquisition for certain strategies. The Coinbase Conundrum: What Does ARK Invest‚Äôs Sale Mean? Interestingly, this significant acquisition by ARK Invest wasn‚Äôt an isolated event. Alongside the BitMine Immersion purchase, ARK Invest also divested a substantial $90.58 million in Coinbase shares. This simultaneous action raises questions and invites speculation within the crypto community regarding ARK Invest‚Äôs overarching strategy. Is it merely portfolio rebalancing, or does it signal a deeper strategic pivot within its crypto-focused funds? There are several theories circulating regarding this strategic divestment by ARK Invest : Portfolio Rebalancing: ARK Invest frequently rebalances its portfolios to maintain desired allocations and manage risk. This could simply be a strategic shift to optimize its exposure across different segments of the crypto economy. Profit Taking: Coinbase shares have experienced significant volatility, especially during market upswings. It‚Äôs possible ARK Invest decided to lock in profits from previous gains, reallocating capital to new opportunities. Shifting Focus: The move might indicate a subtle pivot in ARK Invest‚Äôs crypto strategy, moving from broad exchange exposure to more direct or thematic plays within specific blockchain ecosystems, such as Ethereum via BitMine Immersion. This suggests a more granular approach to crypto investment. Regulatory Landscape: With ongoing regulatory scrutiny on crypto exchanges and the broader digital asset space, ARK Invest might be de-risking its portfolio by reducing exposure to companies directly impacted by potential regulatory headwinds. The decision by ARK Invest to reduce its stake in a prominent crypto exchange while increasing exposure to an Ethereum treasury firm suggests a more refined and targeted investment strategy. It implies a focus on the underlying blockchain technology and its direct asset holdings, rather than solely on the trading infrastructure that facilitates market activity. Implications for the Ethereum Ecosystem and Crypto Market This bold move by ARK Invest carries significant implications, not just for BitMine Immersion, but for the broader Ethereum ecosystem and the cryptocurrency market as a whole. It provides a strong signal of institutional confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs future, potentially encouraging other traditional financial players to explore similar avenues for crypto exposure. Benefits of ARK Invest‚Äôs Move: Increased Institutional Validation: The investment by a respected firm like ARK Invest adds significant credibility to Ethereum as a legitimate asset class for institutional portfolios. New Pathways for Investors: It offers a more traditional, equity-based pathway for investors who may be hesitant to directly purchase cryptocurrencies, but wish to participate in the growth of the Ethereum network. Signals Confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs Utility: By investing in a firm holding substantial ETH, ARK Invest is implicitly endorsing Ethereum‚Äôs long-term value proposition and its role in the future of decentralized applications and finance. Potential for Follow-on Investments: This action by ARK Invest could pave the way for other asset managers and institutional investors to consider similar strategies, further integrating crypto into mainstream finance. Challenges and Considerations: Dependence on BitMine Immersion‚Äôs Management: The success of this investment for ARK Invest is tied to BitMine Immersion‚Äôs operational success and its ability to effectively manage its ETH treasury. Indirect Exposure: While offering a regulated path, indirect exposure means less direct control over the underlying ETH assets and their immediate price movements. Market Volatility Remains: Even through an equity investment, the underlying asset (Ethereum) is subject to significant market volatility, which can still impact the share price of BitMine Immersion. Long-Term Performance: The long-term performance of such innovative investment strategies will be closely watched by the market, setting a precedent for future institutional involvement. Actionable Insights for Investors: Monitor Institutional Flows: Keep an eye on how major asset managers like ARK Invest are allocating capital within the crypto space. Their moves can often signal broader market trends. Understand Investment Vehicles: Differentiate between direct cryptocurrency investments and equity in crypto-related companies. Each carries different risk profiles and regulatory considerations. Focus on Fundamentals: Ethereum‚Äôs fundamental developments, such such as scalability upgrades, adoption rates, and network utility, become even more crucial when evaluating companies like BitMine Immersion that are tied to its ecosystem. The recent actions by ARK Invest ‚Äîthe substantial purchase of BitMine Immersion shares coupled with the sale of Coinbase holdings‚Äîunderscore a dynamic and evolving institutional investment landscape within the cryptocurrency sector. It signals a strategic confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs enduring value and utility, moving beyond mere speculation to more calculated, thematic plays. As ARK Invest continues to navigate the complexities of digital assets, its decisions offer valuable insights into the maturation of crypto as an asset class and its increasing integration into mainstream finance. This strategic pivot by ARK Invest is a testament to the growing legitimacy and investment potential seen in the foundational layers of the decentralized web, particularly the robust Ethereum network. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is BitMine Immersion? BitMine Immersion is a company that operates as an Ethereum treasury firm, meaning it holds a significant amount of Ethereum (ETH) as part of its corporate assets. This allows investors to gain indirect exposure to Ethereum‚Äôs value by investing in the company‚Äôs shares. Why did ARK Invest invest in BitMine Immersion instead of directly buying ETH? ARK Invest likely chose to invest in BitMine Immersion shares for several reasons, including gaining indirect exposure to Ethereum through a publicly traded company, which might offer a more familiar regulatory framework for traditional asset managers. It could also be a strategic way to diversify its crypto-related holdings and manage risk. What does ARK Invest‚Äôs sale of Coinbase shares signify? The sale of Coinbase shares by ARK Invest could signify several things: portfolio rebalancing, profit-taking, a strategic shift towards more direct blockchain-centric investments like Ethereum via BitMine Immersion, or a response to the evolving regulatory landscape surrounding crypto exchanges. How does this investment impact the Ethereum ecosystem? This investment by ARK Invest provides significant institutional validation for Ethereum, potentially encouraging more traditional investors to consider exposure to the ecosystem. It highlights confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs long-term value and utility, which could attract further capital and development to the network. Who is Cathie Wood? Cathie Wood is the founder, CEO, and CIO of ARK Invest , an asset management firm known for its focus on disruptive innovation and investing in companies at the forefront of technological advancements, including those in the cryptocurrency and blockchain sectors. Did you find this analysis of ARK Invest‚Äôs latest crypto move insightful? Share this article with your friends, colleagues, and anyone interested in the future of finance and the evolving cryptocurrency market! Your engagement helps us bring more valuable insights to the community. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption. title: Ethereum Buying Pressure Surges Amid New Treasury Wave and ETF Inflows
body: The pace of Ethereum inflows to spot exchange-traded funds is picking up momentum while new treasury companies stashing the asset are announced almost daily. This will put immense buying pressure on Ethereum over the next 12 to 18 months, said Framework Ventures co-founder Vance Spencer on Tuesday. ‚ÄúMid-eleven figures have been added as buy pressure over a medium-term horizon (12-18 months) for ETH,‚Äù he said, adding that this could be $50 billion to $100 billion of inflows for a $400 billion asset. Between the pace of ETHA inflows picking up to $250-$500M per day and treasury company buys (SBET ATM of $5Bn, BMNR 5% ETH target), mid 11 figures have been added as buy pressure over a medium term horizon (12-18 months) for ETH ETH = $50Bn-$100Bn of inflows on a $400bn asset ‚Äî Vance Spencer (@pythianism) July 22, 2025 Ethereum ETFs, Treasurys Surging Spot Ethereum ETFs in the United States have seen a 12-day inflow streak with more than $2.2 billion entering the products over the past five trading days. Almost $300 million in inflows was recorded on Monday with Fidelity‚Äôs FETH fund leading the pack with a $127 million inflow. Over $3.5 billion in new capital has entered the products, and five of the top ten inflows since inception have come in past two weeks, observed NovaDius Wealth Management President Nate Geraci. The total inflow for Ether ETFs is now $7.7 billion with BlackRock‚Äôs inflow topping $8 billion. The total aggregate figure is lower due to the continued outflow from the higher-priced Grayscale ETHE fund. In addition to the surge in ETF inflows is a new wave of Ethereum treasury companies which are emerging almost on a daily basis. On Monday, a new investment firm focused on Ethereum announced plans to go public on the Nasdaq with over $1.6 billion in backing. The Ether Reserve will launch through a SPAC merger with a combined entity called ‚ÄúThe Ether Machine,‚Äù reported Reuters. The company will acquire around 400,000 ETH, currently worth around $1.5 billion, making it the largest public Ethereum treasury company. Also on Monday, DeFi platform ETH Strategy announced a public sale of Ether-backed STRAT tokens. ‚ÄúETH Strategy first needs deep onchain liquidity to kickstart our ETH-compounding flywheel, a foundation secured by the private presale,‚Äù the firm stated. The move follows its acquisition of 6,900 ETH on July 11. Meanwhile, Bitmine Immersion Tech and SharpLink Gaming have continued to increase their holdings. ETH Price Hits 7-Month High Ether prices tapped a seven-month high of $3,850 on Monday, building on a 25% gain over the past week. The asset has cooled slightly at the time of writing on Tuesday morning when it was trading at $3,730. ETH is ‚Äúreplaying its 2020 script,‚Äù with a descending breakout, final bear trap, and ‚Äúexplosion loading,‚Äù commented analyst ‚ÄòMerlijn The Trader‚Äô who added that the last time it did this led to a 1,800% rally. A similar rally from current levels could propel ETH prices into the stratosphere. $ETH is replaying its 2020 script. ‚Äì Descending breakout ‚Äì Final bear trap ‚Äì Explosion loading‚Ä¶ Last time: +1800% rally. This time? BlackRock is buying like mad. And the Ethereum staking ETF is coming. This isn‚Äôt the moment to be bearish. It‚Äôs the moment to position up. pic.twitter.com/SOAardnnic ‚Äî Merlijn The Trader (@MerlijnTrader) July 21, 2025 The post Ethereum Buying Pressure Surges Amid New Treasury Wave and ETF Inflows appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: US Banking Groups Urge OCC to Delay Ripple, Circle, and Other Crypto Firms‚Äô Banking Licenses
body: The post US Banking Groups Urge OCC to Delay Ripple, Circle, and Other Crypto Firms‚Äô Banking Licenses appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The US banking groups have urged the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) to delay its decision on granting national banking charters to crypto firms, Rippe and Circle. Agencies like the American Bankers Association, along with many other banks and credit union trade groups, raised concerns about the lack of transparency in applications submitted by both of the crypto firms. US Banking Groups Urge OCC To Delay Crypto Firms‚Äô Application In a joint letter to the OCC on Thursday, the US banking networks urged the OCC to postpone its decision on crypto companies‚Äô bank licenses. The US agencies argued that the applications from Circle Internet Group , Fidelity Digital Assets, and Ripple Labs did not provide enough information to assess their business model and operations. This lack of transparency could lead to a shift in regulatory norms, impacting the digital financial space in the country. The groups argued , ‚ÄúThere are significant policy and legal questions as to whether the Applicants‚Äô proposed business plans involve the types of fiduciary activities performed by national trust banks.‚Äù US Banks Warn: Lack of Transparency Could Pose As Material Risk Additionally, the groups reiterated that the applications do not allow for public scrutiny. So if OCC changes its policy, the public will not be able to examine its procedure, leaving a trust issue. In their request, the agencies have warned that these crypto firms operating as national trust banks could expose the US banking and financial systems to material risks. These susceptible risks could also lead to disruptions in the financial landscape of the country. US Anticipates More Crypto Firms to Seek Banking License Crypto experts claim that the passing of the GENIUS Act will push more crypto firms to apply for a chartered banking license. As the US establishes a clear regulatory framework for the issuance of ‚Äúpayment stablecoin,‚Äù it has boosted confidence among crypto investors to expand their business with crypto licenses. Logan Payne, a crypto-focused lawyer at Winston & Strawn, confirms this by stating that this charter license would allow the crypto firms to engage in a wider range of activities without the need for state-to-state licenses in the US.

title: ‚ÄúSell Ethereum, Buy Bitcoin‚Äù Peter Schiff Says
body: The post ‚ÄúSell Ethereum, Buy Bitcoin‚Äù Peter Schiff Says appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ethereum, the second-largest cryptocurrency , has been gaining ground lately, trading close to $3,800, its highest level in months. But well-known gold advocate and crypto critic Peter Schiff believes this is the perfect time for holders to exit. In his latest post on X, Schiff suggested that Ethereum is nearing the top of its trading range and that it might be better to sell it now and use the funds to buy Bitcoin instead. Even though Schiff isn‚Äôt a fan of either crypto, he sees Bitcoin as the stronger option for the moment. Ether is back near the upper end of its trading range again. If you own any, this is a great time to sell. As much as it pains me to say, selling Ether and buying Bitcoin with the proceeds is a better trade than holding Ether. ‚Äî Peter Schiff (@PeterSchiff) July 21, 2025 Ethereum Price Rally Draws Mixed Reactions The rise in Ethereum‚Äôs price is partly due to growing demand from institutions and excitement around Ethereum spot ETFs . In recent weeks, several companies, including BitMine and SharpLink, have added substantial amounts of ETH to their reserves, with some also staking it to earn rewards. Meanwhile, ETH received a major boost during the crypto week, and the passage of three major crypto bills created a strong foundation for the ETH rally. It's not as far as I'm concerned. I'm just looking at the charts. But I think based on the way the tokens are hyped, Ether has more acknowledged competition for the narrative of its use case. ‚Äî Peter Schiff (@PeterSchiff) July 21, 2025 However, Schiff‚Äôs warning has stirred debate among analysts and investors. Many are questioning whether Ethereum‚Äôs rally has gone too far too fast. Schiff pointed out that ETH has struggled to outperform Bitcoin lately and that the recent gains may not be sustainable. He said the smarter trade right now could be switching to Bitcoin, especially if Ethereum hits resistance again. Market Pushback on Schiff‚Äôs View Schiff‚Äôs comment sparked reactions across the crypto space. Some argued that Ethereum‚Äôs long-term use cases, such as smart contracts and staking, still give it strong upside potential. SharpLink Gaming even responded directly, saying they plan to stake their ETH rather than sell it. Analyst Benjamin Cowen also suggested that the ETH to BTC price ratio had already bottomed before Schiff made his call, meaning the timing might not be ideal. You had 4 years to say that ETH/BTC would bleed and you finally say it after the bleeding is over. pic.twitter.com/DQQ5HJaidu ‚Äî Benjamin Cowen (@intocryptoverse) July 21, 2025 .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Top Seven Altcoins To Buy Now For Big Gains , People on X even mocked him for giving the same advice for Bitcoin previously. Is this you sir? Cringe pic.twitter.com/NvZb7mYt3V ‚Äî WIZZ ( beware scammers ) (@CryptoWizardd) July 21, 2025 What investors should watch Right now, Ethereum is showing strong momentum , but Schiff‚Äôs warning is a reminder that price swings can come fast. Traders should watch whether ETH continues to push higher or if resistance near current levels sends it lower. If momentum slows, Schiff‚Äôs idea of rotating into Bitcoin could gain more support. title: Peter Schiff Urges Ethereum Investors to Switch to Bitcoin Amid Price Surge
body: Peter Schiff suggests Ethereum investors consider switching to Bitcoin. Ethereum reached its highest level in six months amid strong institutional interest. Continue Reading: Peter Schiff Urges Ethereum Investors to Switch to Bitcoin Amid Price Surge The post Peter Schiff Urges Ethereum Investors to Switch to Bitcoin Amid Price Surge appeared first on COINTURK NEWS .

title: What Are Traders Saying as Solana Reclaims Spotlight? ETH, DOGE, ADA See Profit-Taking
body: Ether (ETH) extended its climb over the weekend, jumping past $3,770 as capital shifted from bitcoin (BTC) to major tokens. The move continues a trend that has defined July trading, with slow, steady gains for BTC alongside large breakouts across Layer 1s and decentralized finance (DeFi) tokens. Bitcoin held firm above $117,400, gaining a little over 1% in the past 24 hours. XRP (XRP), BNB (BNB), dogecoin (DOGE) and Cardano‚Äôs ADA (ADA) showed mixed movements as traders took profits, while Solana‚Äôs SOL (SOL) surged 8% to $203, its highest price level since late February. The strength in SOL came as ecosystem player Jito introduced the Block Assembly Marketplace (BAM) in a move that some observers said boosted investor interest in SOL, as CoinDesk reported . DeFi bluechips like Uniswap and Aave have posted 20%‚Äì30% jumps in the past week. Jeff Mei, COO at BTSE, attributed this to a mix of strong ETF inflows and optimism over the GENIUS Act, a legislative proposal expected to clarify the regulatory path for DeFi platforms. ‚ÄúInvestors are rotating into Ethereum en masse, which explains its sustained rally over the weekend. Bitcoin still remains strong at $117,000, but it's clear that momentum has shifted towards Ethereum - the Ethereum ETFs are seeing record inflows,‚Äù Mei said in a note to CoinDesk. ‚ÄúThis makes sense as Ethereum is still trading well below its all-time highs and traders believe it will close the gap in the coming months,‚Äù Mei added. At current prices, ETH is still nearly 25% below its record high from 2021, providing swing traders with a defined target to aim for. As bitcoin cools near its recent highs, some fund managers are already rotating capital into ether, betting that it‚Äôs next in line for a breakout. Part of that optimism stems from the growing role of ETH in institutional portfolios, especially as U.S. spot ETFs see accelerating inflows. ‚ÄúWe expect that Ethereum will climb back higher against BTC due to institutional support of new reserve strategies while investors fear missing out on an ETH surge similar to Bitcoin's rush to $120,000 this year,‚Äù said Nassar Al Achkar, chief strategy officer at CoinW, in a Tuesday note. Meanwhile, some say that global markets are flashing early signs of a renewed inflationary cycle. Long-dated yields are holding firm at elevated levels across major economies, while inflation breakevens ‚Äî a key measure of future price pressures ‚Äî have quietly climbed back to multi-year highs. ‚ÄúInflation expectations have creeped back in with long-dated yields staying elevated globally, while inflation breakevens have climbed back to the highest level in years as financial conditions stay loose,‚Äù Augustine Fan, head of insights at SignalPlus, said in a Telegram message. ‚ÄúCrypto has certainly not shied away from our own FOMO moment. It certainly feels like that the good days are back until further notice,‚Äù Fan ended. Read more: Trump Media's $2B Bitcoin Buy Challenges Halving Cycle Wisdom of BTC Peaking in 2025

title: Farewell for Fed Chair Jerome Powell May Be Near: One of Trump‚Äôs Closest Allies Takes Action
body: Anna Paulina Luna, a Republican member of the US House of Representatives known for her close ties to President Donald Trump, has filed a criminal complaint with the Justice Department against Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell. Luna accuses Powell of making false statements to Congress on two separate occasions. According to a criminal complaint obtained by Fox News Digital, Florida Rep. Luna accuses Powell of making ‚Äúfalse statements‚Äù in her sworn testimony. The charges relate to Powell's testimony before the Senate Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs Committee on June 25, 2025. Luna stated that Powell ‚Äúhid lavish details‚Äù and misrepresented the state of maintenance in his testimony regarding the renovation of the Eccles Building, the Fed's headquarters. He also alleged that Powell attributed the project's cost increase from $1.9 billion to $2.5 billion to ‚Äúminor changes,‚Äù a claim Congressional documents have denied. According to the criminal complaint, the project includes luxury features such as a VIP dining room, premium marble finishes, modern elevators, water features, and a rooftop garden. Luna argues that Powell misrepresented the existence of these features. Related News: List of Altcoins Experiencing a Surge in Trading Volume in South Korea Revealed - Bitcoin and Ethereum Not in the Top Three Luna announced last week on the X (formerly Twitter) platform that she would file a criminal complaint against Powell. Under US law, making false statements to Congress (i.e., lying under oath) can result in up to five years in prison and a fine. Meanwhile, according to the trade publication Mortgage Professional, Jerome Powell denied all accusations and ordered an independent audit of the Eccles Building's renovation costs. A video tour and detailed information about the renovation project has been added to the Fed's official website. Luna had previously written in a post on X that she thought Donald Trump would fire Powell. However, Trump stated in a statement on the matter that it was ‚Äúvery unlikely‚Äù he would fire Powell. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Farewell for Fed Chair Jerome Powell May Be Near: One of Trump‚Äôs Closest Allies Takes Action

title: AI Chip Startup FuriosaAI Achieves Revolutionary Success with LG AI Research Partnership
body: BitcoinWorld AI Chip Startup FuriosaAI Achieves Revolutionary Success with LG AI Research Partnership In the rapidly evolving landscape where artificial intelligence intersects with blockchain and digital assets, the underlying hardware powering these innovations is paramount. For those tracking the pulse of AI‚Äôs foundational technologies, a significant development has emerged from South Korea. AI chip startup FuriosaAI has made headlines not by selling out to a tech giant, but by securing a monumental partnership with LG AI Research, signaling a powerful shift in the global AI computing arena. FuriosaAI‚Äôs Strategic Move: Why Independence Paid Off The narrative often sees promising startups acquired by larger entities, yet FuriosaAI chose a different path. Roughly three months ago, the Seoul-based AI chip pioneer declined an $800 million acquisition offer from Meta. This decision, reportedly due to disagreements over post-acquisition strategy rather than price, has now proven to be a strategic masterstroke. By maintaining its independence, FuriosaAI has positioned itself to forge partnerships that align with its core mission of making AI computing more sustainable and impactful. As CEO June Paik told Bitcoin World, ‚ÄúWe want to continue our mission, and I think it‚Äôs an exciting opportunity at the same time. I believe it‚Äôs a very impactful contribution, both personally and for the company, to make AI computing more sustainable.‚Äù Powering LG‚Äôs EXAONE: A Game-Changer for AI Computing The core of this exciting new chapter for FuriosaAI is its partnership with LG AI Research. FuriosaAI will supply its specialized AI chip , RNGD, to enterprises leveraging LG AI Research‚Äôs cutting-edge EXAONE platform. This collaboration is particularly significant given that RNGD is specifically optimized for running large language models (LLMs), and LG recently unveiled its next-generation hybrid AI model, EXAONE 4.0. This synergy aims to revolutionize AI computing across diverse sectors, including electronics, finance, telecommunications, and biotechnology, enabling a wide array of advanced applications. Is FuriosaAI the Next Nvidia Alternative? One of the most compelling aspects of this partnership, as highlighted by FuriosaAI CEO June Paik, is its public endorsement of a rival to Nvidia by a major enterprise. For years, Nvidia has dominated the AI chip market, but the demand for specialized, cost-effective, and energy-efficient alternatives is growing. FuriosaAI‚Äôs success with LG AI Research suggests it could emerge as a formidable Nvidia alternative . The startup claims its RNGD accelerator delivered 2.25 times better inference performance than competitive GPUs with LG AI Research‚Äôs EXAONE models, alongside superior energy efficiency. This is a crucial differentiator, especially as the computational demands of AI continue to skyrocket. Paik noted that LG AI‚Äôs decision to adopt Furiosa‚Äôs AI chip and accelerator is notable because it is one of the few public endorsements of a rival to Nvidia by a major enterprise. Lowering the Total Cost of Ownership in AI Chip Solutions A key factor in LG AI Research‚Äôs decision to adopt FuriosaAI‚Äôs hardware was the compelling argument around total cost of ownership. Paik emphasized, ‚ÄúWe had to prove that our solution not only delivers strong performance but also lowers total cost of ownership.‚Äù Unlike general-purpose GPUs which are designed for a multitude of tasks including rendering and mining, FuriosaAI‚Äôs chip is built exclusively for AI. ‚ÄúWe can support a wide variety of AI models efficiently. But unlike GPUs, which are still fundamentally general-purpose processors, our architecture is natively built for AI computing. We do not develop our chip for rendering or mining,‚Äù Paik said. This specialized design allows for highly efficient processing of a wide variety of AI models, leading to significant operational savings for enterprises. This focus on efficiency and cost-effectiveness is a major draw for companies looking to scale their AI computing capabilities without incurring exorbitant expenses. Expanding Global Horizons for South Korean AI Innovation The impact of this partnership extends far beyond South Korea‚Äôs borders. While LG AI‚Äôs EXAONE is a leading sovereign AI model within the country, it is also poised for global adoption. CEO June Paik anticipates significant international demand for both EXAONE and FuriosaAI‚Äôs chip solutions. ‚ÄúLG AI‚Äôs EXAONE is regarded as the leading sovereign AI model in South Korea. It won‚Äôt be used just within LG. It will be one of the main AI models used in the Korean AI ecosystem. We expect there will be many demands for this EXAONE, as well as for our chip solutions in South Korea, but not only in Korea. The LG team is also partnering with and doing business with global customers. So, we also expect this to be used by those customers, including global customers,‚Äù Paik stated. This collaboration marks a pivotal moment for South Korean AI innovation, showcasing its capability to compete and excel on the world stage, offering advanced AI solutions that are both powerful and sustainable. Benefits of FuriosaAI‚Äôs Approach: Specialized Performance: RNGD is purpose-built for AI, particularly LLMs, offering superior inference performance (2.25x better than competitors). Cost Efficiency: Lowers the total cost of ownership for enterprises by optimizing hardware for AI workloads. Energy Efficiency: Contributes to more sustainable AI computing, a critical factor for large-scale deployments. Strategic Independence: Allows FuriosaAI to pursue its mission and forge partnerships aligned with its long-term vision. Global Reach: Partnership with LG AI Research opens doors to international markets and global customers. Challenges and Future Outlook: While FuriosaAI has secured a significant win, the AI chip market remains intensely competitive. The challenge for FuriosaAI will be to scale production, expand its client base beyond LG, and continue innovating to stay ahead of the curve. The startup, with a global team of just 15 employees, will need to manage rapid growth effectively. CEO June Paik declined to comment on future funding rounds, but the success of this partnership will undoubtedly bolster their position for potential investments. The long-term vision of making AI computing more sustainable resonates with the broader industry trend towards responsible AI development. FuriosaAI‚Äôs decision to prioritize its mission over a lucrative acquisition has paid off handsomely, securing a landmark partnership with LG AI Research. This collaboration not only validates FuriosaAI‚Äôs specialized AI chip technology but also positions it as a significant player in the global AI hardware landscape, offering a compelling Nvidia alternative . As AI continues to permeate every industry, the demand for efficient, cost-effective, and powerful AI computing solutions will only grow. FuriosaAI, with its focused approach and strategic alliances, appears well-equipped to meet this demand, driving innovation from South Korea to the world. To learn more about the latest AI market trends and the future of AI computing , explore our article on key developments shaping AI Models and their institutional adoption. This post AI Chip Startup FuriosaAI Achieves Revolutionary Success with LG AI Research Partnership first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: The Most Coveted Airdrop Coin in the World ‚Äì WonderChain! A Coin That VCs Are Watching Closely and Holders Are Most Excited About in 2025
body: BitcoinWorld The Most Coveted Airdrop Coin in the World ‚Äì WonderChain! A Coin That VCs Are Watching Closely and Holders Are Most Excited About in 2025 A New Revolution in the Global Airdrop Market of 2025 As of 2025, the global crypto airdrop market is more active than ever before. On major platforms like Airdrops.io, CoinGecko, and ZebPay, numerous projects such as Berachain, Kaito AI, Story Protocol, and Monad are seen competing to attract users through airdrops. But among these projects, one name stands out, receiving all the anticipation from users. That is none other than WonderChain . Especially with the official token launch confirmed for August 2025, participants in the airdrop campaign have growing expectations for receiving actual rewards once the token goes into circulation. This airdrop is receiving positive responses within the community for providing practical benefits to participants even before the official launch. Why VCs Are Paying Attention to WonderChain Recently, global VC investment trends are leaning more toward Web3 integrated platforms connected to real life rather than purely tech-centered projects. WonderChain is gaining attention for being structured exactly in line with that direction. WonderChain‚Äôs core values include: Real-Life Integrated Ecosystem A practical-use-based design connecting travel, rewards, and local commerce Global Scalability A universally accessible UX based on cultural content Sustainable Token Economy Behavior-based rewards and automatic gas-burning mechanism Potential for Exchange Listing With its structural completeness and rapid global community expansion, there is growing anticipation for listings on major exchanges. Especially, rumors of launching on Tier 1 exchanges such as Binance, OKX, and BYBIT continue to spread, amplifying expectations among investors and the community. WonderChain‚Äôs Unique Differentiation from Other Projects Currently spotlighted airdrop projects: Berachain: PoL-based DeFi optimization Monad: High-performance Ethereum L1 Kaito AI: AI-powered analytics platform Story Protocol: IP management protocol While all of these are technically outstanding projects, WonderChain is differentiated by its three-dimensional scalability that connects technology, community, and real-life utility. ‚ÄúOnly with WonderChain can such an amazing campaign happen! If your idea gets selected, it could lead to both a rise in $WDC‚Äôs value and a stronger sense of community!‚Äù The actual community response has also been very positive. WonderChain Leading the 2025 Airdrop Trend The major trends in the global airdrop market in 2025 are as follows: Increase in community-participation-based structures Preference for projects with real-life utility Evaluation of long-term ecosystem operation potential Emphasis on clarity and transparency of reward structures WonderChain is being evaluated as a project that meets all four of these criteria and is leading the trend. With a real-use-based Web3 model, global scalability, and a sustainable token economy, WonderChain has firmly established itself as the coin that users around the world most want to hold in 2025.` This post The Most Coveted Airdrop Coin in the World ‚Äì WonderChain! title: Trump Media's $2B Bitcoin Buy Challenges Halving Cycle Wisdom of BTC Peaking in 2025
body: "Don't fight the Fed," a market adage says, warning investors from betting against the U.S. Federal Reserve. For crypto traders, it may be time for a new dictum: "Don't fight the President." On Monday, Trump Media and Technology Group, the social media company owned by President Donald Trump, disclosed a $2 billion investment in bitcoin (BTC), with the intention of acquiring more. The announcement calls for traders to reconsider the possibility of BTC remaining bid through the year-end, potentially invalidating the conventional wisdom that the bull market peaks a year after the halving. Halving cycle The Bitcoin blockchain implements reward halving every four years, reducing the amount of BTC paid to miners per block by 50%. The fourth halving, implemented in April last year, decreased rewards to 3.125 BTC. Since then, BTC's price has surged from roughly $65,000 to nearly $120,000. The bull market is in full swing, but here is the catch. Since its inception, bitcoin's price has tended to follow a predictable rhythm ‚Äì a four-year cycle centered around halving. Notably, prices tend to surge after halving, peaking 12-18 months after the event and then slipping into a year-long bear market. Past bull runs peaked in December 2013, December 2017 and November 2021. In other words, if history is a guide, BTC's ongoing bull run could lose momentum before the year's end, paving the way for a prolonged bear market. This time may be different The notion that history must repeat itself in Bitcoin's cycles requires reassessment this time due to a key differentiator ‚Äì the presence of a pro-crypto president. On one hand, the Trump-linked DJT is actively purchasing coins and adding bullish pressure in the market. On the other hand, the Trump administration is adding to the bullish market sentiment through favorable regulatory reforms, such as the recent GENIUS Stablecoin Act. Beyond traditional market cycles, Trump Media's multi-billion-dollar Bitcoin bet signals potentially significant bullish macro tailwinds. As pseudonymous observer EndGame Macro highlighted on X, "No one spends $2 billion on an ultra volatile asset unless they‚Äôre betting on a shift in the entire liquidity regime." Given President Donald Trump's repeated public criticisms of Fed Chairman Jerome Powell and high interest rates, this high-profile bitcoin acquisition by the President-linked group likely suggests a clear strategic play: a bet on forthcoming rate cuts and a potential debasement of the U.S. dollar. Trump has repeatedly criticized the Fed and its Chairman Jerome Powell for keeping interest rates elevated at 4.25%, saying it's costing Americans billions of dollars. "If they didn‚Äôt believe the Fed was going to pivot, either by force or design, then this would be reckless. Because if the Fed holds rates higher for longer and bitcoin corrects 40‚Äì60% in a deflationary flush, Trump Media would risk massive mark-to-market losses or even liquidation depending on how this position is structured," EndGame Macro noted. Fed rate cuts and potential debasement of the dollar could only add to the liquidity in the system, easing financial conditions for continued risk-taking in both traditional and crypto markets. Goldman expects three rate cuts this year Strategists at the investment banking giant Goldman Sachs expect the Fed to deliver three-quarter basis-point rate cuts, starting from the September meeting, according to InvestingLive. The expected easing cycle is contingent on inflation not flaring up again, Goldman noted, adding that the current trends point to a gradual but steady policy pivot to rate cuts. Read more: Trump Media Discloses $2B Bitcoin Stack

title: Dogecoin Retreats Despite Bit Origin‚Äôs $500M Allocation, RSI Hits Overbought
body: Dogecoin tumbled nearly 7% over the past 24 hours, reversing gains after briefly touching the $0.29 level ‚Äî its highest price in over 10 months. The decline comes despite Bit Origin‚Äôs headline-grabbing $500 million DOGE treasury allocation, which included over 40 million tokens acquired this week. Traders cited overbought conditions and lack of sustained buy pressure as key reasons for the retracement. DOGE is now consolidating just above the $0.26 mark. News Background Bit Origin, a Hong Kong-based commodities and treasury firm, announced a major corporate commitment to Dogecoin with a $500 million treasury strategy involving a phased purchase of 1 billion DOGE. The move was initially seen as a validation of DOGE as a corporate asset. However, price failed to hold highs above $0.29, raising questions over DOGE's ability to sustain institutional rallies amid broader market headwinds and historically volatile trading conditions. Price Action Summary ‚Ä¢ DOGE surged to $0.29 at 17:00 on July 21 following news of Bit Origin's treasury plan, before falling to $0.27 by session close. ‚Ä¢ The 24-hour trading range spanned $0.26‚Äì$0.29, marking a 9% volatility window. ‚Ä¢ Final-hour trading (03:06‚Äì04:05 UTC on July 22) saw DOGE drop from $0.27 to $0.26, its lowest since Thursday, with volume rising to 37.2 million during the decline. ‚Ä¢ DOGE is now down 7% from session highs, despite institutional buying. Technical Analysis ‚Ä¢ RSI spiked to 85.95 on the move to $0.29, indicating overbought conditions. ‚Ä¢ Trading volumes peaked at 1.703 billion tokens during the breakout, nearly 2.5x the daily average. ‚Ä¢ Resistance remains firm at $0.29 with repeated rejections. ‚Ä¢ Support weakened from $0.27 to $0.26 as buyers failed to hold levels. ‚Ä¢ DOGE now trades at the lower end of its recent range, risking further downside if $0.26 fails. What Traders Are Watching Traders are eyeing whether DOGE can hold above $0.26, which has served as short-term support amid institutional flows. Failure to hold this level may trigger a retest of the $0.245-$0.25 zone. Any renewed buying from corporate treasuries or ETF-related speculation may help DOGE reclaim the $0.275-$0.29 resistance band ‚Äî but momentum remains fragile.

title: What's Happening at Solana? A Rally Unseen Since February! Will the Rise Continue? Analysts Assess SOL's Latest Situation!
body: After itcoin's ATH above $123,000, the rally turned to Ethereum (ETH) and altcoins. As Ethereum approaches its new ATH, surpassing $3,700, altcoins are also experiencing significant gains. Solana (SOL) was also one of these altcoins. Solana is on the rise! According to the data, Solana regained the $200 level for the first time since February 5. According to The Block, analysts cited institutional buying as the catalyst for Solana‚Äôs rise, saying the launch of the Block Assembly Marketplace and the purchase of millions of dollars worth of additional SOL for treasuries by companies like DeFi Development Corp. Vincent Liu, chief investment officer of Kronos Research, stated that the Solana rally was supported by SOL corporate reserve purchases, saying: ‚ÄúThe $200 level is a significant psychological and technical turning point for Solana, signaling renewed investor confidence and strengthening market liquidity. Breaking through this threshold will typically attract more buyers and set the stage for further upward momentum.‚Äù The analyst noted that Solana benefited from the announcement that DeFi Development Corp (DFDV) raised $19 million and purchased 141,383 SOL. Apart from DeFi Corp, Upexi announced the purchase of 100,000 SOL, and Mercurity Fintech announced the purchase of $200 million worth of SOL. Liu also said that spot Solana ETFs, expected to launch next October, also contributed to the rise. ‚ÄúAs optimism around Solana ETFs grows ahead of the US SEC decision on October 10, Solane and altcoins are on the rise amid deepening liquidity and rapidly shifting momentum.‚Äù VRG Research Director Nick Ruck said that the Block Assembly Market (BAM), developed by Jito Labs, was influential in Solana's rise. BAM aims to bring transparency and verifiability to transaction processing on Solana, foster programmable innovation, and create new revenue streams for developers. The platform aims to provide developers and validators with the ability to generate revenue from blockchain space while also improving the user experience by making it faster and more reliable. *This is not investment advice. title: Strategy Buys 6220 More Bitcoin, But July Buys Slow
body: This latest buy brought its total holdings to 607,770 BTC valued at over $72 billion. Despite a slight slowdown in monthly acquisitions compared to previous months, Strategy is still the largest public holder of Bitcoin. Its Bitcoin yield also rose to 20.8% after this latest purchase. Meanwhile, in stark contrast, the UK government is preparing to sell over ¬£5 billion ($6.7 billion) worth of seized Bitcoin to help close a national budget deficit. The crypto was mostly confiscated from a Chinese Ponzi scheme, and is currently the subject of legal disputes involving victims and Chinese authorities. Critics argue the sale is premature and could actually harm the UK‚Äôs long-term crypto strategy. Strategy Invests $739 Million in Bitcoin Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy continued its aggressive Bitcoin accumulation strategy by confirming the purchase of 6,220 BTC for $739.8 million last week. The acquisition was disclosed in a US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filing , and was made at an average price of $118,940 per coin. This move came as Bitcoin briefly surged past $122,000 on July 14 before pulling back to around $118,000. The purchase increased Strategy‚Äôs total Bitcoin holdings to 607,770 BTC, acquired at an average price of $71,756, with a total investment now standing at approximately $43.6 billion. As a result of the latest acquisition, Strategy‚Äôs year-to-date Bitcoin yield increased to 20.8% , up from 20.2% last week. The company‚Äôs Bitcoin yield metric was introduced in August of 2024, and it measures the percentage change in the ratio between its BTC holdings and assumed diluted shares outstanding. The current yield stands just 4.2% short of its 25% target. Strategy‚Äôs Bitcoin yield once peaked at 74.3% in 2024. Meanwhile, Strategy‚Äôs internal financial activities have also drawn some attention from the crypto community. Senior executive vice president Wei-Ming Shao filed to sell another 10,900 shares of Strategy (MSTR) on July 14, generating roughly $4.9 million. This sale happened after a $25.7 million share offload by the same executive just the previous week. Strategy Bitcoin buys (Source: SaylorTracker ) In terms of accumulation pace, Strategy‚Äôs July Bitcoin purchases so far total 10,455 BTC, down from 17,075 in June, 26,695 in May, and 25,370 in April. Despite the slower monthly accumulation rate, the firm is still the largest public holder of Bitcoin. UK Plans to Sell Seized Bitcoin While Strategy is showing no signs of slowing down its Bitcoin accumulation mission, the United Kingdom is reportedly preparing to sell more than ¬£5 billion ($6.7 billion) worth of seized Bitcoin to address its budget deficit, according to The Telegraph . The effort is being coordinated by the Home Office and Treasury Chief Rachel Reeves, in collaboration with law enforcement. While UK police typically handle crypto sales, the Treasury‚Äôs involvement is likely due to the scale of the holdings and their potential impact on national finances as Bitcoin‚Äôs value recently surged. The government is developing a secure system to store the crypto ahead of the proposed liquidation. Among the seized assets is at least 61,000 Bitcoin‚Äîwhich is currently worth around $7.1 billion‚Äîoriginally confiscated from a Chinese Ponzi scheme in 2018. The stash came to light after Jian Wen , a hospitality worker, tried to launder funds from the scheme by purchasing luxury property. She was later convicted of money laundering and sentenced to over six years in prison in May of 2024. However, the sale of the Bitcoin is legally contested , as Chinese authorities and victims of the scheme demand its return. Susie Violet Ward, CEO of Bitcoin Policy UK, criticized the idea of a sale as premature, especially due to the ongoing legal disputes. The Crown Prosecution Service asked the High Court for permission to retain the assets, which would allow the proceeds to be distributed under the Proceeds of Crime Act‚Äîpotentially compensating victims and funding police agencies involved in the case. Photo of the property that Wen tried to purchase Freddie New , head of policy at Bitcoin Policy UK, pointed out that victims originally lost yuan rather than Bitcoin, which complicates efforts to return the assets. He explained that any sale would be subject to court-ordered compensation, and the remaining proceeds would potentially go to the Treasury and other recovery bodies. Earlier this year, the UK government also issued a ¬£40 million tender for a crypto asset management framework, but it was later canceled due to inadequate bids. Despite legal and diplomatic complexities, the UK government seems very eager to liquidate its holdings. Critics argue the move is shortsighted. Jordan Walker of the Bitcoin Collective urged the government not to sell the Bitcoin, and warned that it could damage the UK‚Äôs long-term economic positioning. Bitcoin Policy UK also appealed to lawmakers in July of 2024 to consider amending laws to allow the country to keep valuable digital assets, though the request was reportedly ignored.

title: Bitcoin Holders Are Taking Profits‚ÄîBut Is the Top Still Far Away?
body: Bitcoin‚Äôs recent price movement reflects a pause in the broader uptrend, with the asset trading at $117,901 following a near 5% weekly decline. While the current downturn may signal a cooling of investor enthusiasm, on-chain indicators suggest the market may still have room to expand before reaching an exhaustion point. Notably, activity among long-term holders and derivatives traders reveals continued interest and potential for price volatility. One of the standout indicators drawing attention is the Spent Output Profit Ratio (SOPR) for long-term holders (LTH), which has climbed to a new high for 2025. Related Reading: Bitcoin Climbs, But NVT Indicator Sends a Surprising Signal SOPR Suggests Continued Room for Growth Before Cycle Peaks According to CryptoQuant analyst Gaah, this metric tracks the profitability of coins moved by holders who have kept their Bitcoin for more than 155 days. The latest reading shows that LTHs are beginning to sell at a profit, but the indicator has yet to reach historically critical levels associated with market tops. Gaah emphasized that although LTH SOPR has crossed the mid-range and currently sits slightly above 2.5, it remains well below the 4.0 threshold historically linked with macro tops in previous cycles. This implies that long-term investors are realizing gains, but not to an extent that would suggest market euphoria or widespread distribution. In past bull cycles, SOPR readings above 4.0 marked the onset of significant corrections or cycle tops. The gradual increase in profit-taking could indicate that the market is maturing while maintaining upward potential. Gaah notes that investors should interpret this as part of the natural progression of a bullish phase, though risks of correction still remain. The ongoing accumulation and realization patterns from LTHs provide insight into how confidence and caution can simultaneously exist in market behavior. Derivatives Market Remains Active Amid High Open Interest and Bullish Funding Rates In a separate analysis, CryptoQuant analyst Arab Chain highlighted ongoing activity in the Bitcoin derivatives market as another crucial component of the current market landscape. Open interest, which represents the total number of outstanding futures contracts, remains elevated near $42 billion. This level, though slightly down from recent peaks, is still near historical highs and reflects strong trader participation. Arab Chain also highlighted the role of funding rates in shaping market sentiment. Currently, rising funding rates suggest dominance by long positions, indicating a bullish market environment. Related Reading: Hold On For Dear Life: This Bullish Bitcoin Metric Just Touched A 15-Year High When this sentiment is paired with high open interest, it may point to heightened risk of volatility, especially in an environment where leveraged trades are becoming more frequent. The analyst warned that a sudden price move could lead to widespread liquidations if funding becomes unsustainable, forcing exchanges to close out positions. Featured image created with DALL-E, Chart from Tradingview

title: MAGACOIN FINANCE Poised to Outperform as Cardano and Chainlink Face Resistance
body: As the crypto market recalibrates in Q3 2025, a growing number of traders are rotating capital away from legacy Layer 1s and oracle networks. While Cardano and Chainlink hit technical headwinds, a meme-powered altcoin with community-first roots is gaining momentum: MAGACOIN FINANCE , a decentralized political memecoin attracting retail investors and ideologically aligned crypto participants alike. What Is MAGACOIN FINANCE? MAGACOIN FINANCE is a hybrid between an altcoin and a memecoin‚Äîdesigned not only to ride cultural narratives, but to embed itself in the ideological and decentralization ethos that defines Web3. Unlike traditional meme tokens that thrive only on virality, MAGACOIN FINANCE is grounded in purpose. At its core, the project is: A decentralized political memecoin built around themes of anti-centralization and free expression A zero-tax system that ensures transparent trading and encourages frictionless accumulation A community-owned protocol with no VC control or pre-mine, placing real power in the hands of users This dual identity‚Äîpart ideological movement, part meme-layer coin‚Äîhas enabled MAGACOIN FINANCE to attract both Dogecoin-style retail traders and more serious altcoin investors who value grassroots-driven ecosystems. How It Compares to Top Coins: Cardano and Chainlink Cardano (ADA), which has been credited with its scholarly nature, is now showing signs of resistance as its developers are not meeting timelines and growth in users is also slowing down. Many traders expected Cardano to break out of its year-long slump by having more transactions than it had in previous weeks, but that has not happened. While Chainlink (LINK) is important for the oracle infrastructure layer, it is stagnating due to better alternatives. Recent integrations haven‚Äôt resulted in a significant upside, and traders are now increasingly seeking alternatives with clearer upside catalysts and cultural stickiness. MAGACOIN FINANCE offers a contrasting model: Its ideological positioning speaks to a market segment often underrepresented in crypto Its narrative-first approach mirrors the early rise of SHIBA INU and DOGE‚Äîbut with deeper political resonance Its community-first growth is unencumbered by slow-moving roadmaps or enterprise entanglements Rather than trying to compete directly with infrastructure tokens, MAGACOIN FINANCE creates its own category‚Äîone that merges culture, narrative, and crypto-native values. Momentum & Community Growth The project‚Äôs momentum is increasingly visible. Telegram groups dedicated to MAGACOIN FINANCE are expanding daily, while community forums and news aggregators show a spike in mentions. Key signs of momentum include: Rapid user onboarding via its official site Organic interest from both meme coin hunters and altcoin collectors Rumors of centralized exchange listings, though no official confirmation yet A growing social presence and meme-layer virality that reflect strong community energy This growth is rooted not just in hype, but in decentralized governance principles that attract long-term holders looking for more than just price action. For many, MAGACOIN FINANCE represents the next evolution of what a narrative token can be‚Äîwhere cultural capital meets crypto structure. Final Thoughts: A New Kind of Contender Enters the Arena With Cardano and Chainlink struggling to maintain their positions, and many of the meme giants like SHIBA and DOGE entering consolidation phases, MAGACOIN FINANCE is emerging as a meaningful alternative. As crypto investors seek tokens that reflect both momentum and mission, MAGACOIN FINANCE may not only outperform‚Äîit may redefine what a meme-powered altcoin can achieve. title: Crypto Regulations in Spain 2025
body: The post Crypto Regulations in Spain 2025 appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News As of 2025, Spain is strengthening its crypto regulatory framework, aligning it with global standards. With a transparent, secure, and highly regulated market this year, Spain is reinforcing its reign over digital assets. Additionally, the government is providing clarity in the regulations to prevent crypto-related risks in the financial space while enhancing the fintech sector in the country. Table of contents Spain Crypto Laws 2025 What is the Spanish Government Saying About Crypto? Crypto License in Spain 2025 Requirements for CASP License in Spain Crypto Tax in Spain 2025 Capital Gains Tax Brackets for 2025 Crypto Adoption in Spain 2025 Conclusion FAQs Spain Crypto Laws 2025 July 4, 2025: BBVA Launches Crypto Services to Retail Customers Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria ( BBVA ), a multinational Spanish bank, launched crypto trading (Bitcoin and Ether) and custody services for retail customers. The services can be utilized through mobile apps. It has aligned the initiative with the EU‚Äôs Market in Crypto Assets (MiCA) to govern the regulations and provide investor protection. June 2025: Law to Acquire Crypto Exchanges‚Äô Data, Seize Digital Assets With the implementation of DAC8 crypto rules by 2026, Spain extends its measures to minimize criminal activity in the crypto space. In extension of its crypto tax policy, Spain announces that the Spanish tax agency is allowed to seize the cryptocurrency holdings of any user with tax debts. This also extends to other digital assets. December 30, 2025: Market in Crypto Assets (MiCA) Implementation in Spain MiCA applications became fully applicable across the European Union (EU), including Spain, in 2024. All crypto asset service providers (CASPs) operating in these countries are required to fully implement MiCA rules. However, Spain opted for a quicker timeline to fully transition to MiCA compliance. December 30, 2024 ‚Äì December 31, 2025 By shortening its transitional period, Spain has allowed existing CASPs to operate under current federal regulations while the entities fully transition to MiCA compliance. What is the Spanish Government Saying About Crypto? While the Spanish government has allowed the trade, mining, and use of cryptocurrency in the country, it is not recognized as a legal tender. The government holds a cautious and conservative stance on crypto, emphasising the importance of consumer protection and tax compliance. The Spanish government has taken several pro-crypto steps in the country, such as rescheduling the MiCA compliance. The MiCA compliance was originally scheduled to be fully implemented on July 1, 2026; however, the Spanish government opted to shorten the transition period by six months. It will not take effect on December 31, 2025. Besides enhancing the regulatory framework, the government is also actively working to terminate criminality in the crypto space. On June 25, the Spanish Guardia Civil, with support from law enforcement in the U.S., Estonia, and France, dismantled an international crypto fraud network that scammed over 5,000 victims across Europe and beyond. Crypto License in Spain 2025 Is there a cryptocurrency license in Spain? Yes, any entity providing crypto asset service in Spain requires a CASP license from the Spanish National Securities Market Commission (CNMV). Requirements for CASP License in Spain Companies seeking a CASP license in Spain require a physical office in the country. Along with that, a corporate bank account with financial clearance from the Central Bank of Spain is mandated. A detailed business plan, outlining strategy, platform use, client acquisition, and protection measures, is necessary. Companies must adhere to strict anti-money laundering (AML), counter terrorist financing (CFT), and know your customer (KYC) compliance. Only well-reputed companies with an AML officer for frequent compliance checking are eligible for a CASP license. Crypto Tax in Spain 2025 Under Article 33.1 of the Personal Income Tax Law ‚Äî any change in a taxpayer‚Äôs net wealth is considered capital gain. Reporting crypto returns by June 30 every year is mandated. Crypto tax events: Sale, swap, or payment using crypto, receiving crypto as income, such as salary, from mining, staking, DeFi, airdrops, etc., are subject to tax in Spain. Penalty: Taxpayers must keep records of their tax returns and declare them properly every year. Otherwise, it will lead to significant fines or legal action. Tax Type Tax Rate Details Capital Gains Tax 19% to 28% Depending on the income Mining/Staking/Salary 24% to 47% Taxed as general income Wealth Tax 0.2% ‚Äì 3.75% (if net wealth exceeds region threshold) Exceeding ‚Ç¨700,000 Capital Gains Tax Brackets for 2025 Up to ‚Ç¨6,000 ‚Äì 19% ‚Ç¨6,001 ‚Äì ‚Ç¨50,000 ‚Äì 21% ‚Ç¨50,001 ‚Äì ‚Ç¨200,000 ‚Äì 23% ‚Ç¨200,001 ‚Äì ‚Ç¨300,000 ‚Äì 27% Above ‚Ç¨300,000 ‚Äì 28% Crypto Adoption in Spain 2025 Penetration Rate: Currently, the crypto user penetration rate is 50.97% , which is expected to increase up to 53.08% in 2026. As the MiCA compliance is anticipated from January 1, 2026, the number of crypto users is expected to reach 25.14 million. Crypto Revenue: The average revenue per user in Spain is estimated to be US$54.3, totaling US$1.3 billion in 2025. The crypto market is predicted to show a growth of 85.27%, resulting in total crypto revenue of US$2.4bn by 2026. Crypto Holdings: No public disclosure of the Spanish government‚Äôs crypto holdings; it rather prioritizes strengthening its control over the crypto space in the country. Conclusion Spain is already seeing a growth in adoption rate, as the government has intensified the security measures for crypto. It currently ranks among the top five EU nations for blockchain adoption and is globally known as a popular fintech hub. But the government is improving the regulations further to terminate the crypto fraud altogether in the country. So, from January 1, 2026, the entire landscape of cryptocurrency and other digital assets with change in Spain. .article_register_shortcode { padding: 18px 24px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 6px 0 22px; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, rgba(0, 82, 204, 0.1) 100%); } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { color: #000000; font-weight: 600; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 span { color: #0052CC; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; color: #171717B2; margin-top: 4px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body{ padding-right: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: right; } .article_register_shortcode .primary-button img{ vertical-align: middle; width: 20px; margin: 0; display: inline-block; } @media (min-width: 581px) and (max-width: 991px) { .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { margin-bottom: 0; } } @media (max-width: 580px) { .article_register_shortcode { display: block; padding: 20px; } .article_register_shortcode img { max-width: 50px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { font-size: 16px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body { margin-left: 0px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-size: 13px; line-height: 20px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: unset; } .article_register_shortcode .secondary-button { margin-bottom: 0; } } Never Miss a Beat in the Crypto World! if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } }); FAQs Is Spain considered a crypto-friendly country? Yes, Spain is considered a crypto-friendly country in 2025. It has clear regulations for legal trading, mining, and use of cryptocurrencies, though these activities are subject to taxation and oversight. How much is the crypto tax in Spain? Crypto capital gains tax in Spain ranges from 19% to 28% depending on the profit. Income from mining, staking, or crypto salaries is taxed as general income, from 24% to 47%. What is the crypto adoption rate in Spain? The crypto user penetration rate in Spain is currently 50.97% and is projected to reach 53.08% by 2026, with an estimated 25.14 million crypto users after MiCA full compliance. Will Spain be considered a crypto haven country? While crypto-friendly, Spain is not considered a ‚Äúcrypto haven‚Äù due to its comprehensive tax framework, including capital gains, income, and wealth taxes on crypto. Countries like El Salvador or Portugal (for long-term holders) offer more tax advantages.
