title: Nvidia's Jensen Huang becomes Trump's new ally in Silicon Valley
body: Donald Trump has a new favorite in Silicon Valley, and it‚Äôs Jensen Huang, the CEO of Nvidia, who‚Äôs managed to climb straight to the top of Washington‚Äôs tech power ladder in Trump‚Äôs cabinet. According to CNBC, Jensen has overtaken Elon Musk, Mark Zuck, and Tim Cook in both influence and access, using Nvidia‚Äôs global dominance in AI chips to get the president‚Äôs ear and change decisions that affect billions in trade. Jensen‚Äôs rising political clout came into full view when Nvidia revealed during his recent visit to Beijing that it would soon restart sales of its previously banned H20 AI chips to China. That announcement came just days after Jensen met Trump in Washington, D.C., where he continued pushing a message he‚Äôs been repeating all year: that restricting American chips gives Chinese companies the upper hand . His meetings with Trump have become frequent. He even joined the president on a May trip to the United Arab Emirates, which ended with a massive chip deal sending hundreds of thousands of Nvidia GPUs to the Gulf nation, a decision that also boxed out Huawei. Jensen flips H20 export ban and pressures White House The H20 chips were blocked earlier this year under U.S. trade rules targeting advanced tech exports to China. Jensen publicly lobbied against that decision. Dan Ives, a senior analyst at Wedbush, told CNBC, ‚ÄúIt was a historic win for Nvidia and Jensen ‚Ä¶ and I think it shows the increasing political influence that Huang‚Äôs having within the Trump administration.‚Äù Behind closed doors, Jensen pushed the same line to officials at the White House. Paul Triolo, head of China and tech policy at DGA-Albright Stonebridge Group, said Huang‚Äôs arguments matched those of David Sacks, Trump‚Äôs lead adviser on AI and crypto. ‚ÄúSacks and Huang both argue that limiting exports of U.S. technology such as select and non-cutting-edge GPUs to China risks pushing Chinese companies to use domestic alternatives,‚Äù Triolo told CNBC. ‚ÄúAt the end of the day, this argument likely carried the day on the H20 issue.‚Äù Even if Nvidia doesn‚Äôt restart full production of the H20s, simply unloading its existing stockpile will be a win. The company took a $4.5 billion hit in May from unsold inventory. Selling those chips would recover lost revenue and keep Chinese customers from walking away. Jensen made the company‚Äôs position clear last week, saying, ‚ÄúEvery civil AI model should run on the U.S. technology stack,‚Äù as he announced Nvidia‚Äôs plan to resume H20 sales. Jensen‚Äôs ability to pull off a reversal of that scale while operating between Beijing and D.C. has stunned even veteran tech watchers. Dan said, ‚ÄúHuang has become a global figure and taken on a new role politically due to his success in the AI revolution.‚Äù He added that Nvidia‚Äôs central role in the AI market has ‚Äúvaulted him ahead of Cook.‚Äù Trump cools on Cook as Nvidia dominates AI space During Trump‚Äôs first term, Tim Cook worked the system perfectly. Apple thrived in China, dodged tariffs, and Cook played diplomat-in-chief for the U.S. tech sector. But that playbook isn‚Äôt working anymore. After Trump got reelected, Cook‚Äôs influence took a hit, and it keeps slipping. Despite Apple announcing a $500 billion U.S. investment back in February, Trump said in May that he had a ‚Äúlittle problem with Tim Cook‚Äù over Apple moving production to India. That comment came as the U.S. and China ramped up fresh trade tensions. Trump‚Äôs adviser Peter Navarro also slammed Cook, saying Apple wasn‚Äôt moving out of China fast enough. That criticism came while Apple was already trying to move more iPhone production to India to limit its China exposure. Apple‚Äôs drop in political favor is happening at the same time as Nvidia‚Äôs rise. The market also flipped. Apple lost its title as the most valuable U.S. company, and Nvidia took it. While Musk had once been expected to take the lead role with Trump, the relationship between him and the White House reportedly soured just two months ago. Commentators had initially said his connections in both Washington and China might help shape trade policy. But after a very public fallout, Musk was no longer in the picture. That left an opening, and Jensen took it. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: Why Is Crypto Down Today? ‚Äì July 22, 2025
body: With a drop of 4.6% over the last 24 hours, the cryptocurrency market capitalization has dipped below the recently conquered $4 trillion, now standing at $3.99 trillion. Overall, the market is down today, with the large majority of the top 100 coins per market capitalization decreasing. At the same time, the total crypto trading volume is at $269 billion, still maintaining similar levels to those seen over the past week. TLDR: Crypto market cap dipped below $4 trillion; Majority of top 100 coins are red; BTC and ETH are down today, trading at $117,854 and $3,692; ETH outperforms BTC in weekly increases: 20% vs 1%; Solana is the only green coin among the top 10 per market cap; Market sentiment remains in the greed zone; US BTC spot ETFs broke a green streak with $131 million in outflows; US ETH spot ETFs continue positive flows with 12 straight days of inflows; We are in the 5th and final wave of the bull market; There seems to be ‚Äúgenuine institutional adoption,‚Äù and ‚Äúnot speculative fever‚Äù. Crypto Winners & Losers Over the past 24 hours, at the time of writing, only one of the top 10 coins per market cap is green. Bitcoin (BTC) fell by 1.2% in this period to the price of $117,854. While it decreased below $118,000, it‚Äôs holding firmly above $117,500. Also, Ethereum (ETH) fell by 2.7%, currently trading at $3,692. The price is still on track towards the $4,000 mark. The highest drop is 3.2% by Dogecoin (DOGE) . It‚Äôs now trading at $0.2647. The only green coin on this list is Solana (SOL) . It appreciated 5.1%, currently changing hands at $198.97. In the top 100 coins category, Kaspa (KAS) is the highest gainer. It‚Äôs up 9.8% to the price of $0.1153. Jupiter (JUP) follows with an increase of 8.6%, now trading at $0.6531. Most coins, however, recorded price decreases today. Pump.fun (PUMP) saw a double-digit drop of 13.1% to $0.003751. SPX6900 (SPX) follows, with a 6.7% fall to the price of $1.84. The capital flowing out of Bitcoin ETFs, as discussed below, could suggest lowered institutional appetite, though likely a short-term one. This appetite is likely dampened by concerns around global tariffs and trade tensions, particularly as the 1 August deadline approaches when the US may slap massive tariffs on its trade partners, push the deadline, or change its mind again. Meanwhile, JPMorgan Chase is reportedly looking into l ending against clients‚Äô Bitcoin and Ethereum holdings starting next year. Lending against crypto would let users pledge their BTC and ETH holdings to borrow loans. JPMorgan's head, Jamie Dimon, confirmed that the bank will soon let clients buy Bitcoin but not custody it. #JPMorgan #Bitcoin #JamieDimon https://t.co/ZdCOy8Q1ou ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) May 20, 2025 ‚ÄòBull Market Will End by 2026 with BTC at $140,000‚Äô John Glover, Chief Investment Officer of Ledn , recently commented that price action continued to support the wave count he discussed for the last few years. We are in the 5 th and final wave of the bull market, as the chart below shows. It should complete towards the end of 2025 or early 2026, at a BTC price of some $136,000 to $140,000, he said. ‚ÄúSo while people will be worried about where the bear market will take us in 2026, my view is that this is not something to worry about today, as there is still additional upside to BTC prices in this bull market! Stay focused on participating in and enjoying the ride higher until the end of the year.‚Äù However, he warns that if BTC trades below $112,000 in the short term, we could see another test of $100,000 before the next move up. ‚ÄúBut this is a low probability outcome in my view,‚Äù Glover argues. Source: Ledn Moreover, Werner Br√∂nnimann, Investment Manager at crypto bank AMINA , commented that Bitcoin‚Äôs recent push to over $123,000 and breaching $4 trillion market cap appears to represent a fundamental shift in market dynamics. This shift is driven primarily by institutional capital, not ‚Äúthe retail-led manias of previous cycles.‚Äù Now, there seems to be ‚Äúgenuine institutional adoption,‚Äù and ‚Äúnot speculative fever.‚Äù Moreover, we‚Äôre seeing sustained inflows from pension funds and corporate treasuries, not social media-driven FOMO (fear of missing out), Br√∂nnimann says. Still, ‚Äúdespite Bitcoin‚Äôs remarkable performance, the market is not officially in ‚ÄòAltcoin Season‚Äô yet,‚Äù he adds. That said, the macro environment could still challenge BTC‚Äôs trajectory regardless of institutional adoption, says Br√∂nnimann. Regulatory clarity supports institutional inflows, but BTC remains sensitive to monetary policy shifts. ‚ÄúAggressive [US Federal Reserve] tightening in response to tariff-driven inflation could override even strong institutional demand.‚Äù Therefore, ‚Äúthis dynamic underscores Bitcoin‚Äôs evolution as institutional money continues to flow into the asset class: it is no longer an alternative asset with its purely idiosyncratic return drivers, but to an extent behaves like a risk-on asset,‚Äù Br√∂nnimann concludes. Levels & Events to Watch Next At the time of writing, BTC trades at $117,854. The coin began a decline $119,523, reaching the lowest point today of $116,787. It then resumed a climb to the current level. The price is up 1.1% over the past seven days. Investors are watching for BTC to retake the $118,000 level first, before proceeding to $118,900 and $119,500. However, it may still also drop to $116,000 and into the $115,000 zone after that. Bitcoin Price Chart. Source: TradingView Moreover, Ethereum is currently trading at $3,692. It‚Äôs currently slightly above its intraday low of $3,679. Its highest peak over the past day was $3,848. Notably, the coin is up 24.4% over the week. Market participants are waiting to see if the price will move above $3,900, potentially signaling a future surge towards $4,000. Otherwise, it may revisit the low $3,600s, followed by a dip into the $3,590 territory. Furthermore, the crypto market sentiment remains within greed territory, but it has dropped slightly over the past three days. The Fear and Greed Index decreased from 71 on Friday to 68 today . This number still signals a positive outlook on the market and incoming developments. There are currently no indications of the market being overbought. That said, a correction is possible. Meanwhile, on 21 July, the US BTC spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) recorded outflows, breaking a 12-day streak. It saw $131.35 million in outflows. The amounts have been declining over the past three days. BlackRock recorded no flows on Monday, there were no inflows, and the larger outflow is Ark&21Shares‚Äô $77.46 million. On the other hand, US ETH ETFs saw positive flows for the twelfth day in a row. It recorded inflows of $296.59 million on Monday. Fidelity is the highest gainer, with $126.93 million in inflows. BlackRock follows with $101.98 million. 21Shares saw outflows of $374,050. Meanwhile, Western Union showed strong interest in utilizing stablecoins to modernize its global remittance operations. CEO Devin McGranahan argued that stablecoins could streamline cross-border transfers, improve currency conversion in underserved markets, and provide financial tools for populations dealing with unstable local currencies. ‚ÄúWe see stablecoins really as an opportunity, not as a threat,‚Äù McGranahan said. WESTERN UNION CEO: "WE'RE INVESTIGATING HOW WE MIGHT OFFER STABLECOIN PRODUCTS IN OUR DIGITAL WALLETS TO OUR CUSTOMERS AROUND THE WORLD," pic.twitter.com/UsFPpGN6tQ ‚Äî The Wolf Of All Streets (@scottmelker) July 22, 2025 Furthermore, crypto custody firm BitGo confidentially filed for a public listing in the US. The number of shares and price range are not yet disclosed. Also, the move follows an increase in regulatory clarity and institutional inflows. In South Korea, prosecutors are investigating a possible connection between the former First Lady Kim Keon-Hee and a crypto market maker suspected of manipulating the prices of low-cap altcoins. A special counsel team investigating allegations involving former first lady Kim Keon Hee is set to summon her and former President Yoon Suk Yeol for questioning. https://t.co/wF8WuStt3p ‚Äî The Korea JoongAng Daily (@JoongAngDaily) July 21, 2025 Quick FAQ Why did crypto move against stocks today? While the crypto market is mostly down over the past 24 hours, the stock market closed with a mixed performance on Monday. The S&P 500 is up by 0.14%, the Nasdaq-100 increased by 0.5%, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average is down by 0.0.043%. Market participants are now anticipating further tariff-related developments. Notably, the news will arrive soon on trade deals, as the 1 August deadline approaches when the US said it would impose massive tariffs on its trade partners. Is this dip sustainable? This appears to be a typical pullback. Overall, the rally is expected to continue, with BTC and ETH expected to rise further this year. You may also like: (LIVE) Crypto News Today: Latest Updates for July 22, 2025 Swedish gaming company Fragbite Group has launched a Bitcoin treasury strategy by purchasing 4.3 Bitcoin at an average price of $112,958 per coin, becoming the latest European firm to adopt cryptocurrency as a primary reserve asset amid a global wave of corporate adoption.The company raised an additional 6 million Swedish krona ($630,000) through an interest-free convertible loan to fund further Bitcoin purchases, with conversion rights triggered if shares exceed the SEK 13 conversion... The post Why Is Crypto Down Today? ‚Äì July 22, 2025 appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Tron outperformed Bitcoin without an altseason
body: Tron (TRX) is emerging as an unexpected frontrunner in the crypto market‚Äôs latest rotation, outperforming Bitcoin (BTC) since March, prompting analysts to consider whether a more selective form of altseason is already underway. New data from blockchain analytics firms CryptoQuant and Nansen shows TRX is gaining momentum amid a broader consolidation of Bitcoin‚Äôs market dominance. While BTC continues to lead institutional flows, the recent decoupling of TRX from Bitcoin‚Äôs price action has triggered renewed discussion about altcoin market cycles, though with a more tempered outlook than in past bull runs. ‚ÄúWe might not see a broad altseason in 2025,‚Äù a CryptoQuant analyst wrote in a recent post . ‚ÄúInstead, a selected group of ‚Äòpremium‚Äô altcoins will likely outperform Bitcoin.‚Äù TRX decouples from BTC amid strong network activity Tron‚Äôs recent outperformance is not just speculative; it‚Äôs backed by on-chain data. In the past 24 hours alone, the network registered over 2.55 million active addresses (up 12.6%) and more than 9 million daily transactions (up 15.6%) in the early hours of Tuesday, July 22, according to analytics platform Nansen. That level of throughput places Tron ahead of many layer 1 competitors in terms of usage and consistency. Tron‚Äôs 24-hour transactions and active address data. Source: Nansen . ‚ÄúStable, consistent, and busy,‚Äù Nansen wrote in a post summarizing Tron‚Äôs real-time activity metrics. At the time of concluding this story, there have been some significant movements on Tron‚Äôs chain growth data as captured by Nansen, with the transaction volume being roughly 3% down. It now has 2.54 million active addresses (up 11.07%) and 8.99 million daily transactions (up 12.07%) over the past 24 hours. CryptoQuant notes that the price correlation between TRX and BTC, which had remained relatively tight earlier this year, has now ‚Äúdecoupled,‚Äù a technical shift that often precedes a redistribution of capital into higher-beta altcoins. This divergence is comparable to similar setups observed in previous altcoin rallies, such as those in 2017 and 2021. Correlation and divergence of Bitcoin and Tron price & volume. Source: CryptoQuant . However, unlike in past cycles where capital indiscriminately rotated across dozens of tokens, this time, the capital appears more focused. A narrower, more selective altseason One key difference in this cycle, according to analysts, is the muted retail participation and the absence of a traditional ‚Äúaltseason‚Äù where nearly all non-BTC tokens rally simultaneously. Instead, market observers expect a handful of altcoins, like TRX, to lead based on utility, network usage, and stablecoin integrations. Indeed, TRX‚Äôs daily transaction count now rivals that of Ethereum and Solana. Much of this activity is powered by USDT (Tether) stablecoin transfers, with Tron accounting for over 50% of all Tether volume. That utility has underpinned TRX‚Äôs latest breakout above key resistance levels. Despite TRX‚Äôs bullish momentum, analysts caution that Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance remains above 50%, which may delay or disrupt full-scale altcoin rallies, according to analysts. Ethereum and Solana continue to attract institutional narratives around real-world assets (RWAs) and tokenized securities, but TRX is carving out its niche by delivering sustained activity without the congestion or high fees plaguing its rivals. Still, skeptics remain. Tron‚Äôs reputation has been marred in past years by regulatory scrutiny surrounding founder Justin Sun, and its DeFi ecosystem lacks the composability and capital depth of Ethereum‚Äôs. Yet the raw numbers suggest TRX is one of the few tokens bucking Bitcoin‚Äôs gravitational pull, and doing so with considerable consistency. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: Western Union Bets on Stablecoins to Revive Global Remittance Dominance
body: The post Western Union Bets on Stablecoins to Revive Global Remittance Dominance appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Western Union, the world‚Äôs oldest name in money transfers, is now betting on stablecoins to keep its place in the changing financial world. Faced with rising competition and dropping revenues, the company is taking bold steps to blend old-school money transfers with modern digital coins. But is it too late, or just the beginning of something bigger? New Plans for a Faster, Cheaper Future Western Union‚Äôs CEO, Devin McGranahan, made it clear this week that stablecoins are not a threat but an opportunity. In a recent interview, he explained how the company wants to let people buy and sell stablecoins through its own platform. By doing this, they hope to cut costs, speed up transfers, and help people move money across borders without the usual banking delays. They‚Äôre already testing new settlement systems in places like South America and Africa regions where people often need fast ways to turn digital dollars into local cash. For many, stablecoins could be a safe place to store money as local currencies lose value. Stablecoins Shake Up Legacy Remittances It‚Äôs no secret that traditional money movers like Western Union and MoneyGram have been feeling the heat. New players like Wise and Remitly brought cheaper, online-only options that ate into their market share. Stablecoins, with their speed, low transaction costs, and liquidity, have increasingly disrupted the traditional remittance industry Meanwhile, the company‚Äôs decision comes amid a 22% drop in Western Union app downloads and a 6% decline in Q1 2025 revenue to $984 million. Even MoneyGram saw this coming and launched its own MoneyGram Wallet last year, which lets people send USDC stablecoins and pick up cash in over 180 countries. Regulation Clears the Path Industry experts say legacy players must adapt to survive, and now is the perfect time as President Trump‚Äôs new GENIUS Act brings clear rules for stablecoins in the US.. With better regulations, big banks and legacy payment companies like Western Union finally feel ready to jump in. With the stablecoin market cap hitting a record $262 billion , Western Union‚Äôs move may be its strongest step yet toward staying relevant in the rapidly evolving payments landscape.

title: Crypto Investor: $1,000 Per XRP Can Create a New Level of Elites to Transform the World
body: Ripple‚Äôs XRP is currently trading around $3.49, with a market capitalization of approximately $205 billion and daily trading volume near $10 billion. These numbers reflect a strong recovery and growing investor confidence, especially following Ripple‚Äôs legal victory over the SEC and renewed institutional interest. Still, some in the crypto community envision far more dramatic price levels and profound implications for the world. In a recent post on X, prominent crypto investor King Karan shared a bold perspective: ‚Äú$1,000 per XRP can create a new level of elites that will do good things for the world compared to the old elites that are destroying it.‚Äù His statement reflects a belief that wealth created through decentralized finance can empower a new generation, one guided by innovation, transparency, and global equity. $1000 per $XRP can create a new level of elites that will do good things for the world compared to the old elites that are destroying it. Think about it. ‚Äî ùïÇùïöùïüùïò ùïÇùïíùï£ùïíùïü (@KingKaranCrypto) July 21, 2025 A $1,000 XRP: Dream or Delusion? While King Karan‚Äôs vision taps into the ethos of crypto‚Äôs disruptive potential, the numbers tell a more restrained story. XRP has a circulating supply of around 59.2 billion tokens. At $1,000 per token , the asset‚Äôs total market capitalization would reach $59 trillion, a figure that exceeds the current GDP of the entire world. For context, Apple, the world‚Äôs most valuable company, holds a market cap of just over $3 trillion. Even Bitcoin, the market‚Äôs leading digital asset, sits at around $2.3 trillion. From a financial standpoint, a $1,000 valuation for XRP is extraordinarily unlikely under the current global economic structure. Analysts widely agree that reaching such a figure would require a complete overhaul of the world‚Äôs monetary systems, including full-scale tokenization of global assets on the XRP Ledger, a scenario that remains far from reality. Realistic Targets and Market Trajectory Despite the improbability of four-figure XRP, short- to mid-term projections remain optimistic. Technical analysts, bolstered by recent bullish chart formations and the launch of an XRP ETF , are targeting levels between $5.25 and $6.19 in the coming months. Standard Chartered and other institutional observers have echoed similar outlooks, citing Ripple‚Äôs increasing enterprise partnerships and growing use of XRP in cross-border payments. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Ripple‚Äôs continued progress in tokenizing real-world assets, particularly U.S. Treasuries, and its pivotal role in shaping regulatory frameworks further support the asset‚Äôs bullish outlook. Legal clarity following the SEC case and increased global adoption have helped cement XRP as a serious contender in the race for institutional-grade blockchain solutions. A New Class of Builders King Karan‚Äôs vision isn‚Äôt solely about price; it‚Äôs about what that price represents. To him, a $1,000 XRP would symbolize the rise of a new financial class: decentralized, globally connected, and committed to positive change. Whether or not XRP ever sees such valuation, the larger idea resonates with many in the crypto space: that blockchain wealth could be used not just for profit, but to reshape legacy systems for the better. Whether XRP reaches $1,000 or not doesn‚Äôt invalidate the transformative vision King Karan describes. With the asset gaining ground, reaching new all-time highs, and playing a central role in a rapidly evolving digital economy, it‚Äôs clear that XRP holders and the ideals they represent will increasingly shape the future of finance. title: Bitcoin Whale Unveiled: Colossal $35.61 Million Deposit Shakes Binance
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Whale Unveiled: Colossal $35.61 Million Deposit Shakes Binance The cryptocurrency world is often described as the wild west of finance, a realm where fortunes are made and lost in the blink of an eye. Amidst this volatility, certain entities command immense attention: the anonymous giants known as ‚ÄòBitcoin Whales‚Äô. These holders of vast amounts of cryptocurrency can, with a single transaction, send ripples‚Äîor even tidal waves‚Äîthrough the entire market. Recently, the crypto community buzzed with news of just such a move, as an anonymous Bitcoin Whale executed a significant deposit to Binance, one of the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchanges. This event isn‚Äôt just a number; it‚Äôs a potential signal, a whisper from the depths of the market that demands our attention. What Just Happened? The Latest Bitcoin Whale Movement In a move that captured the immediate attention of on-chain analysts, an anonymous Bitcoin Whale recently deposited an additional 300 BTC into Binance Exchange. This significant transfer, valued at approximately $35.61 million at the time of the transaction, wasn‚Äôt just a standalone event. It brought the whale‚Äôs total holdings on the exchange to a staggering 800 BTC, now valued at an impressive $95 million. According to insights shared by Onchain Lens on X, this particular whale has already realized an astounding profit of $93.33 million from their Bitcoin holdings. Latest Deposit: 300 BTC ($35.61 million) Total Holdings on Binance: 800 BTC ($95 million) Realized Profit by the Whale: $93.33 million Such a large deposit to an exchange like Binance immediately raises questions. Is this a strategic move to take profits after a substantial gain? Or is it a repositioning for future trades, perhaps to capitalize on anticipated market shifts? Understanding the implications of such a move requires a deeper dive into the world of these enigmatic market participants. Decoding the Bitcoin Whale: Who Are These Market Movers? The term ‚Äò Bitcoin Whale ‚Äò refers to an individual or entity that holds a substantial amount of Bitcoin. While there‚Äôs no universally agreed-upon threshold, typically, wallets holding 1,000 BTC or more are considered whale wallets. However, even those with hundreds of BTC, like our anonymous depositor, exert considerable influence due to the sheer volume of their holdings relative to the overall market liquidity. These whales can be early adopters who accumulated Bitcoin when it was mere pennies, institutional investors, mining pools, or even cryptocurrency exchanges themselves. Their movements are closely watched because a large transaction can significantly impact market dynamics, either by increasing selling pressure (if they‚Äôre depositing to sell) or signaling accumulation (if they‚Äôre withdrawing to cold storage). Different types of whales often exhibit distinct behaviors, each with potential market implications: Type of Whale Characteristic Behavior Potential Market Impact Early Adopter Whales Often long-term holders (HODLers) with a very low cost basis. May move funds for profit-taking after significant price rallies. Large sell-offs can create temporary price dips or corrections. Institutional Whales Large investment firms, hedge funds, or corporations. Moves are often strategic and driven by broader financial mandates. Significant accumulation can signal growing institutional confidence; large distributions might indicate risk-off sentiment. Exchange Whales Funds held by cryptocurrency exchanges themselves, managing user deposits and withdrawals. Large internal movements are usually for operational purposes (e.g., rebalancing hot/cold wallets) and less indicative of market sentiment. Trader Whales Active participants engaging in frequent large-volume trades. Can contribute to short-term volatility, creating flash pumps or dumps. Why Does a Bitcoin Whale‚Äôs Move on Binance Matter? The choice of exchange for such a substantial deposit is crucial. Binance, being the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, possesses immense liquidity. When a Bitcoin Whale deposits a significant amount of BTC onto Binance, it typically signals an intent to sell or engage in high-volume trading. This influx of Bitcoin into an exchange‚Äôs available supply can, in theory, increase selling pressure. Here‚Äôs why it matters: Potential Selling Pressure: A large deposit increases the amount of Bitcoin available for sale on the open market. If the whale decides to sell all or part of their holdings, it could lead to a sudden increase in supply, potentially driving the price down if demand doesn‚Äôt match. Market Sentiment: Such moves often trigger speculation among traders and investors. The community tries to decipher the whale‚Äôs intentions, which can lead to fear (FUD) or excitement (FOMO), influencing short-term market sentiment. Liquidity Impact: While Binance has deep liquidity, a colossal sell order from a whale can still create a ‚Äòsell wall‚Äô that temporarily halts upward price momentum or even pushes prices lower. It‚Äôs a delicate balance of supply and demand, and a whale‚Äôs decision to move assets to an exchange is always a point of intense observation. On-Chain Analytics: Peeking into the Bitcoin Whale‚Äôs Wallet How do we even know about these anonymous transactions? This is where the power of on-chain analytics comes into play. Bitcoin‚Äôs blockchain is a public, immutable ledger. Every transaction, every wallet address (though pseudonymous), and every movement of BTC is recorded and verifiable by anyone. Tools and platforms like Onchain Lens specialize in analyzing this vast amount of data. On-chain analysts track large transactions, monitor the flow of Bitcoin into and out of exchanges, identify dormant wallets that suddenly become active, and observe patterns in whale behavior. While the identity of the Bitcoin Whale remains unknown, their actions are laid bare for those with the right tools and expertise to interpret. The transparency offered by blockchain technology, paradoxically, allows us to observe the actions of anonymous giants. This provides valuable insights into market dynamics, helping traders and investors make more informed decisions, rather than relying solely on price charts or news headlines. Navigating the Waters: What This Means for Your Bitcoin Investments For the average investor, observing a large Bitcoin Whale deposit can be both fascinating and concerning. It‚Äôs natural to wonder if this signals an imminent market downturn or a strategic play that you should mimic. However, it‚Äôs crucial to approach such information with a balanced perspective and not to react impulsively. Here are some actionable insights: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): While whale movements provide data points, they are not the sole determinant of market direction. Understand the broader market trends, macroeconomic factors, and Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamentals. Avoid Blindly Following: A whale‚Äôs move might be part of a larger, complex strategy that doesn‚Äôt align with your investment goals or risk tolerance. They might be taking profits, rebalancing their portfolio, or even preparing for an OTC (over-the-counter) deal that won‚Äôt impact the public market. Focus on Long-Term Strategy: Short-term fluctuations driven by large individual transactions are common in crypto. A well-thought-out long-term investment strategy, coupled with risk management principles like dollar-cost averaging and diversification, often yields better results than chasing every whale‚Äôs move. Risk Management is Key: Never invest more than you can afford to lose. Set stop-loss orders if you are trading, and ensure your portfolio is diversified across different assets to mitigate risk. Consider this whale‚Äôs move as one piece of a much larger puzzle, providing context rather than dictating your next step. The Challenges and Opportunities of Tracking a Bitcoin Whale Tracking the movements of a Bitcoin Whale presents both unique challenges and significant opportunities for those in the crypto space. Challenges: Anonymity: Despite on-chain transparency, the true identity and specific motivations behind a whale‚Äôs move remain unknown. This makes predicting their next step or the exact impact of their current action difficult. Misinterpretation: A large deposit might not always mean a sell-off. It could be for internal transfers, providing liquidity to a new trading pair, or even preparing for an OTC deal that won‚Äôt hit the public order books. Market Manipulation: In some cases, large moves could be part of a coordinated effort to manipulate market sentiment or prices, making it risky to blindly follow. Opportunities: Early Signals: Observing large movements can provide early indications of potential supply shifts, allowing astute traders to anticipate changes in market dynamics. Market Understanding: Tracking whales helps in understanding the flow of capital within the crypto ecosystem, providing insights into where big money is moving. Refined Strategy: For active traders, incorporating whale movements into their technical and fundamental analysis can help refine entry and exit points, though always with caution. Ultimately, while fascinating, whale tracking should be viewed as a supplementary tool in a comprehensive investment strategy, not the sole guiding principle. Conclusion: Navigating the Depths of the Crypto Ocean The recent deposit of 300 BTC by an anonymous Bitcoin Whale into Binance serves as a powerful reminder of the significant influence that large holders wield in the cryptocurrency market. Their actions, though often shrouded in anonymity, are transparently recorded on the blockchain, offering a glimpse into the forces shaping Bitcoin‚Äôs price action and overall market sentiment. This colossal profit-taking move highlights both the immense wealth generation potential of Bitcoin and the ever-present dynamics of supply and demand. For investors, the key takeaway is not to panic or blindly follow, but to understand the mechanics behind such events. By leveraging on-chain analytics as a source of information, alongside robust fundamental and technical analysis, individuals can make more informed, strategic decisions. The crypto ocean is vast and full of powerful currents; understanding them is crucial to navigating it successfully and responsibly. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What exactly is a Bitcoin Whale? A Bitcoin Whale is an individual or entity that holds a very large amount of Bitcoin, typically enough to influence market prices with their transactions. While there‚Äôs no official definition, it often refers to wallets holding 1,000 BTC or more, though significant holders with fewer coins can also be considered influential. 2. Why do Bitcoin Whale deposits to exchanges matter? Depositing large amounts of Bitcoin to an exchange often indicates an intent to sell or trade. This increases the available supply on the market, which can potentially lead to increased selling pressure and a temporary price dip if demand doesn‚Äôt absorb the supply. 3. How can I track Bitcoin Whale movements? You can track Bitcoin Whale movements using on-chain analytics platforms and tools. These platforms analyze public blockchain data to identify large transactions, wallet flows, and exchange deposits/withdrawals. Popular services often share these insights on social media or dedicated dashboards. 4. Should I follow a Bitcoin Whale‚Äôs actions when investing? While it‚Äôs useful to be aware of whale movements for market context, it‚Äôs generally not advisable to blindly follow their actions. Whales have different financial goals, risk tolerances, and strategies than individual investors. Their moves could be part of complex plans, including OTC deals or rebalancing, which may not directly impact the public market as expected. 5. What is Binance‚Äôs role in these large transactions? Binance is one of the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchanges, known for its deep liquidity. Its role is to facilitate the buying and selling of cryptocurrencies. Large deposits to Binance mean that the whale intends to use the exchange‚Äôs trading services, whether for selling, trading pairs, or other strategic financial maneuvers. 6. Is this whale‚Äôs profit typical for large Bitcoin holders? The $93.33 million profit realized by this anonymous whale is substantial and not typical for most investors. Such profits are usually achieved by early adopters who held Bitcoin for many years, acquiring it at very low prices, or by entities with significant capital that made large, well-timed investments. It highlights the potential, but also the long-term nature, of significant Bitcoin appreciation. If you found this analysis insightful, consider sharing it with your network! Understanding the market‚Äôs biggest players helps everyone navigate the crypto landscape more effectively. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Bitcoin Whale Unveiled: Colossal $35.61 Million Deposit Shakes Binance first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Will Scott Bessent Replace Powell as Fed Chair? $2.5B Fed Fallout Sparks Speculation
body: The post Will Scott Bessent Replace Powell as Fed Chair? $2.5B Fed Fallout Sparks Speculation appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent has reignited scrutiny of the Federal Reserve, urging a deep review of its operations beyond monetary policy. His sharp criticism, shared in a post on X, warns that the central bank‚Äôs growing involvement in non-core functions could threaten its independence. Fed‚Äôs Expanding Role Sparks Debate Bessent‚Äôs remarks come at a time when political pressure on the Federal Reserve is intensifying. He described the Fed‚Äôs monetary policy as a ‚Äújewel box‚Äù‚Äîa delicate instrument critical to U.S. economic stability but argued that its reach into broader areas has led to ‚Äúmandate creep.‚Äù ‚ÄúThe Fed‚Äôs autonomy is threatened by persistent mandate creep into areas beyond its core mission,‚Äù Bessent warned. His comments have triggered renewed debate about the Fed‚Äôs priorities, financial decisions, and the broader implications for America‚Äôs economic future. Controversy Over $2.5 Billion Renovation One of Bessent‚Äôs major concerns centers around the Federal Reserve‚Äôs $2.5 billion headquarters renovation project in Washington, D.C. Originally approved in 2017 during Donald Trump‚Äôs presidency, the project has since drawn sharp criticism over cost overruns and scope. President Trump has labeled the project as potentially fraudulent and called for Fed Chair Jerome Powell‚Äôs resignation. While Bessent stopped short of a legal assessment, he questioned the optics of such a costly upgrade during a time of financial strain and operating losses at the Fed. Powell‚Äôs Position Secure ‚Äì For Now Despite the criticism, Powell‚Äôs job appears secure, thanks to a recent Supreme Court ruling that clarified the Fed chair can only be removed ‚Äúfor cause,‚Äù not over policy disagreements. His current term runs through May 2026. In response to the backlash, Powell defended the renovation as necessary, citing infrastructure deterioration, safety upgrades, and removal of hazardous materials. Meanwhile, Bessent, seen as a possible successor to Powell, sidestepped questions about whether he advised Trump against firing the chair. He stated that such decisions ultimately rest with the president. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Federal Housing Director Signals Possible Powell Resignation Coming Soon , A Broader Call for Oversight and Efficiency Speaking with CNBC, Bessent drew parallels between the Fed‚Äôs recent missteps and operational errors seen in agencies like the FAA. He questioned whether the central bank, despite its ‚ÄúPhDs and Ivy League talent,‚Äù is truly functioning efficiently. ‚ÄúIf this were the FAA and we were having this many mistakes, we would go back and look at why,‚Äù he noted. What‚Äôs Next for the Fed? if (showDownloadReport) { showDownloadReport.style.display = 'block'; } } } catch (e) { console.error('Error parsing response:', e); } }, }); } function closeModal(template_id) { var modalId = template_id; var modal = document.querySelector('#' + modalId); // Using querySelector to find the modal if (modal) { modal.classList.add('hide'); modal.classList.remove('show'); setTimeout(function() { modal.style.display = 'none'; }, 500); } else { console.warn('Modal not found:', modalId); } } function closeunsubscribemodal() { var unsubscribemodal = document.querySelector('.unsubscribed-popup-modal .modal'); if (unsubscribemodal) { unsubscribemodal.classList.add('hide'); localStorage.setItem('subscribe_clicked_id', withoutlogin_id); } document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { const subscribewithoutData = localStorage.getItem('subscribe_without_Login'); const subscribe_clicked_cat_id = localStorage.getItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); // Function to get cookies function getCookie(name) { let value = "; " + document.cookie; let parts = value.split("; " + name + "="); if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift(); } // Get user token from cookies const userToken = getCookie('user_token'); if (subscribewithoutData === 'true' && userToken) { // Call the modal function with the category ID subscribed_popupmodal(subscribe_clicked_cat_id); // Remove the flag and category ID from localStorage localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_without_Login'); localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); } }); /************************** update susbcriber content **************************** */ function initializeSubscriptionButton() { var initialListItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options input[type="checkbox"]'); initialListItems.forEach(function(item) { console.log(item.checked, 'Initial Checkbox checked status'); }); var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); } function updateButtonText(anyActive) { var subscribeButtonSpan = document.querySelector('.subscribe-submit .changeBtnText'); if (subscribeButtonSpan) { if (anyActive) { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Subscribe Now'; } else { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Unsubscribe'; } } } function updateSubscriptionButton() { var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); // Update the button text based on whether any list item has the 'active' class updateButtonText(anyActive); } document.addEventListener('click', function(event) { var clickedItem = event.target.closest('.subscription-options li'); if (clickedItem) { var checkbox = clickedItem.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } }); FAQs Why is Scott Bessent criticizing the Federal Reserve? Bessent has raised concerns over the Fed‚Äôs expansion into non-monetary policy areas, calling it ‚Äúmandate creep‚Äù and warning it could threaten the Fed‚Äôs independence. Can President Trump fire Jerome Powell as Fed Chair? A recent Supreme Court ruling clarified that the Fed chair can only be removed ‚Äúfor cause,‚Äù meaning not over policy disagreements, securing Powell‚Äôs position until May 2026. Could Scott Bessent replace Jerome Powell as Fed Chair? Bessent is rumored to be a potential candidate to succeed Powell, though he has not confirmed this and has deferred decision-making authority to the president. What is the controversy around the Fed‚Äôs $2.5 billion renovation? The renovation of the Fed‚Äôs D.C. headquarters has faced backlash due to cost overruns and timing, with critics, including Trump and Bessent, questioning the need for such an expense amid losses.

title: European Crypto Markets: Archax‚Äôs Strategic Acquisition Unlocks New Horizons
body: BitcoinWorld European Crypto Markets: Archax‚Äôs Strategic Acquisition Unlocks New Horizons The landscape of European crypto markets is undergoing a significant transformation, driven by a growing demand for regulated and secure digital asset solutions. In a move poised to reshape the industry, UK-based digital asset exchange Archax has announced its acquisition of Germany‚Äôs Deutsche Digital Assets (DDA), a prominent crypto ETP (Exchange Traded Product) manager. This strategic acquisition is not just a business transaction; it‚Äôs a powerful statement about the increasing maturity and institutionalization of the digital asset space, particularly within Europe. It signals a pivotal moment for investors seeking compliant and robust avenues into the world of cryptocurrencies. Understanding the Strategic Alliance in European Crypto Markets The acquisition of Deutsche Digital Assets by Archax is a landmark event that brings together two key players in the digital asset ecosystem. Archax, known for its regulated institutional digital asset exchange, brokerage, and custody services, is expanding its footprint dramatically by integrating DDA‚Äôs established expertise in crypto ETP management. DDA, with approximately $70 million in assets under management (AUM), brings not only a significant portfolio but also crucial regulatory licenses from BaFin, Germany‚Äôs financial regulatory authority. What Does This Acquisition Entail? Expanded Regulatory Footprint: Archax gains BaFin licenses for portfolio management and investment advisory, adding to its existing FCA (Financial Conduct Authority) registrations in the UK. This multi-jurisdictional regulatory coverage is vital for operating seamlessly across diverse European crypto markets . Enhanced Product Offering: The deal allows Archax to offer a broader range of regulated digital asset products, including ETPs, catering to both institutional and professional investors looking for diversified exposure to crypto. Geographic Expansion: This move significantly strengthens Archax‚Äôs presence beyond the UK, establishing a firm foothold in Germany and extending its reach into key markets like France and Spain, where demand for regulated digital assets is on the rise. Increased AUM and Expertise: Integrating DDA‚Äôs $70 million AUM and its specialized knowledge in ETPs enriches Archax‚Äôs capabilities and market position. Why Regulated Digital Assets are Crucial for European Crypto Markets The emphasis on regulation, particularly from bodies like BaFin, is a critical aspect of this acquisition. In the nascent yet rapidly evolving digital asset space, regulatory clarity and compliance are paramount for fostering trust and attracting institutional capital. Investors, especially large financial institutions, are increasingly prioritizing platforms and products that operate under stringent regulatory oversight. The Significance of BaFin Licenses: BaFin is one of Europe‚Äôs most respected and rigorous financial regulators. Obtaining licenses for portfolio management and investment advisory from BaFin signifies a high level of operational integrity and adherence to strict financial standards. For Archax, these licenses are not just permits; they are badges of credibility that: Boost Investor Confidence: Assure institutional investors that their digital asset holdings and investments are managed within a robust, legally compliant framework. Enable Broader Participation: Open doors for traditional financial institutions that are mandated to only engage with regulated entities. Mitigate Risks: Provide a layer of protection against fraud, market manipulation, and other risks associated with unregulated crypto environments. Facilitate Cross-Border Operations: Streamline operations across different European crypto markets by meeting diverse national regulatory requirements. Navigating the Evolving Landscape of European Crypto Markets The demand for regulated digital assets is not merely a trend; it‚Äôs a fundamental shift. As the crypto industry matures, the focus is moving from speculative trading to long-term investment and integration into mainstream finance. This requires infrastructure that mirrors traditional financial markets in terms of security, compliance, and institutional-grade services. Benefits of this Strategic Expansion: The combined entity of Archax and DDA is well-positioned to capitalize on this evolving demand. Here are some key benefits: Benefit Category Description Enhanced Market Access Direct access to institutional clients in Germany, France, and Spain, significantly broadening Archax‚Äôs client base. Diversified Product Portfolio Ability to offer a comprehensive suite of services from exchange and custody to ETP management, meeting varied investor needs. Regulatory Synergy Leveraging both UK FCA and German BaFin licenses creates a robust, multi-jurisdictional regulatory framework, appealing to risk-averse investors. Increased Liquidity A larger, integrated platform is likely to attract more trading volume, leading to deeper liquidity for digital assets. Pioneering Institutional Adoption Positions Archax as a leader in bridging traditional finance with the digital asset world in Europe. What Challenges Might Lie Ahead? While the acquisition presents immense opportunities, integrating two distinct entities, especially across different regulatory environments, comes with its own set of challenges: Regulatory Harmonization: Despite gaining licenses, navigating the nuances of different national regulations within the broader EU framework (e.g., MiCA) will require continuous effort. Operational Integration: Merging technological platforms, operational workflows, and corporate cultures can be complex and time-consuming. Market Competition: The European crypto markets are becoming increasingly competitive, with both traditional financial giants and new crypto native firms vying for market share. Talent Retention: Ensuring the retention of key talent from both Archax and DDA is crucial for maintaining expertise and continuity. The Future Outlook for European Crypto Markets and Beyond This acquisition is more than just a corporate deal; it‚Äôs a bellwether for the future direction of digital assets. It underscores a clear trend towards consolidation, regulation, and institutionalization. As global economies increasingly embrace digital transformation, the need for robust, compliant, and scalable digital asset infrastructure becomes paramount. Archax‚Äôs expansion into key European crypto markets positions it at the forefront of this evolution, ready to meet the sophisticated demands of institutional investors. The deal also highlights the growing importance of crypto ETPs as a regulated and accessible way for investors to gain exposure to cryptocurrencies without directly holding the underlying assets. This type of product is particularly attractive to institutional investors who operate within strict compliance frameworks. In conclusion, Archax‚Äôs acquisition of Deutsche Digital Assets is a significant step forward for the regulated digital asset space in Europe. It demonstrates a commitment to building a secure, compliant, and comprehensive ecosystem for digital asset trading and investment. As demand continues to surge, such strategic alliances will be key to unlocking the full potential of cryptocurrencies within the traditional financial landscape, paving the way for broader adoption and innovation across European crypto markets . Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the primary purpose of Archax acquiring Deutsche Digital Assets? A1: The primary purpose is to expand Archax‚Äôs presence and product offerings in European crypto markets, gaining crucial BaFin licenses for portfolio management and investment advisory, and integrating DDA‚Äôs expertise in crypto ETP management. Q2: What are the key benefits of this acquisition for Archax? A2: Key benefits include an expanded regulatory footprint (FCA and BaFin), enhanced product offerings like ETPs, strengthened presence in Germany, France, and Spain, and increased assets under management and expertise. Q3: Why are BaFin licenses important for digital asset firms? A3: BaFin licenses are important because they signify adherence to rigorous financial standards, boosting investor confidence, enabling participation from traditional financial institutions, mitigating risks, and facilitating cross-border operations within European crypto markets. Q4: How does this acquisition impact the broader European crypto market? A4: This acquisition signals a clear trend towards consolidation, regulation, and institutionalization in European crypto markets, paving the way for more secure, compliant, and accessible digital asset investments for institutional and professional investors. Q5: What are crypto ETPs, and why are they relevant in this context? A5: Crypto ETPs (Exchange Traded Products) are regulated financial instruments that allow investors to gain exposure to cryptocurrencies without directly owning the underlying assets. They are relevant as they offer a compliant and accessible investment vehicle, particularly attractive to institutional investors operating under strict regulatory frameworks. Q6: Which countries will see Archax‚Äôs strengthened presence due to this deal? A6: Archax will strengthen its presence across the UK, Germany, France, and Spain, capitalizing on growing demand for regulated digital assets in these key European crypto markets. To learn more about the latest European crypto markets trends, explore our article on key developments shaping institutional adoption . This post European Crypto Markets: Archax‚Äôs Strategic Acquisition Unlocks New Horizons first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Polymarket Acquires Derivatives Exchange QCEX for $112M to Expand US Footprint
body: Decentralized prediction market Polymarket has acquired Florida-based derivatives exchange QCX and its affiliated clearinghouse QC Clearing ‚Äî together known as QCEX, for $112 million. Key Takeaways: Polymarket acquired QCEX for $112M to gain a regulated foothold in the US market. The deal follows the closure of a federal investigation that had hindered Polymarket‚Äôs US expansion. Polymarket is poised to re-enter the country legally. The announcement comes just days after US regulators ended their investigation into Polymarket, clearing a major obstacle for the company‚Äôs US ambitions. The purchase ‚Äúmarks a significant step toward expanding‚Äù Polymarket into the U.S., said founder and CEO Shayne Coplan . Polymarket Thrives Globally Despite US Ban Since 2022 Polymarket has remained officially closed to U.S. users since 2022 but has seen explosive growth overseas. In the first half of 2025 alone, users wagered roughly $6 billion on everything from political races to cultural moments and sports events. The platform gained prominence during the 2024 U.S. presidential election cycle. The company‚Äôs path to U.S. compliance was complicated by scrutiny from the Commodity Futures Trading Commission and the Department of Justice, which launched a joint investigation following Donald Trump‚Äôs re-election. The FBI raided Coplan‚Äôs home in November , but earlier this month, Coplan confirmed that the inquiry had been closed. With the acquisition of QCEX, which only received its license to operate as a designated contract market earlier this month, Polymarket now has a regulated foothold that could enable it to offer compliant prediction contracts in the U.S. Polymarket has acquired QCEX, a CFTC-regulated exchange and clearinghouse, for $112 million. This paves the way for us to welcome American traders again. I've waited a long time to say this: Polymarket is coming home pic.twitter.com/Qjd5ZbUwKi ‚Äî Shayne Coplan (@shayne_coplan) July 21, 2025 ‚ÄúThe acquisition of QCX was laying the foundation to bring Polymarket home ‚Äî re-entering the U.S. as a fully regulated and compliant platform that will allow Americans to trade their opinions,‚Äù Coplan said on Monday. ‚ÄúShayne has built a cultural phenomenon in Polymarket,‚Äù QCEX founder Sergei Dobrovolskii added. ‚ÄúI am excited to bring our companies together and leverage our licences, technology, and expertise in the retail trading sector to help Polymarket reach its full potential.‚Äù The deal comes amid growing regulatory openness toward prediction markets. Kalshi, a rival platform, won a court ruling last year allowing betting on political outcomes. Polymarket Nears Unicorn Status With $200M Raise As reported, Polymarket is close to securing a $200 million funding round led by Peter Thiel‚Äôs Founders Fund, valuing the crypto-based prediction platform at $1 billion. Despite being banned in the US, Polymarket‚Äôs user base and market activity have surged, with over 21,000 open markets and $700 million in active trading volume. The platform recently partnered with Elon Musk‚Äôs X to integrate prediction markets with Grok, X‚Äôs AI chatbot, boosting its visibility amid ongoing regulatory hurdles. Polymarket has seen explosive growth since the 2024 U.S. election, hitting a $2.5 billion trading peak in November, but it remains restricted in several countries and faces criticism over potential market manipulation. The post Polymarket Acquires Derivatives Exchange QCEX for $112M to Expand US Footprint appeared first on Cryptonews .

}, 500); } else { console.warn('Modal not found:', modalId); } } function closeunsubscribemodal() { var unsubscribemodal = document.querySelector('.unsubscribed-popup-modal .modal'); if (unsubscribemodal) { unsubscribemodal.classList.add('hide'); unsubscribemodal.classList.remove('show'); } setTimeout(function() { unsubscribemodal.style.display = 'none'; }, 500); } function closesubscribemodal() { var subscribedmodal = document.querySelector('.subscribed-popup-modal .modal'); setTimeout(function() { subscribedmodal.style.display = 'none'; }, 500); if (subscribedmodal) { subscribedmodal.classList.add('hide'); subscribedmodal.classList.remove('show'); } } function withoutLoginClicked(withoutlogin_id) { localStorage.setItem('subscribe_without_Login', 'true'); localStorage.setItem('subscribe_clicked_id', withoutlogin_id); } document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { const subscribewithoutData = localStorage.getItem('subscribe_without_Login'); const subscribe_clicked_cat_id = localStorage.getItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); // Function to get cookies function getCookie(name) { let value = "; " + document.cookie; let parts = value.split("; " + name + "="); if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift(); } // Get user token from cookies const userToken = getCookie('user_token'); if (subscribewithoutData === 'true' && userToken) { // Call the modal function with the category ID subscribed_popupmodal(subscribe_clicked_cat_id); // Remove the flag and category ID from localStorage localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_without_Login'); localStorage.removeItem('subscribe_clicked_id'); } }); /************************** update susbcriber content **************************** */ function initializeSubscriptionButton() { var initialListItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options input[type="checkbox"]'); initialListItems.forEach(function(item) { console.log(item.checked, 'Initial Checkbox checked status'); }); var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); } function updateButtonText(anyActive) { var subscribeButtonSpan = document.querySelector('.subscribe-submit .changeBtnText'); if (subscribeButtonSpan) { if (anyActive) { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Subscribe Now'; } else { subscribeButtonSpan.textContent = 'Unsubscribe'; } } } function updateSubscriptionButton() { var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('.subscription-options li'); if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); // Update the button text based on whether any list item has the 'active' class updateButtonText(anyActive); } document.addEventListener('click', function(event) { var clickedItem = event.target.closest('.subscription-options li'); if (clickedItem) { var checkbox = clickedItem.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } }); FAQs Why is Pi Coin‚Äôs price up today? Pi Coin‚Äôs price is up today due to a technically significant falling wedge breakout, a massive spike in trading volume, and favorable market sentiment stemming from its rapidly expanding app ecosystem. What factors are fueling Pi Coin‚Äôs current bullish momentum? Pi Coin‚Äôs bullish momentum is fueled by its recent falling wedge breakout, a massive spike in trading volume, expanding app ecosystem, and overall favorable market sentiment. Is Pi coin a good investment? If the bullish sentiment sustains, the PI value could reach as high as $2.1007 this year.

title: Crucial Breakthrough: US China Tariffs Likely Extended Amid Positive Talks
body: BitcoinWorld Crucial Breakthrough: US China Tariffs Likely Extended Amid Positive Talks In the intricate dance of global economics, few topics command as much attention and anxiety as the ongoing saga of US China Tariffs . For investors, businesses, and everyday consumers, the ebb and flow of trade relations between the world‚Äôs two largest economies can dictate everything from stock market volatility to the price of goods. Recent news from U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Besent, signaling a likely extension of the current tariff truce, offers a much-needed glimmer of hope and stability in an otherwise unpredictable landscape. Understanding the Dynamics of US China Tariffs: A Brief History The trade relationship between the United States and China has been a cornerstone of global commerce for decades, but it has also been a source of significant tension, particularly in recent years. The imposition of US China Tariffs , essentially taxes on imported goods, began as a tool to address perceived imbalances and unfair trade practices. This period of heightened tariffs led to considerable disruption, impacting supply chains, consumer prices, and corporate profits worldwide. Let‚Äôs briefly look at the journey that brought us to this point: Initial Imposition: Starting in 2018, both countries levied tariffs on hundreds of billions of dollars worth of each other‚Äôs goods, escalating into a full-blown trade war. Economic Fallout: Businesses faced increased costs, leading to either higher prices for consumers or reduced profit margins. Global trade volumes saw a significant slowdown. Phase One Deal: In early 2020, a ‚ÄòPhase One‚Äô trade agreement brought a partial truce, with China committing to purchase more U.S. goods and services, and the U.S. agreeing to roll back some tariffs. Ongoing Negotiations: Despite the Phase One deal, many tariffs remained in place, and ongoing discussions have been crucial to managing the trade relationship. The current truce, set to expire on August 12, has been a focal point for market watchers. The prospect of these tariffs being reinstated or even expanded has consistently loomed over the global economy, creating uncertainty and influencing investment decisions, including those in the volatile cryptocurrency market. When traditional markets face headwinds due to trade disputes, the ripple effect can sometimes be felt in alternative assets. Why a Truce Extension on US China Tariffs Matters for Everyone? The announcement by U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Besent, as reported by Walter Bloomberg on X, that talks on July 28 and 29 are likely to result in an extension of the tariff truce, is more than just a bureaucratic update. It carries profound implications for various sectors, including the burgeoning digital asset space. Here‚Äôs why this potential extension of the US China Tariffs truce is so significant: Impact Area Description of Benefit from Extension Global Economy Reduces immediate economic uncertainty, fostering a more stable environment for trade and investment. Avoids a potential drag on global GDP growth. Businesses & Supply Chains Provides predictability for companies reliant on cross-border trade. Allows for better long-term planning, reduces input costs, and eases logistical pressures. Consumers Helps stabilize prices for imported goods, preventing inflationary pressures that would arise from new or increased tariffs. Financial Markets Often reacts positively to reduced trade tensions. Could lead to increased investor confidence, potentially boosting equity markets and calming volatility. Cryptocurrency Market While not directly correlated, a stable global economic outlook often creates a more favorable environment for risk assets like cryptocurrencies. Reduced macro uncertainty can free up capital and encourage broader market participation. The absence of escalating trade tensions allows businesses to focus on growth and innovation rather than navigating complex tariff landscapes. This stability is a powerful catalyst for economic activity, which, in turn, can indirectly support the broader financial ecosystem, including digital assets. What Challenges Remain Regarding US China Tariffs? While the prospect of a truce extension is certainly positive, it‚Äôs important to acknowledge that it doesn‚Äôt resolve all underlying issues in the US-China trade relationship. The US China Tariffs were initially implemented to address deep-seated concerns, and these concerns persist. Key challenges that still need to be addressed include: Intellectual Property Rights: Protecting patents, copyrights, and trade secrets remains a major point of contention. Forced Technology Transfer: Concerns about Chinese policies requiring foreign companies to share technology as a condition of market access. State Subsidies and Market Access: Debates over the fairness of state support for Chinese industries and barriers to entry for foreign companies in certain sectors. Geopolitical Tensions: Broader geopolitical issues, such as those related to Taiwan or human rights, often cast a shadow over economic discussions. An extension provides a breathing room, a temporary pause, but it doesn‚Äôt fundamentally change the structural differences or address the core grievances that led to the tariff imposition in the first place. Therefore, while markets might cheer the immediate relief, the long-term trajectory of US China Tariffs and trade relations will depend on progress on these more complex issues. Navigating the Future: What‚Äôs Next for US China Tariffs? The upcoming talks on July 28 and 29 are pivotal. The expectation of an extension, as articulated by Secretary Besent, suggests a diplomatic willingness from both sides to maintain stability. However, the details of any extension ‚Äì its duration, scope, and any accompanying commitments ‚Äì will be critical. For businesses and investors, here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed: Follow official announcements from both governments closely. The devil is often in the details of any new agreement. Assess Supply Chain Resilience: Even with an extension, diversification and risk mitigation in supply chains remain crucial. Don‚Äôt assume permanent peace. Monitor Market Reactions: Observe how equity, commodity, and currency markets react to official news. This can provide clues about broader investor sentiment. Consider Broader Economic Indicators: Keep an eye on inflation, interest rates, and GDP growth, as these macroeconomic factors are intertwined with trade policy. Evaluate Crypto Market Implications: While direct links are rare, a more stable global economic environment generally bodes well for risk assets. Reduced trade uncertainty could encourage more speculative capital flows into the crypto space. The potential for continued dialogue, rather than escalation, provides a more predictable environment. This predictability, in turn, can foster confidence, which is a vital ingredient for sustained economic growth and, by extension, a healthy investment climate across all asset classes, including cryptocurrencies. A Path Towards Stability: The Lingering Impact of US China Tariffs The potential extension of the US China Tariffs truce represents a significant step towards de-escalation in a critical global economic relationship. While it may not resolve all underlying tensions, it signals a pragmatic approach from both Washington and Beijing to prioritize stability and avoid further economic disruption. This move is a welcome development for global markets, offering a moment of respite and a clearer path forward for businesses and investors alike. For the cryptocurrency market, often influenced by macro trends, a calmer global trade environment could provide a more fertile ground for growth and innovation. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What are US China Tariffs? A1: US China Tariffs are taxes imposed by the United States and China on each other‚Äôs imported goods. They were primarily implemented starting in 2018 as a tool in a trade dispute, aiming to address perceived unfair trade practices and trade imbalances. Q2: Why is the extension of the tariff truce significant? A2: The extension of the tariff truce is significant because it reduces immediate economic uncertainty, provides stability for global supply chains and businesses, helps stabilize consumer prices, and generally fosters a more positive environment for financial markets, including potentially influencing investor sentiment towards cryptocurrencies. Q3: Who is U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Besent? A3: According to the report by Walter Bloomberg on X, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Besent made the statement regarding the likely extension of the tariff truce. This role is crucial in shaping U.S. economic policy and international financial relations. Q4: What are the key dates for these tariff talks? A4: The talks between the U.S. and China regarding the August 12 tariff deadline are scheduled to take place on July 28 and July 29. Q5: Does the truce extension mean the trade war is over? A5: No, an extension of the truce provides a temporary pause and avoids immediate escalation, but it does not mean the underlying trade issues are fully resolved. Deeper structural issues like intellectual property rights, forced technology transfer, and market access still need to be addressed in long-term negotiations. Q6: How might this affect the cryptocurrency market? A6: While not directly linked, a more stable global economic outlook, driven by reduced trade tensions, can create a more favorable environment for risk assets like cryptocurrencies. Reduced macro uncertainty can encourage broader investment and capital flows into the digital asset space. If you found this article insightful, consider sharing it with your network! Stay informed on how global economic shifts impact the world of digital assets. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Crucial Breakthrough: US China Tariffs Likely Extended Amid Positive Talks first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team
