title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs See $131 Million Outflow After Record Inflows
body: Spot Bitcoin ETFs recorded a net outflow of $131.35 million on Monday, ending a 12-day streak that saw $6.6 billion in inflows, as investors paused to lock in gains after Bitcoin‚Äôs recent price rally. According to SoSoValue, ARK Invest‚Äôs ARKB led the outflows, shedding $77.46 million, followed by Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC with $36.75 million and Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC with $12.75 million. Bitwise‚Äôs BITB and VanEck‚Äôs HODL also recorded smaller outflows of $1.91 million and $2.48 million, respectively, while BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT, the largest Bitcoin ETF with $86.16 billion in assets under management, reported no inflows or outflows for the day. Profit-Taking After a Strong Rally Despite the pause, cumulative net inflows across all spot Bitcoin ETFs remain strong at $54.62 billion, with total net assets now standing at $151.60 billion, accounting for 6.52% of Bitcoin‚Äôs total market capitalization. Many experts are suggesting that the withdrawals are part of a routine correction after a strong upward move, as institutions rebalance their positions to manage risk and secure profits following significant inflows earlier in July. On July 10 and 11, Bitcoin ETFs recorded $1.18 billion and $1.03 billion in daily inflows, marking the first time in history that two consecutive days brought in over a billion dollars each into Bitcoin funds. Ether ETFs Continue Strong Inflow Streak While Bitcoin-base investment funds saw a brief pause, spot Ether ETFs extended their inflow streak to 12 consecutive days , recording $296.59 million in net inflows on Monday. This pushed the cumulative net inflow for Ether ETFs to $7.78 billion, highlighting rising institutional interest in Ethereum-based products. Last Wednesday marked a record day for Ether ETFs, which saw $726.74 million in daily inflows, the highest since their launch, followed by $602.02 million on Thursday. The consistent demand for Ether ETFs reflects increasing confidence in Ethereum‚Äôs long-term utility as the network continues to attract activity around tokenization and decentralized applications, positioning Ether products to capture growing institutional allocations alongside Bitcoin funds in the expanding crypto investment landscape. The post Spot Bitcoin ETFs See $131 Million Outflow After Record Inflows appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Bitcoin Market: Navigating the Crucial Consolidation Phase Towards $115K
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Market: Navigating the Crucial Consolidation Phase Towards $115K The cryptocurrency world has been on a rollercoaster ride, with Bitcoin leading the charge to exhilarating new all-time highs. Yet, as the dust settles, the Bitcoin market finds itself in a period of consolidation. This isn‚Äôt a sign of weakness, but rather a healthy recalibration after an intense rally. Understanding this phase is crucial for any investor looking to navigate the volatile yet promising landscape of digital assets. What exactly does this consolidation mean for Bitcoin‚Äôs future, and could a retest of the significant $115,000 level truly be on the horizon? Decoding the Bitcoin Market ‚Äòs Current State: The Glassnode Perspective To truly grasp the dynamics at play in the current Bitcoin market , we turn to on-chain analytics firm Glassnode, renowned for its deep insights into blockchain data. Their latest findings paint a clear picture of shifting momentum following Bitcoin‚Äôs monumental surge. One of the key metrics highlighted by Glassnode is the Realized Profit to Loss Ratio (RPLR). This indicator measures the ratio of realized profits to realized losses on the network, offering a window into the profitability of coins spent by investors. Historically, an RPLR above 1 indicates that more profits are being taken than losses, a common occurrence during bull markets. The Shift from 3.9 to 2.6: Glassnode reported a significant drop in the RPLR from a peak of 3.9 to 2.6. What does this mean? A higher RPLR (like 3.9) suggests aggressive profit-taking, often seen near market tops as investors capitalize on gains. The subsequent decline to 2.6 indicates a cooling off in this intense profit-taking behavior. While still above 1 (meaning profits are still being realized), the reduced ratio signals that the frenetic pace of selling for profit has subsided. Signaling Cooling Profitability: This drop doesn‚Äôt necessarily mean losses are accumulating, but rather that the rate at which profits are being locked in has slowed. It suggests that fewer participants are selling their holdings at substantial gains, or that the gains themselves are becoming less extreme. This often precedes or accompanies a period of market consolidation. Investors Adjusting to Range-Bound Conditions: Glassnode explicitly stated that investors are now adjusting to ‚Äòrange-bound conditions.‚Äô This implies that the market is no longer in a strong directional trend (up or down) but is instead trading within a defined price range. In such an environment, the focus shifts from chasing parabolic gains to identifying support and resistance levels, and potentially accumulating at lower prices within the range. This data from Glassnode provides a fundamental understanding of investor sentiment and behavior, suggesting a move from aggressive profit-taking to a more strategic, patient approach within the Bitcoin market . Understanding Range-Bound Conditions in the Bitcoin Market : What Does it Mean for You? When analysts talk about the Bitcoin market being ‚Äòrange-bound,‚Äô it‚Äôs a critical concept for investors to grasp. Unlike the exhilarating surges of a bull run or the sharp declines of a bear market, a range-bound market is characterized by prices trading consistently between a specific high (resistance) and a specific low (support) for an extended period. Think of it like a ping-pong ball bouncing between two walls. The price might fluctuate significantly within that range, but it doesn‚Äôt break out decisively in either direction. For investors, this phase presents both unique challenges and opportunities: Challenges: Frustration for Momentum Traders: Those who thrive on rapid price appreciation may find range-bound conditions frustrating, as large, quick gains become less frequent. Increased Volatility within the Range: While the overall trend is flat, intra-range volatility can still be high, leading to potential ‚Äòshake-outs‚Äô where weak hands are forced to sell. Uncertainty: The lack of a clear directional trend can lead to indecision and analysis paralysis among investors. Opportunities: Accumulation Phases: Smart investors often view consolidation as an ideal time to ‚Äòdollar-cost average‚Äô (DCA) into their positions, buying at various points within the range to lower their average entry price. Strategic Trading: Experienced traders can profit by buying near the support level and selling near the resistance level, though this requires precise execution and risk management. Healthy Market Reset: Consolidation allows the market to digest recent gains, shake out speculative froth, and build a stronger foundation for the next upward move. It prevents markets from becoming overheated and unsustainable. Recognizing and adapting to range-bound conditions is vital for long-term success in the Bitcoin market . It calls for patience, a strategic mindset, and a focus on long-term value rather than short-term fluctuations. The Allure of $115,000: A Key Liquidity Hub for the Bitcoin Market In the world of trading, ‚Äòliquidity‚Äô refers to how easily an asset can be bought or sold without affecting its price. High liquidity means there are many buyers and sellers, allowing for smooth transactions. When we talk about a ‚Äòkey liquidity point‚Äô like $115,000 for the Bitcoin market , it signifies a price level where a substantial amount of buy and sell orders are concentrated. Popular trader Daan Crypto Trades, whose insights are often shared by Cointelegraph, has highlighted $115,000 as precisely such a critical juncture. His observation that ‚Äòpositions are building in this range‚Äô is highly significant. Here‚Äôs why: Concentration of Orders: A liquidity point like $115,000 suggests that many market participants have placed their buy or sell orders around this price. These could be stop-loss orders, take-profit orders, or new entry orders. Potential Magnet for Price: Price often tends to gravitate towards areas of high liquidity. If there‚Äôs a large cluster of buy orders below the current price, it can act as a strong support level, attracting price downwards before bouncing. Conversely, a large cluster of sell orders above can act as resistance. Fueling the Next Price Move: When price approaches a significant liquidity zone, it can trigger a cascade of orders. For instance, if Bitcoin dips towards $115,000 and hits a large volume of buy orders, it could absorb selling pressure and provide the necessary ‚Äòfuel‚Äô for a powerful rebound. Conversely, if it breaks below with conviction, it could trigger stop-losses and lead to a further decline until the next liquidity zone is found. Psychological Significance: Round numbers and previously important technical levels often gain psychological significance. While $115,000 might not be a round number, it could represent a confluence of technical indicators or a price point where a large number of investors feel comfortable entering or exiting. The accumulation of positions around $115,000 suggests that this level is being closely watched by a significant portion of the Bitcoin market . Its interaction with this price point could indeed dictate the direction and momentum of Bitcoin‚Äôs next major move. Is a $115K Retest Inevitable for the Bitcoin Market ? Examining the Possibility The concept of a ‚Äòretest‚Äô is fundamental in technical analysis, especially in dynamic markets like Bitcoin. A retest occurs when a price level, once broken (either as resistance turning into support, or vice versa), is revisited by the price to confirm its new role. Given the building liquidity at $115,000, the question arises: is a retest of this level for the Bitcoin market inevitable? While ‚Äòinevitable‚Äô is a strong word in financial markets, the possibility of a $115K retest is certainly high, driven by several factors: Support/Resistance Flip: If $115,000 was a significant resistance level that Bitcoin recently broke above, a retest would involve the price dipping back to confirm this level as new support. This is a classic pattern that strengthens the bullish case if the support holds. Liquidity Absorption: As discussed, large liquidity pools act as magnets. A retest allows the market to ‚Äòabsorb‚Äô the resting buy orders at that level. If these orders are strong enough, they can halt the downward momentum and initiate a bounce. Market Psychology and Price Discovery: After a rapid ascent, markets often need to consolidate and find a stable footing. A retest can be part of this price discovery process, allowing investors to establish a new base of confidence before the next leg up. It also provides a second chance for those who missed the initial breakout to enter. Historical Precedent: Bitcoin‚Äôs history is replete with examples of retests after significant price movements or breakouts from consolidation patterns. These retests often serve to validate the strength of a new trend or the importance of a particular price level. However, it‚Äôs important to note that a retest isn‚Äôt guaranteed, nor is its outcome. If the Bitcoin market finds strong buying pressure before reaching $115,000, it might move upwards directly. Conversely, if selling pressure is too strong, a retest could fail, leading to a break below $115,000 and a search for lower support levels. Traders and investors will be closely watching the volume and price action around this critical level to gauge its strength. Navigating Investor Psychology Amidst Bitcoin Market Consolidation Beyond the charts and on-chain data, understanding investor psychology is paramount, especially during periods of consolidation in the Bitcoin market . While a bull run is often fueled by euphoria and FOMO (Fear Of Missing Out), and a bear market by fear and capitulation, consolidation brings its own unique psychological challenges. During these range-bound phases, patience becomes a virtue, and emotional discipline is tested: Patience vs. Panic: The lack of immediate upward movement can lead to impatience. Some investors might panic and sell, fearing the rally is over. Others might chase small, short-term gains, only to be caught in whipsaws. Long-term holders, however, often view consolidation as an opportunity to accumulate more, understanding that these periods are necessary for sustainable growth. The Role of Long-Term Holders vs. Short-Term Traders: Glassnode‚Äôs data often distinguishes between these groups. During consolidation, long-term holders (HODLers) tend to remain steadfast, even adding to their positions. Short-term traders, on the other hand, might try to scalp profits within the range, but face higher risks. Avoiding Emotional Decisions: The absence of clear direction can lead to indecision and emotional trading. It‚Äôs crucial to stick to a pre-defined investment strategy, whether it‚Äôs dollar-cost averaging, setting clear entry/exit points, or simply holding. Chasing every rumour or reacting to every minor price swing can lead to significant losses. FUD and Noise: Consolidation periods often coincide with increased FUD (Fear, Uncertainty, Doubt) in the media, as commentators search for explanations for the stalled price. Discerning legitimate news from speculative noise is vital to avoid making irrational decisions. Ultimately, successful navigation of the Bitcoin market during consolidation requires a calm temperament, a clear understanding of your investment goals, and a commitment to your long-term strategy. It‚Äôs a time for reflection and strategic planning, not impulsive reactions. Beyond the Charts: Other Factors Influencing the Bitcoin Market While on-chain metrics and technical analysis provide invaluable insights, the Bitcoin market is also profoundly influenced by a broader array of macroeconomic, regulatory, and technological factors. Understanding these external forces can provide a more holistic view of Bitcoin‚Äôs potential trajectory. Macroeconomic Trends: Inflation and Interest Rates: Bitcoin is often seen as a hedge against inflation. If global inflation persists, or if central banks continue aggressive interest rate hikes, it can influence investor appetite for risk assets like Bitcoin. Global Economic Stability: Geopolitical events, recessions, or significant shifts in global economic policy can either drive investors towards perceived safe havens like Bitcoin or away from speculative assets. Regulatory Developments: Government Stance: Regulatory clarity (or lack thereof) from major economies can significantly impact institutional adoption and mainstream acceptance. Positive regulations (like spot Bitcoin ETFs) can be massive catalysts, while restrictive measures can create headwinds. Compliance: The evolving landscape of AML (Anti-Money Laundering) and KYC (Know Your Customer) regulations affects how exchanges and financial institutions interact with crypto, influencing liquidity and accessibility. Institutional Adoption: Corporate Treasuries: The increasing trend of corporations adding Bitcoin to their balance sheets signifies growing confidence and provides a steady demand source for the Bitcoin market . Financial Products: The success and expansion of Bitcoin ETFs, futures, and other regulated financial products provide new avenues for traditional investors to gain exposure, increasing market depth and legitimacy. Technological Advancements: Network Upgrades: While less frequent for Bitcoin than for other blockchains, any significant protocol upgrades or scaling solutions (like the Lightning Network) can enhance its utility and appeal. Security: Continuous improvements in network security and wallet technology bolster trust in the asset. Mining Dynamics: Halving Events: The quadrennial Bitcoin halving, which reduces the supply of new Bitcoin, has historically been a strong bullish catalyst, though its effects are typically felt over months, not days. Mining Difficulty and Hash Rate: These metrics indicate the health and security of the network. A robust and growing hash rate suggests strong miner participation and confidence. By considering these broader influences alongside on-chain data, investors can develop a more comprehensive and robust strategy for navigating the complexities of the Bitcoin market . Challenges and Opportunities in the Current Bitcoin Market The current consolidation phase in the Bitcoin market , while healthy, presents a unique set of challenges and, crucially, a wealth of opportunities for discerning investors. Understanding both sides of this coin is essential for making informed decisions. Challenges: Extended Sideways Movement: Consolidation can sometimes be prolonged, testing the patience of investors hoping for quick returns. A lengthy sideways trend can lead to ‚Äòcrypto fatigue‚Äô and potentially drive some investors away. Potential for Deeper Corrections: While the market is consolidating, there‚Äôs always a risk that the established support level might break, leading to a sharper correction downwards. This could be triggered by negative news, macroeconomic shocks, or simply a lack of sustained buying pressure. Increased Volatility Within the Range: Even within a defined range, Bitcoin‚Äôs price can experience significant swings. These ‚Äòwhipsaws‚Äô can liquidate over-leveraged positions and create uncertainty, making short-term trading particularly risky. Sentiment Shifts: Prolonged consolidation can lead to a shift in market sentiment from bullish enthusiasm to skepticism or even bearishness, which can further dampen price action. Opportunities: Accumulation Phases: For long-term investors, consolidation periods are prime opportunities to accumulate Bitcoin at potentially more favorable prices. Dollar-cost averaging (DCA) becomes a highly effective strategy during these times, allowing investors to build their positions gradually without trying to ‚Äòtime the bottom.‚Äô Identifying Strong Hands: During consolidation, weaker hands (those with low conviction or high leverage) tend to get shaken out. The coins are then transferred to stronger, long-term holders, which strengthens the market‚Äôs foundation for future rallies. Technical Re-evaluation: This period allows traders to refine their technical analysis, identify new support and resistance levels, and prepare for the eventual breakout. It‚Äôs a time for strategy, not impulse. Fundamental Research: With less focus on day-to-day price swings, investors can dedicate more time to researching Bitcoin‚Äôs underlying technology, ecosystem developments, and broader adoption trends, reinforcing their conviction. Reduced FOMO: The absence of parabolic price action reduces the pressure of FOMO, allowing investors to make more rational decisions based on analysis rather than emotion. The current Bitcoin market phase is a test of patience and conviction. While it presents challenges, the opportunities for strategic positioning and long-term growth are substantial for those who understand its dynamics. Actionable Insights for Engaging with the Bitcoin Market Navigating a consolidating Bitcoin market requires a disciplined approach. Here are some actionable insights to help you make informed decisions during this crucial phase: Embrace Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Instead of trying to time the market, commit to investing a fixed amount of money into Bitcoin at regular intervals (e.g., weekly or monthly). This strategy reduces the impact of price volatility and allows you to accumulate more Bitcoin when prices are lower within the range. Prioritize Risk Management: Define Your Risk Tolerance: Understand how much you‚Äôre willing to lose and never invest more than you can afford. Set Stop-Losses: If you‚Äôre actively trading, use stop-loss orders to limit potential losses if the price moves against your position. Avoid Excessive Leverage: Highly leveraged positions are extremely risky during volatile consolidation periods and can lead to rapid liquidations. Conduct Thorough Research: Use this calmer period to deepen your understanding of Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamentals, its role in the global financial system, and its long-term value proposition. Follow reputable analysts, read whitepapers, and understand the technology. Monitor Key On-Chain Metrics: Keep an eye on data from Glassnode and other on-chain analytics firms. Metrics like Realized Profit/Loss Ratio, Net Unrealized Profit/Loss (NUPL), and Exchange Flows can provide early signals of shifts in market sentiment or investor behavior within the Bitcoin market . Identify Key Technical Levels: Pay attention to established support and resistance zones. The $115,000 liquidity point highlighted by Daan Crypto Trades is a prime example. Understanding these levels can help you identify potential entry or exit points. Cultivate Patience: The most powerful tool in a consolidating market is often patience. Avoid impulsive decisions driven by fear or greed. Markets move in cycles, and consolidation is a natural, healthy part of Bitcoin‚Äôs journey. Diversify (Wisely): While Bitcoin might be your primary focus, consider a well-diversified crypto portfolio if it aligns with your risk profile. However, avoid over-diversification into highly speculative altcoins during uncertain periods. By adopting these actionable insights, you can transform the current consolidation phase from a period of anxiety into an opportunity for strategic growth and enhanced understanding of the Bitcoin market . The current consolidation in the Bitcoin market is a pivotal phase, reflecting a healthy cooldown after an explosive rally. Glassnode‚Äôs data on the Realized Profit to Loss Ratio clearly indicates a shift from aggressive profit-taking to more range-bound conditions, signaling investor adjustment. The highlighted $115,000 level stands out as a crucial liquidity point, with positions building that could indeed fuel Bitcoin‚Äôs next significant move. While the path ahead may involve a retest of this key level, such a reconfirmation could strengthen Bitcoin‚Äôs foundation for future growth. For investors, this period demands patience, strategic accumulation, and a keen eye on both on-chain metrics and broader market factors. Understanding these dynamics is not just about predicting the next price move, but about building resilience and conviction in your investment strategy within the ever-evolving Bitcoin market . Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) About the Bitcoin Market Consolidation Q1: What does ‚Äòconsolidation‚Äô mean in the Bitcoin market? A1: Consolidation refers to a period where Bitcoin‚Äôs price trades within a relatively narrow range after a significant price movement (up or down). It signifies a period of market indecision and equilibrium between buyers and sellers, often preceding the next major price trend. Q2: How does Glassnode‚Äôs Realized Profit to Loss Ratio (RPLR) indicate market health? A2: The RPLR measures the ratio of realized profits to realized losses on the network. A high RPLR (like 3.9) suggests aggressive profit-taking, often seen near market tops. A decline (like to 2.6) indicates a cooling of this intensity, signaling that the market is digesting gains and potentially entering a consolidation phase, which can be healthy for long-term growth. Q3: Why is $115,000 considered a key liquidity point for Bitcoin? A3: A key liquidity point like $115,000 means there‚Äôs a significant concentration of buy and sell orders around that price level. Popular traders like Daan Crypto Trades identify these areas because the building of positions there can act as a magnet for price, potentially fueling the next major move as these orders are triggered. Q4: Is a retest of $115K guaranteed for the Bitcoin market? A4: Nothing is guaranteed in financial markets. However, a retest of a significant level like $115K is a common technical pattern after a breakout. It allows the market to confirm the level as new support (if it was resistance before) and absorb liquidity, strengthening the foundation for future upward movement if it holds. Q5: What should investors do during Bitcoin market consolidation? A5: During consolidation, many investors consider strategies like Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) to accumulate Bitcoin gradually. It‚Äôs also a crucial time for risk management, thorough research, and cultivating patience, avoiding impulsive decisions based on short-term price fluctuations. Q6: How do macroeconomic factors influence the Bitcoin market during consolidation? A6: Macroeconomic factors like inflation rates, interest rate decisions by central banks, and global economic stability can significantly influence investor sentiment towards risk assets like Bitcoin. During consolidation, these factors can either provide tailwinds for a breakout or headwinds that prolong the sideways movement or even trigger a downside move. If you found this analysis insightful, consider sharing it with your network! Your support helps us continue providing valuable insights into the dynamic world of cryptocurrency. Share on Twitter, Facebook, or LinkedIn to spark a conversation about the future of the Bitcoin market ! To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. title: Telegram Crypto Wallet: Unleashing Seamless Digital Transactions for US Users
body: BitcoinWorld Telegram Crypto Wallet: Unleashing Seamless Digital Transactions for US Users Imagine a world where sending cryptocurrency is as simple as sending a text message. For millions of users in the United States, that world has just become a reality. Telegram, the popular messaging application, has taken a monumental leap into the digital asset space by launching a built-in Telegram Crypto Wallet for its U.S. users. This isn‚Äôt just an incremental update; it‚Äôs a game-changer, fundamentally altering how Americans can interact with digital currencies directly within a platform they already use daily. What Does the Telegram Crypto Wallet Mean for US Users? The recent announcement, initially reported by CNBC and cited by JinSe Finance, confirms that U.S. users can now send, receive, and manage cryptocurrencies directly within the Telegram application. This integration eliminates the need for external applications, complicated logins, or cumbersome processes that have historically deterred many from entering the crypto space. The wallet, known as the TON Wallet, is built on The Open Platform (TON) blockchain, an initiative with deep roots in Telegram‚Äôs history. This development is particularly significant because it marks the first instance of a self-custody wallet being integrated into a major U.S. messaging platform. What does ‚Äòself-custody‚Äô mean in this context? It means that users maintain complete control over their private keys and, by extension, their digital assets. Unlike custodial services where a third party holds your funds, the Telegram Crypto Wallet empowers users with true ownership, mirroring the core ethos of decentralization that underpins the cryptocurrency movement. This shift towards user empowerment through self-custody is a crucial step for mainstream crypto adoption, fostering trust and security among a broader audience. How Does the Integrated Telegram Crypto Wallet Work? The beauty of the new Telegram Crypto Wallet lies in its simplicity. The Open Platform (TON), a decentralized blockchain project, is the technological backbone enabling this seamless integration. For users, the process is designed to be intuitive: Direct Integration: The wallet functionality is embedded directly within the Telegram app, appearing as a native feature rather than a separate add-on. Ease of Use: Users can send tokens to their contacts as easily as they send a text message. This ‚Äòchat-like‚Äô transaction experience significantly lowers the barrier to entry for individuals unfamiliar with traditional crypto exchanges or wallet interfaces. Self-Custody Model: As a self-custody wallet, users are provided with a seed phrase or private keys, which grant them exclusive access and control over their funds. This means that even if Telegram were to go offline, users would still retain access to their assets via their private keys on the TON blockchain. TON Blockchain Foundation: Transactions occur on the TON blockchain, known for its high speed and scalability, which promises efficient and low-cost transfers, enhancing the overall user experience for the Telegram Crypto Wallet . This integration streamlines the user journey, moving from curiosity about crypto to active participation with minimal friction. It bridges the gap between everyday communication and digital finance, making crypto less abstract and more tangible for the average user. The Benefits of an Integrated Telegram Crypto Wallet: A New Era of Convenience? The launch of the Telegram Crypto Wallet offers a multitude of advantages that could accelerate mainstream cryptocurrency adoption, especially in the U.S. Here are some key benefits: Unprecedented Accessibility: With Telegram boasting hundreds of millions of users globally, embedding a wallet directly into the app instantly makes crypto accessible to a massive audience. For many, this will be their first exposure to managing digital assets directly. Streamlined User Experience: The ‚Äòsend as a message‚Äô functionality simplifies crypto transactions dramatically. New users no longer need to navigate complex exchange interfaces or understand public/private key pairs from scratch to make a simple transfer. The learning curve is significantly flattened. Empowering Self-Custody: By offering a self-custody solution, Telegram is promoting financial sovereignty. Users are educated, albeit subtly, about the importance of owning their keys, which is a fundamental principle of decentralization and security in the crypto world. Lowering the Barrier to Entry: The psychological barrier to entry for crypto has always been high due to perceived complexity and risk. An integrated, user-friendly wallet within a familiar app removes much of this intimidation, inviting a new wave of users. Potential for Ecosystem Growth: This move could spur further development on the TON blockchain, attracting more developers and projects. It could also encourage other messaging platforms to explore similar integrations, fostering a competitive and innovative environment in the crypto space. The convenience offered by the Telegram Crypto Wallet is not just about ease of use; it‚Äôs about making digital assets a more natural part of our digital lives, potentially paving the way for micro-transactions, remittances, and peer-to-peer payments on a scale previously unimaginable. Addressing Potential Challenges with the Telegram Crypto Wallet While the prospects are exciting, the integration of a Telegram Crypto Wallet also comes with its share of challenges and considerations that both users and the platform must navigate: Regulatory Scrutiny: The U.S. regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is complex and evolving. Integrating a crypto wallet into a widely used messaging app will undoubtedly attract significant attention from financial regulators. Compliance with AML (Anti-Money Laundering) and KYC (Know Your Customer) regulations, even for a self-custody wallet, will be an ongoing challenge. Security Concerns and User Responsibility: While self-custody offers greater control, it also places the entire burden of security on the user. Losing private keys or seed phrases means losing access to funds permanently. Telegram will need robust educational resources to help users understand and manage this responsibility. User Education Gap: Despite the simplified interface, the underlying concepts of cryptocurrency, such as network fees, transaction finality, and market volatility, can still be daunting. Bridging this education gap effectively will be crucial for sustained adoption. Market Volatility: Cryptocurrencies are known for their price volatility. Users, especially newcomers, might be unprepared for sudden swings in asset value, which could lead to negative experiences if not managed with proper understanding and risk awareness. Competition and Adoption Rates: The crypto wallet market is competitive. While Telegram has a unique advantage with its user base, widespread adoption will depend on user trust, the range of supported cryptocurrencies, and the overall reliability and security of the Telegram Crypto Wallet compared to dedicated crypto platforms. Navigating these challenges will require a concerted effort from Telegram, the TON Foundation, and the broader crypto community to ensure a safe, secure, and user-friendly experience that builds long-term trust. Looking Ahead: The Future of the Telegram Crypto Wallet and Messaging Apps The launch of the Telegram Crypto Wallet is more than just a new feature; it represents a significant milestone in the convergence of social communication and decentralized finance. This move could set a precedent for other major messaging platforms globally, prompting them to consider similar integrations. Imagine WhatsApp, Signal, or Facebook Messenger offering built-in crypto functionalities ‚Äì the potential for mass adoption would be enormous. For the TON blockchain, this integration provides an unprecedented platform for growth and utility. As more users engage with the wallet, the network effect will strengthen, potentially leading to a more vibrant ecosystem of decentralized applications (dApps) and services built on TON. We might see innovative payment solutions, NFT integrations, or even decentralized identity solutions emerging directly within the messaging app environment. This development is a powerful testament to the ongoing evolution of cryptocurrency from a niche technology to a more accessible and integrated part of our digital lives. It signifies a future where digital asset management is no longer confined to specialized platforms but is woven into the fabric of everyday communication. As the digital landscape continues to evolve, the Telegram Crypto Wallet stands as a bold step towards a more financially inclusive and digitally empowered future. The introduction of the Telegram Crypto Wallet for U.S. users is a pivotal moment, signaling a new era of accessibility and convenience for digital assets. By embedding self-custody functionality directly into a widely used messaging platform, Telegram has not only simplified crypto transactions but also empowered users with greater control over their funds. While challenges related to regulation, security, and user education remain, the potential for mass adoption and the seamless integration of finance into daily communication is immense. This move solidifies Telegram‚Äôs position at the forefront of innovation, paving the way for a future where managing digital wealth is as intuitive as sending a message. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What is the TON Wallet integrated into Telegram? The TON Wallet is a self-custody cryptocurrency wallet built on The Open Platform (TON) blockchain. It allows users to send, receive, and manage digital assets directly within the Telegram messaging application without needing separate apps or logins. 2. Is the Telegram Crypto Wallet available outside the US? The initial announcement specifically highlights the launch for U.S. users. While TON Wallet has been accessible in various forms globally, its direct, built-in integration within the Telegram app as a native feature is a significant rollout for the U.S. market. Future expansion to other regions would depend on regulatory considerations and strategic decisions. 3. Is the Telegram Crypto Wallet a self-custody wallet? Yes, the TON Wallet integrated into Telegram is a self-custody wallet. This means users have complete control over their private keys and, consequently, their digital assets. Telegram does not hold your funds, emphasizing user ownership and responsibility. 4. What cryptocurrencies does the Telegram Crypto Wallet support? As the wallet is built on the TON blockchain, it primarily supports Toncoin (TON), the native cryptocurrency of the TON network. Support for other cryptocurrencies may be added in the future, depending on the wallet‚Äôs development roadmap and integration capabilities. 5. How does this Telegram Crypto Wallet impact crypto adoption? The integration significantly lowers the barrier to entry for cryptocurrency. By making transactions as easy as sending messages within a familiar app, it introduces digital assets to a massive mainstream audience, potentially accelerating widespread adoption by simplifying the user experience and promoting financial inclusion. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your friends and network on social media to spread the word about this revolutionary step in digital finance! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital assets institutional adoption . title: The Trump administration's crypto report is due today, but it may not arrive
body: The crypto industry awaits the White House Digital Asset report after Donald Trump sparked some policy blitz with the ‚ÄúCrypto Week.‚Äù Reports suggest that the report, which is officially due to be released on Tuesday, might be released to the public before the end of the month. The House of Representatives passed three major crypto bills, with one, the GENIUS Act , now headed directly to President Trump‚Äôs desk. The other two are bound for Senate review. This has left the digital assets market hanging in the middle of the bull run. US eyes Bitcoin reserve The US legislation wave positions the United States as the ‚Äúcrypto capital of the world.‚Äù The Trump administration‚Äôs first official blueprint for crypto policy reportedly took months, led by the Working Group on Digital Assets, co-led by David Sacks and Bo Hines. While the final contents are still under wraps, reports suggest it will include sweeping proposals, from establishing a strategic Bitcoin reserve , a national digital asset stockpile, with tough new national security controls on illicit finance and sanctions evasion. Update on this timeline: The report is officially due tomorrow, but a White House official tells me it will be released to the public before the end of the month. https://t.co/IPPawbVMeR ‚Äî Eleanor Terrett (@EleanorTerrett) July 21, 2025 Industry insiders are also eyeing potential reforms around banking access for crypto firms, especially in dealings with the Federal Reserve. The working group‚Äôs original task was to deliver a federal stablecoin framework, but that got handled by Congress last week with the passage of the GENIUS Act. Meanwhile, Capitol Hill remains active, and the Senate Banking Committee is preparing to release its much-anticipated digital asset market structure draft after a delay last week. The report mentioned that Chairman Tim Scott confirmed a markup will likely follow the August recess. Over at Senate Agriculture, Brian Quintenz suddenly disappeared from the CFTC chair nominating vote roster. Critics eye Trump‚Äôs crypto ties All of this policy momentum has triggered a wave of bullish sentiment among investors. The crypto market recently breached the $4 trillion mark. Bitcoin touched an all-time high of $123,000 on July 14 before pulling back slightly, and while retail interest is returning, whales are still making big moves. Data shows that Google searches for ‚ÄúBitcoin‚Äù are rising. According to 10x Research, large-scale holders, those controlling 10,000 BTC or more, snapped up nearly 47,000 Bitcoins just before the ATH. Many of those positions have since been trimmed, which has added to a modest pullback to the $118,000 zone of BTC. However, most of the institutional re-engagement began after Circle‚Äôs blockbuster IPO last month. As the Trump administration pushes harder into crypto, critics are sounding alarms. Some warn that the industry‚Äôs murky structure and lack of transparency could make it a ground for corruption or foreign influence. Token holdings within Trump-affiliated projects have prompted scrutiny. As of now, the GENIUS Act may offer some early consumer safeguards for stablecoins, yet there are many regulatory gaps. title: Bitget Wallet Launches Fiat Withdrawal Feature in Collaboration with MoonPay
body: Bitget Wallet announced on Tuesday it has launched a fiat withdrawal feature through a new partnership with crypto payments platform MoonPay We've partnered with @moonpay to power up our offramp feature! You can now offramp USDT/USDC directly in more than 25+ currencies to your bank cards/PayPal accounts. Skip the CEX and offramp with Bitget Wallet. Try it now via More Sell Crypto. #Crypto4Everyone pic.twitter.com/twgSA1KOem ‚Äî Bitget Wallet (@BitgetWallet) July 22, 2025 In a press release shared with CryptoNews, the wallet provider explains the integration allows users to sell stablecoins such as USDT and USDC for over 25 fiat currencies, including USD, EUR, GBP, and AUD, directly within the self-custodial wallet. The feature is accessible via the ‚ÄúSell Crypto‚Äù page in Bitget Wallet. Users can select their token and preferred fiat currency and complete the transaction through MoonPay. The process includes Know Your Customer (KYC) verification and supports payouts via Apple Pay, Visa, and Mastercard. Once approved, funds are deposited directly into the chosen payment method, often within minutes. This is the first time Bitget Wallet has offered fiat off-ramping, rounding out its crypto lifecycle offerings. Regulated Infrastructure and Real-Time Settlement MoonPay is a firm registered as a Virtual Asset Service Provider (VASP) in the EU and a Money Services Business (MSB) in the United States. All transactions go through compliance checks, including identity verification and anti-money laundering procedures. Users can track the progress of their withdrawals within the Bitget Wallet app and receive updates via email, ensuring a transparent and streamlined experience. ‚ÄúPartnering with Bitget Wallet allows us to bring a secure and intuitive offramp experience to a wider community of self-custody users,‚Äù said Ivan Soto-Wright, Co-Founder and CEO of MoonPay. Bitget Wallet Expands Full-Service Crypto Management Currebtly users can buy digital assets through the wallet, use them for purchases via an in-app shop, crypto card, or QR payments, and now convert holdings back to fiat. ‚ÄúThis launch advances our Crypto for Everyone vision,‚Äù said Jamie Elkaleh, CMO of Bitget Wallet. ‚ÄúIt strengthens our role as a comprehensive financial gateway.‚Äù Bitget Wallet plans to expand token and fiat currency support in future updates, continuing to enhance accessibility and user control within the decentralized finance space. MoonPay Adds Support for Revolut Pay Last week, Moonpay announced that it now supports Revolut Pay, a payment method from the major neobank Revolut. MoonPay supports 1-click cryptocurrency purchases using Revolut Pay in the UK and EEA. The team says that this move enables ‚Äúa frictionless way‚Äù to move money from the neobank straight into crypto. Additionally, it simplifies the buying process and transactions for users who have a Revolut account. It eliminates the challenges commonly associated with debit and credit card transactions, they claim. The post Bitget Wallet Launches Fiat Withdrawal Feature in Collaboration with MoonPay appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Wall Street  goes cold on Circle, bets on its historic rally to stall
body: Circle‚Äôs ridiculous 597% stock rally since its IPO in early June might be on the verge of collapsing, and Wall Street is already ringing the alarm. On Friday, President Donald Trump signed the GENIUS Act , a bill designed to regulate stablecoins like USDC, into law. The market had been expecting this, and the hype had fueled Circle‚Äôs massive run. But now that it‚Äôs signed, it‚Äôs looking like a classic case of ‚Äúbuy the rumor, sell the news.‚Äù Compass Point analyst Ed Engle thinks the party is over. On Monday, he downgraded CRCL from neutral to sell, slashing the price target from $205 to $130. That‚Äôs a 40% downside from Monday‚Äôs close. ‚ÄúWhile we expected CRCL to rally into stablecoin legislation, crypto investors typically ‚Äòsell the news‚Äô after highly anticipated events,‚Äù Engle said. ‚ÄúAs such, we expect CRCL to retrace some of its recent rally after the GENIUS act was signed into law on 7/18.‚Äù Trump signs GENIUS Act, Circle bleeds Circle dropped hard following the news. The stock fell 2.8% to $210 in premarket trading. By the closing bell, it had lost 3.4%, ending the day at $216.10. On Friday, just hours before the bill was signed, it peaked at $262.97 before flipping direction and crashing 4.8%. At one point, it even touched $213.33. Now it‚Äôs hanging at $216, with a $53.2 billion market cap, well below its former $80 billion peak. Engle thinks the correction isn‚Äôt just technical. He warned that Circle‚Äôs valuation is unreasonably high, especially for a company facing new regulation and increasing competition. ‚ÄúWe still believe USDC can be an integral part of the financial system; however, we‚Äôre more cautious towards CRCL‚Äôs long-term economics than its $53bn valuation implies,‚Äù he wrote. According to Engle, this is just the beginning of the pressure. He believes Circle will face competitive heat from traditional fintech players and banks. These institutions are expected to enter the stablecoin game later this year, especially through white-label deals and acquisitions. ‚ÄúWe expect more mainstream fintechs and banks to announce competing stablecoins in 2H25, primarily through white-labeling and/or M & A.‚Äù ~ Ed Engle Circle faces limits on growth, integration fees shrinking Also, Circle‚Äôs revenue from blockchain integrations has likely peaked. He noted that USDC is already integrated across 24 different blockchains, and that number probably won‚Äôt grow much. Why? Because many chains can‚Äôt afford the steep integration fees. ‚ÄúThere are only so many chains that can afford these integration fees. As such, we expect this income stream to normalize lower in 2026 and beyond,‚Äù Engle said. That hits one of Circle‚Äôs more unique revenue sources. If those integration payments flatten or drop, it adds even more pressure to maintain its current valuation. That could make the company lean harder on transaction volume or adoption of USDC across retail and enterprise, but neither are sure bets at the moment. While the signing of the GENIUS Act is supposed to be a win for stablecoins, the market clearly didn‚Äôt see it as a win for Circle, at least not immediately. The irony is thick: after months of lobbying for regulation, Circle might now be facing a tighter leash, new rivals, and less runway to expand. At the same time, Fairshake, a crypto-backed political action committee, announced it had $141 million in cash right around the same time the GENIUS vote happened. The timing isn‚Äôt a coincidence. This PAC is pouring money into pro-crypto candidates ahead of the 2026 midterms, hoping to control future regulation. So far, they‚Äôre getting a pretty good return on their investment. Back in Washington, House leadership is planning a second vote on the bill as early as this evening, but no one‚Äôs sure if changes will be made to address concerns from holdouts. Source: TradingView Anyway, Circle‚Äôs surge was so obviously driven by the usual crypto rally ingredients: hype, retail FOMO, and insane speculation. But that kind of momentum doesn‚Äôt last forever, as we saw in 2021 with GameStop. And Circle isn‚Äôt the king of stablecoins. Tether still dominates with a $161.7 billion market cap, and newer players like Paxos are slowly chipping away at the pie. So far, CRCL‚Äôs chart doesn‚Äôt inspire much confidence either. As of press time, volume‚Äôs drying up, price action is turning bearish, and indicators like RSI and OBV suggest bulls are backing off. The RSI dipped to 38, nearing oversold territory, and On-Balance Volume is sitting at just 4.71M, signaling weak buying interest. Price support is barely holding above $215. title: Pump.fun token drops 32% as early backers offload $160M in memecoins
body: The PUMP token from Pump.fun is facing significant price pressure as early investors begin to offload large volumes of tokens onto exchanges. Just one week after its much-hyped launch on July 15, the token has fallen 32% from its initial coin offering (ICO) price, sparking concern over short-term investor sentiment and market liquidity. Two wallets, identified by Solscan as ‚ÄúPUMP Top Fund 1‚Äù and ‚ÄúPUMP Top Fund 2,‚Äù collectively sent over $160 million worth of tokens to centralised exchanges, according to blockchain analytics firm Lookonchain. Lookonchain @lookonchain ¬∑ Follow The $PUMP price has dropped below its private/public sale price of $0.004.‚ÄúPUMP Top Fund 1‚Äù spent 100M $USDC to buy 25B $PUMP at $0.004 in the private sale. So far, he has deposited 17B $PUMP ($89.5M) to exchanges via #FalconX and still hold 8B $PUMP ($29.58M).‚ÄúPUMP Top Fund 3:07 PM ¬∑ Jul 22, 2025 213 Reply Copy link Read 56 replies This has led to a steep decline in token value and raised questions about the token‚Äôs unlock mechanism and post-launch sustainability. $500M ICO and aggressive sell-off fuel rapid decline Pump.fun completed its ICO on July 13, raising nearly $500 million in just 12 minutes. Top Fund 1 acquired 25 billion PUMP tokens for $100 million in USDC and has since deposited 17 billion of those tokens, worth nearly $90 million, to exchanges. Despite the sell-off, the wallet still holds tokens valued at $29.5 million. Meanwhile, Top Fund 2 bought 12.5 billion tokens for $50 million and has already offloaded its entire stash to the market, generating over $71 million. The aggressive dumping by these early backers has coincided with a 46.5% fall in the token‚Äôs value from its all-time high of $0.006812 to a low of $0.003642 on July 22. BitMEX data shows 60% of presale investors sold Data from BitMEX published on July 17 showed that nearly 60% of PUMP presale participants sold or transferred their holdings to exchanges or other wallets within two days of the launch. Around 37.4% continued to hold their tokens, while 3% increased their positions. BitMEX @BitMEX ¬∑ Follow It‚Äôs been almost 1 week since the @pumpdotfun ICOüíäFrom 10,145 participants who contributed $448.5M:‚û°Ô∏è59.6% sold or transferred ‚û°Ô∏è37.4% continue to HODL‚û°Ô∏è3% increased their holdingsOur quant reveals traders are still BULLISH on $PUMP . Read onüëá x.com/BitMEX/status/‚Ä¶ 3:32 PM ¬∑ Jul 17, 2025 14 Reply Copy link Read 5 replies BitMEX analysts noted that PUMP‚Äôs immediate appreciation after launch went against expectations, especially given the high unlock percentage at inception. Tokens with large circulating supplies early in their lifecycle often face sharp sell pressure in derivatives and spot markets, and PUMP appears to be following that trend. Memecoin market hits $87B, then retreats The Pump.fun token‚Äôs trajectory coincides with a broader trend in the memecoin sector. According to CoinMarketCap , total market capitalisation for memecoins peaked at $87 billion on July 21, up 58% from $55 billion at the end of June. However, the rally proved short-lived as the market dipped to $82 billion just one day later, on July 22. Pump.fun‚Äôs market capitalisation currently stands at $1.32 billion, with the token trading at $0.003751, down 11.89% in the past 24 hours. Source: CoinMarketCap Analysts have suggested that the surge in memecoins may reflect a broader lack of appealing investment options elsewhere in the crypto space. Despite this, PUMP‚Äôs performance highlights the risks of tokens with high float percentages and a lack of sustained buyer support after initial excitement fades. The post Pump.fun token drops 32% as early backers offload $160M in memecoins appeared first on Invezz

title: XRP open interest skyrockets over $10 billion
body: XRP is witnessing intense trader engagement this month, propelled by regulatory developments, institutional adoption, and technical breakouts. Together, these growth catalysts have driven the token to a price of $3.55 at the time of writing, a 75.43% increase over the past month. Moreover, as recent data from futures trading and information platform CoinGlass shows, the total XRP futures open interest has also gone up, having hit a staggering $10.94 billion. Total XRP futures open interest. Source: CoinGlass Referring to the total number of outstanding futures or options contracts that have not yet been settled, open interest shows how much capital is currently locked in by traders betting on XRP‚Äôs price movements. When the price rises along with open interest, it often suggests a bullish outlook backed by fresh money entering the market. Why is XRP going up? The momentum follows a broader wave of regulatory and institutional optimism in the wake of the recently passed GENIUS and CLARITY Acts that provided much clearer regulatory frameworks. In addition, the ProShares XRP Futures exchange-traded fund ( ETF ) launch added fresh legitimacy to XRP‚Äôs institutional appeal. Accordingly, traders now eye a sustained hold above $3.55‚Äì$3.60 to confirm the breakout, while a successful retest could potentially pave the way toward a $6 target . Namely, as reported on Finbold, XRP has broken out of a multi-year symmetrical triangle pattern on the daily chart, with a measured target of $6.03. The breakout occurred just after XRP surpassed the critical resistance of $3.66, its highest level in eight years. A daily close above this level could cement bullish momentum, representing a 75% gain from current levels. Supporting the optimistic outlook, the same report suggests the 90-day spot taker cumulative volume delta (CVD) remains positive, indicating sustained dominance of buyer-side pressure since early June. Featured image via Shutterstock The post XRP open interest skyrockets over $10 billion appeared first on Finbold .

title: Husky Inu (HINU) Closes In On $850,000 Milestone
body: Husky Inu (HINU) is closing in on its next fundraising milestone, as it inches closer to the $850,000 mark. The project has seen an uptick in investor interest and could reach the milestone in record time. The project also registered its latest price increase, as the HINU token‚Äôs value rose from $0.00018960 to the current $0.00019015. The next price jump will take the token‚Äôs value to $0.00019070. Husky Inu (HINU) Closing In On Next Milestone Husky Inu (HINU) has gradually raised funds through its presale and the pre-launch phase. While the token price was constant during the presale, the pre-launch phase has seen the project use a progressive pricing strategy, increasing the price of the HINU token every two days. This allows the project to raise funds quickly, while maintaining favorable pricing and empowering its growing community. As a result, the project has crossed crucial landmarks in its fundraising journey, including the $750,000 milestone on May 16 and the $800,000 milestone on June 15. Husky Inu has raised $842,215 so far and remains on track to achieve its fundraising goal of $1.2 million. The project has attracted substantial interest in recent weeks as the crypto markets surge, with Bitcoin (BTC) trading close to its all-time high. The burgeoning interest in the project could allow Husky Inu to reach the $850,000 milestone in record time. Latest Price Increase Takes HINU To $0.00019015 The project also registered its latest price increase, with the HINU token rising from $0.00018960 to $0.00019015. The price increase was the first this week and is part of the project‚Äôs ongoing pre-launch phase, which began on April 2, 2025. The pre-launch phase aims to empower the fledgling Husky Inu community, enabling the project to continue its fundraising efforts as its launch date draws closer. The pre-launch phase is the next step in the project‚Äôs roadmap, allowing it to raise capital to fund platform improvements, ongoing developments, marketing initiatives, and broader ecosystem expansion. Husky Inu (HINU) adopted a dynamic pricing strategy during the pre-launch phase, with the HINU token price rising every two days. This strategy has been instrumental in the project‚Äôs fundraising efforts, helping it cross the $800,000 milestone. The dynamic pricing strategy has helped the project raise funds while maintaining a favorable price for its fledgling community. Markets Stall As Bearish Sentiment Returns Meanwhile, market sentiment cooled after a prolonged rally as Bitcoin (BTC) and other cryptocurrencies registered notable declines. BTC fell to an intraday $116,653 during the ongoing session, before recovering to reclaim $118,000 and move to its current level of $118,520. Ethereum (ETH) also registered a sharp decline after crossing $3,800. The world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency is nearly 3%, trading around $3,693. Ripple (XRP) is down over 2%, while Dogecoin (DOGE) is down almost 3%. Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), Stellar (XLM), Hedera (HBAR), Litecoin (LTC), Toncoin (TON), and Polkadot (DOT) also registered notable declines. However, Solana (SOL) bucked the bearish trend and is up nearly 6%, trading at $199, as it eyes a move past $200. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: South Korea‚Äôs Ruling Party Pushes to Speed Up Bitcoin Laws After U.S. Genius Act
body: The post South Korea‚Äôs Ruling Party Pushes to Speed Up Bitcoin Laws After U.S. Genius Act appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News South Korea is taking big steps to catch up with the changing crypto world. After the United States passed the new GENIUS Act , the law aims to make clearer and safer rules for digital currencies. South Korea‚Äôs ruling party doesn‚Äôt want to be left behind. They have just announced plans to fast-track fresh laws covering Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Why Speeding Up Crypto Laws Matters In a recent tweet post, Bitcoin Archive noted that South Korea‚Äôs ruling party plans to speed up crypto laws after the GENIUS Act in the U.S. The ruling Democratic Party believes faster legislation can protect users better while encouraging new business opportunities. A senior lawmaker said delays aren‚Äôt an option. They want clear rules on how exchanges handle money and stablecoins, and how to stop fraud. Officials say the GENIUS Act proves big economies now take crypto seriously, and South Korea wants to lead, not fall behind. JUST IN: South Korea‚Äôs ruling party reveals plan to accelerate Bitcoin and crypto legislation following the Genius Act pic.twitter.com/I3cz4wVDTY ‚Äî Bitcoin Archive (@BTC_Archive) July 22, 2025 However, their plan focuses on key points such as tax rules, stablecoins, and investor safety. Won-Based Stablecoin in the Works Beyond Bitcoin and Ethereum, South Korea is working on something closer to home, its stablecoin tied to the Korean won . Korea Investment and Securities is leading this push, hoping to launch a won-backed digital currency. The idea is to make everyday payments, money transfers, and even complex financial deals faster and more stable. This move shows how the country is stepping up in the digital finance revolution. Many experts say national stablecoins like this could soon reshape how people send money and pay bills. Growing Public Interest in Cryptocurrencies The popularity of cryptocurrencies in South Korea is growing fast. Currently, over 25% of South Koreans aged 20 to 50 own crypto assets, and about 70% of them plan to increase their investments. Many see digital currencies as an important part of their future savings and retirement plans, showing the increasing role crypto plays in everyday financial lives.

title: Telegram's self-custody crypto wallet goes live in America
body: Telegram has officially rolled out its built-in crypto wallet to users in the United States, according to CNBC. The new feature lets Americans send, receive, and hold crypto right inside the app; no downloads, no browser plug-ins, and no third-party logins needed. It‚Äôs live inside the Telegram interface this week and available to anyone in the U.S. The product is called TON Wallet, and it‚Äôs fully self-custodial, meaning every user manages their own private keys. The tool was built by The Open Platform ( TOP ), which developed the wallet infrastructure on the TON blockchain. Users can send crypto to their contacts with the same ease they send a message, and that‚Äôs the entire point of this rollout: minimal friction, direct transactions, and no centralized control. TON Wallet adds staking, swaps, and fiat ramps to Telegram TOP‚Äôs CEO Andrew Rogozov said the company delayed the wallet‚Äôs U.S. release because of legal uncertainty, but the climate has changed. ‚ÄúWe started considering the U.S. as a more interesting opportunity for us,‚Äù Andrew told CNBC. He pointed to a shift in regulations and Telegram‚Äôs growing user base in the U.S. as the main reasons they moved forward. Andrew said there‚Äôs already a large crypto audience on the app, and the wallet gives users a way to interact with Telegram‚Äôs wider ecosystem. He described it as ‚Äúthe fundamental part of this infrastructure,‚Äù with crypto becoming the core way people store assets and use apps inside Telegram . ‚ÄúOur goal, our mission here, is to remove as much friction as possible,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúAnd this is basically what crypto is trying to solve, especially at the global scale, by removing all the borders.‚Äù Onboarding is built around a split-key system: one half is connected to the user‚Äôs Telegram account, the other to their email. There‚Äôs no need to memorize a seed phrase. ‚ÄúNo need to download the wallet, no need to remember the seed phrase,‚Äù Andrew said. ‚ÄúThis is how we simplify the whole thing.‚Äù Functionality includes peer-to-peer transfers, token swaps, staking for yield, and zero-fee crypto purchases. That last feature is handled through a partnership with MoonPay, which also supports fiat ramps via debit cards. The wallet also connects to Telegram‚Äôs ‚ÄúMini Apps,‚Äù allowing access to decentralized applications within the app itself. Telegram officially stepped away from the TON blockchain in 2020 after legal pressure from the SEC killed its token plans. But the company kept integrating TON features, things like tokenized usernames, collectible stickers, and support for Fragment, a TON-based marketplace. So while Telegram no longer controls the network, it hasn‚Äôt let go of either. With this U.S. launch, TON Wallet enters the same space as Coinbase and Cash App. But unlike those platforms, Telegram already has a direct line to its users. And instead of offering regulated financial services directly, it‚Äôs keeping clear of legal headaches by working with licensed partners like MoonPay for all fiat in-and-out transactions. title: PancakeSwap Base Unleashes Revolutionary Infinity Upgrade
body: BitcoinWorld PancakeSwap Base Unleashes Revolutionary Infinity Upgrade The decentralized finance (DeFi) landscape is constantly evolving, bringing forth innovations that promise greater efficiency, lower costs, and enhanced user experiences. For enthusiasts and participants in this dynamic ecosystem, few announcements resonate as strongly as significant upgrades from leading platforms. Today, we‚Äôre diving into a groundbreaking development that‚Äôs set to redefine how you interact with one of the most popular decentralized exchanges (DEXs): the official launch of PancakeSwap Infinity on the Base network . This isn‚Äôt just another update; it‚Äôs a strategic leap forward, promising a more powerful and cost-effective trading environment for every PancakeSwap Base user. What is PancakeSwap Infinity and Why Base? For years, PancakeSwap has been a cornerstone of the DeFi world, known for its user-friendly interface, vast array of liquidity pools, and innovative features. Built initially on the BNB Smart Chain, it quickly became a go-to platform for swapping tokens, yield farming, and participating in initial farm offerings (IFOs). However, as the DeFi space matured, so did the demand for even greater efficiency and lower transaction costs, especially on high-traffic networks. Enter PancakeSwap Infinity, a significant evolution designed to meet these burgeoning needs. This isn‚Äôt just a facelift; it‚Äôs a fundamental architectural upgrade that brings a host of advanced functionalities. The choice of the Base network for this pivotal launch is strategic. Base, an Ethereum Layer 2 (L2) blockchain incubated by Coinbase, offers a compelling combination of features: Scalability: L2 solutions like Base significantly reduce transaction congestion on the main Ethereum network. Lower Fees: By processing transactions off-chain, Base dramatically cuts down on gas fees, making DeFi more accessible. Security: Inheriting Ethereum‚Äôs robust security, Base provides a reliable and safe environment for decentralized applications. Developer-Friendly: Base‚Äôs compatibility with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) makes it easy for existing dApps to deploy and for new ones to build. By launching PancakeSwap Infinity on Base, the platform aims to leverage these advantages, providing users with a superior trading and liquidity provision experience. This move is a clear indication of PancakeSwap‚Äôs commitment to innovation and its responsiveness to the evolving demands of its community, solidifying its position as a leading DEX for PancakeSwap Base operations. Unlocking Efficiency: How Does PancakeSwap Base Save You Money? One of the most immediate and impactful benefits of PancakeSwap Infinity on Base is the substantial reduction in transaction costs. High gas fees on congested networks have long been a barrier for many users, especially those with smaller capital or those engaging in frequent trades. With this new integration, users can expect significant savings, making their DeFi activities far more economical. Here‚Äôs how PancakeSwap Infinity on Base translates to real savings and enhanced efficiency: Up to 50% Gas Fee Savings: This is a game-changer. By operating on the Base network, PancakeSwap can process transactions at a fraction of the cost compared to the Ethereum mainnet. This means more of your capital stays in your pocket, whether you‚Äôre swapping tokens, adding liquidity, or claiming rewards. For native Ethereum (ETH) swaps, these savings are particularly noticeable, making it a highly attractive option for users looking to optimize their transactions on PancakeSwap Base . Concentrated Liquidity Pools: A core feature of PancakeSwap Infinity is the introduction of concentrated liquidity. Unlike traditional liquidity pools where your capital is spread across the entire price range, concentrated liquidity allows you to provide liquidity within specific price ranges. This offers several advantages: Capital Efficiency: You can earn more fees with less capital, as your funds are actively working within the most traded price ranges. Higher Returns: By focusing your liquidity, you can capture a larger share of trading fees, potentially leading to higher Annual Percentage Yields (APYs). Reduced Impermanent Loss Risk (Potentially): While impermanent loss is always a factor, concentrated liquidity allows for more active management, giving providers tools to mitigate this risk by adjusting their ranges. Simple Liquidity Pool Types: For those who prefer a more hands-off approach, PancakeSwap Infinity still offers the option of simple liquidity pools. This ensures that users, regardless of their expertise or risk appetite, have a suitable option for contributing to the platform‚Äôs liquidity. The flexibility to choose between concentrated and simple pools caters to a wider range of strategies and comfort levels on PancakeSwap Base . These features collectively create a more cost-effective and capital-efficient environment, empowering users to maximize their returns and minimize their expenditures in the fast-paced world of DeFi. Beyond the Basics: Advanced Features for PancakeSwap Base Users PancakeSwap Infinity isn‚Äôt just about saving money; it‚Äôs also about empowering users with greater control and customization over their DeFi activities. The upgrade introduces several advanced features designed to cater to both novice and experienced liquidity providers and traders. Smart Contract Customization: This is a powerful addition for advanced users and developers. PancakeSwap Infinity allows for greater flexibility in interacting with the underlying smart contracts. This can include: Customized Swaps: Potentially allowing for more granular control over swap parameters, though specific details would depend on the implementation. Advanced Liquidity Management: For concentrated liquidity providers, this could mean more sophisticated tools for setting and adjusting price ranges, managing positions, and rebalancing. Integration Opportunities: Developers might find it easier to build custom dApps or bots that interact with PancakeSwap‚Äôs liquidity pools in unique ways. Enhanced User Interface (UI) for Liquidity Provision: While the core announcement focuses on functionality, an ‚Äúupgraded version‚Äù often implies a more intuitive and feature-rich UI. This would make it easier for users to manage their concentrated liquidity positions, monitor their earnings, and adjust their strategies on PancakeSwap Base . Robust Analytics and Data: To effectively manage concentrated liquidity, users need access to comprehensive data. PancakeSwap Infinity is expected to provide enhanced analytics tools that offer insights into pool performance, fee generation, and impermanent loss metrics, helping users make informed decisions. These advanced features move PancakeSwap beyond a simple token swap platform, transforming it into a sophisticated toolkit for serious DeFi participants. The ability to fine-tune strategies and leverage smart contract capabilities positions PancakeSwap Base as a cutting-edge environment for decentralized finance. Navigating the New Frontier: Getting Started with PancakeSwap Base Ready to experience the benefits of PancakeSwap Infinity on the Base network? Getting started is straightforward, especially if you‚Äôre already familiar with connecting your wallet to a DEX. Here‚Äôs a general guide to help you navigate this new frontier: Connect Your Wallet: Ensure your Web3 wallet (e.g., MetaMask, WalletConnect compatible wallets) is set up and connected to the Base network. You might need to add the Base network RPC details manually if it‚Äôs not automatically detected by your wallet. Bridge Assets to Base: If your funds are on Ethereum mainnet or another chain, you‚Äôll need to bridge them to the Base network. Use official bridges or reputable third-party bridges to transfer your ETH or other tokens to Base. Access PancakeSwap Infinity: Navigate to the official PancakeSwap website. Look for the option to switch networks or select ‚ÄúBase‚Äù from the network dropdown. The platform should automatically display the PancakeSwap Infinity interface. Explore Liquidity Options: Once connected, explore the ‚ÄúLiquidity‚Äù section. You‚Äôll now have the choice between ‚ÄúConcentrated Liquidity‚Äù and ‚ÄúSimple Liquidity.‚Äù Take your time to understand the nuances of concentrated liquidity if you‚Äôre new to it, considering the potential for higher returns but also the need for more active management. Start Swapping and Earning: With funds on Base and your chosen liquidity strategy, you can now enjoy lower gas fees for swaps and potentially higher earnings from providing liquidity. Always start with a small amount to get comfortable with the new features and interface. Remember, the DeFi space is dynamic. Always verify official announcements and links to avoid scams. The PancakeSwap community and documentation will be valuable resources as you explore the full capabilities of PancakeSwap Base . Challenges and Opportunities: The Road Ahead for PancakeSwap Base While the launch of PancakeSwap Infinity on Base presents immense opportunities, it‚Äôs also important to consider the potential challenges and the broader implications for the DeFi ecosystem. Every major upgrade and network expansion comes with its own set of hurdles and competitive landscapes. Potential Challenges: User Adoption and Education: While Base offers benefits, attracting a large user base from other chains requires significant effort in education and onboarding, especially for those new to L2 solutions or concentrated liquidity. Competition: The L2 landscape is increasingly crowded, with many DEXs launching or expanding onto various Ethereum scaling solutions. PancakeSwap will need to continuously innovate to maintain its edge. Liquidity Fragmentation: As PancakeSwap expands across multiple chains (BNB Chain, Base, etc.), there‚Äôs a risk of liquidity becoming fragmented, which could impact overall depth and efficiency if not managed effectively. Smart Contract Risks: While audits are standard, any new smart contract deployment carries inherent risks. Users should always be aware of these when interacting with DeFi protocols. Significant Opportunities: Expanded User Base: Tapping into the growing Base ecosystem and attracting users who prioritize low fees and Ethereum-level security. Enhanced Competitiveness: The advanced features like concentrated liquidity and gas fee savings make PancakeSwap a more compelling option against other major DEXs. Innovation Hub: Base‚Äôs developer-friendly environment could foster further innovation and integration within the PancakeSwap ecosystem, leading to new products and services. Future-Proofing: By embracing L2 technology, PancakeSwap is positioning itself for the future of scalable and efficient decentralized finance, ensuring its relevance in a rapidly evolving industry. The successful integration of PancakeSwap Base Infinity will depend on a combination of seamless user experience, continued innovation, and robust community engagement. It marks a significant step towards a more accessible and efficient DeFi future. The launch of PancakeSwap Infinity on the Base network is more than just an announcement; it‚Äôs a testament to the continuous evolution and innovation within the decentralized finance space. By offering revolutionary features like concentrated liquidity, substantial gas fee savings of up to 50%, and advanced smart contract customization, PancakeSwap is empowering its users with unprecedented control and efficiency. This strategic move onto Base not only addresses critical pain points like high transaction costs but also positions PancakeSwap at the forefront of the next generation of DEXs. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned liquidity provider or just starting your DeFi journey, the enhanced capabilities of PancakeSwap Base promise a more rewarding and cost-effective experience. It‚Äôs an exciting time to be part of the PancakeSwap community, as the platform continues to build a more accessible and powerful decentralized financial future for everyone. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Here are some common questions about PancakeSwap Infinity on Base: 1. What is PancakeSwap Infinity? PancakeSwap Infinity is an upgraded version of the PancakeSwap decentralized exchange (DEX) that introduces advanced features like concentrated liquidity pools, significant gas fee savings, and smart contract customization, initially launched on the Base network. 2. What are the main benefits of using PancakeSwap Infinity on Base? The primary benefits include up to 50% gas fee savings when swapping native Ethereum (ETH), the option to use concentrated or simple liquidity pools for enhanced capital efficiency, and access to smart contract customization features for advanced users. 3. How much can I save on gas fees with PancakeSwap Base? Users can save up to 50% on gas fees, especially when swapping native Ethereum (ETH), compared to transacting on the Ethereum mainnet, thanks to PancakeSwap Infinity‚Äôs deployment on the Base Layer 2 network. 4. What is concentrated liquidity, and how does it differ from simple liquidity? Concentrated liquidity allows you to provide capital within specific price ranges, enabling higher capital efficiency and potentially higher fee earnings with less capital. Simple liquidity, on the other hand, spreads your capital across the entire price range, offering a more passive approach but generally lower capital efficiency. 5. Is PancakeSwap Infinity replacing the existing PancakeSwap on BNB Chain? No, PancakeSwap Infinity on Base is an expansion, not a replacement. PancakeSwap continues to operate on the BNB Smart Chain and other networks, offering users more choices and flexibility across different blockchain ecosystems. 6. How do I bridge my assets to the Base network to use PancakeSwap Infinity? You can bridge your assets (like ETH or other tokens) to the Base network using official bridges provided by Base or reputable third-party bridging services. Ensure your Web3 wallet is connected to the Base network before attempting to bridge assets. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your friends and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media! Let‚Äôs spread the word about the exciting new capabilities of PancakeSwap Infinity on Base. To learn more about the latest DeFi trends , explore our article on key developments shaping decentralized exchanges and their future growth. This post PancakeSwap Base Unleashes Revolutionary Infinity Upgrade first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team
