title: Quan2um bans high-risk crypto instruments, launches Shariah-compliant risk framework
body: The Board of Directors of Quan2um , a Slovakia-registered centralised cryptocurrency exchange, today unanimously approved the ManaFair framework 1.0 ‚Äì a comprehensive governance protocol that proactively excludes any digital assets or trading practices deemed to involve gharar (excessive uncertainty) or maysir (speculation/gambling). Effective immediately, Quan2um will neither list high-risk assets nor facilitate leveraged margin trading, futures, options, and other high-risk instruments ‚Äì and will freeze trading in any token whose governance, tokenomics or volatility later breaches the new thresholds. ‚Äú Crypto markets have always carried risk, but the last six months have unleashed a heartbreaking wave of forced liquidations that have wiped out life-savings and torn holes in family finances‚Äîeven on so-called ‚Äòdecentralised‚Äô platforms. When speculation ends in tragedy, it crosses an ethical line. Our mandate under Islamic finance therefore gives us both the clarity and the courage to reject any instrument whose gains are built on such avoidable harm: profit can never be worth that price ,‚Äù said Ilmary Kaya, CEO of Quan2um. How the Framework Works Monthly Heat-Map: Independent risk consultants score every listed asset for volatility, governance quality, collateral backing, market depth and Manafƒ´  ø al-  ø Ayn (tangible, measurable utility). Joint Screening Committee: Risk analysts, Shariah scholars and senior management vote on the admission, suspension or delisting of each asset. Automatic Freeze Triggers: Sudden spikes in leverage, opaque token burns, or meme-driven price surges can pause trading pending review. Public Transparency: A condensed ‚Äúwhite-list / grey-list / red-list‚Äù report will be published each quarter. According to public data from Coinglass, Bitcoin-related liquidations alone exceeded US$ 20 billion during the first half of 2025, with the bulk occurring on large centralised exchanges such as Binance, Bybit and OKX. Quan2um‚Äôs decision positions the platform as a safe harbour for investors seeking exposure to digital assets without the structural risks of high-leverage products. Quan2um is finalising the appointment of an independent Shariah Supervisory Board to oversee ongoing compliance. A detailed description of the ManaFair Framework 1.0 will first be provided to majority shareholders and holders of Quan2um‚Äôs native token, then circulated to all users in the coming months and, finally, published on the company‚Äôs website. About Quan2um Founded in 2019 and headquartered in Bratislava, Quan2um runs a centralised cryptocurrency exchange with more than 80,000 active users. The ecosystem blends blockchain innovation with Islamic-finance principles and philanthropy, offering spot trading, yield-earning EcoMining pools, and transparent channels for distributing zakƒÅt and ·π£adaqah. Quan2um‚Äôs mission is to give Muslims worldwide safe, Shariah-compliant access to the digital economy while empowering them to share their prosperity with those in need. Media: Website: https://q2.eco Email: support@quan2um.com support@quan2um.com The post Quan2um bans high-risk crypto instruments, launches Shariah-compliant risk framework appeared first on Invezz

title: Ethereum price prediction 2025-2031: Will ETH reach $5,000 soon?
body: Key takeaways Ethereum price prediction suggests an average market price of $4,735 by the end of 2025. In 2028, Ethereum is anticipated to trade between $10,005 and $11,875, with an average expected price of $10,291 In 2031, ETH could trade between $45,481 and $53,844 with an average price of $46,769. The Ethereum network, launched in 2015, is a decentralized platform that enables developers to create smart contracts and dApps using blockchain technology without intermediaries, enhancing security. The Ethereum blockchain is accessible to everyone and built to support scalability, programmability, security, and decentralization, allowing for the creation of secure digital technology. Its native digital currency, ether (ETH), and smart contracts have attracted investors‚Äô recognition and interest, while developers appreciate its utility in developing blockchain and decentralized finance applications. It also helps traders trade Ethereum more easily So, what can traders and investors expect in the coming months and years? ‚ÄúIs ETH likely to go up? What will ETH be worth in 5 years?‚Äù Let‚Äôs get into the details by exploring Ethereum‚Äôs price predictions from 2025 through 2031. The MACD lines are converging and the histogram is shrinking, signaling waning bullish momentum and a possible bearish crossover soon. RSI has eased from overbought territory into the mid‚Äërange, suggesting consolidation rather than a fresh surge. A bounce off the middle band or 20 SMA near $3,660 would keep the uptrend intact and open a retest of $3,875. A drop below $3,540 could usher in deeper retracements toward $3,400. On the daily chart Ethereum has rallied sharply to near $3,930 where it is hugging the upper Bollinger Band and its RSI above 80 warns of overbought conditions and a likely cooldown. MACD is peaking and could roll over, suggesting upside exhaustion. On the four‚Äëhour chart the price has already eased off that upper band and is finding support around the 20‚Äëperiod moving average near $3,660, where MACD momentum is waning and the RSI has retreated to neutral levels. Traders should watch for a pullback toward daily support around $3,100 or four‚Äëhour support near $3,540 before resuming the uptrend. Is ETH a good investment? Ethereum is the largest DeFi hub with a vibrant layer-two ecosystem in the crypto market. The blockchain constantly develops, making it a go-to choice for many Web3 developers. ETH, its native token, shows promise, and the possibility of an Ethereum ETF approval makes it favorable for day traders. Over the long term, explore our price predictions. However, the opinions expressed are not investment advice; traders should consider researching before investing. What is a realistic price for Ethereum in 2025? The realistic price for Ethereum in 2025 is around $5,209 at the maximum. What will 1 Ethereum be worth in 2030? One Ethereum is expected to be worth $37,590, maximum in 2030. How high can ETH realistically go? Ethereum‚Äôs price potential depends on multiple factors, including market trends, institutional adoption, network upgrades, and macroeconomic conditions. Realistically, ETH could reach $5,000 to $7,000 in the next bullish cycle if demand increases and Ethereum‚Äôs Layer 2 solutions and scalability improvements boost adoption. If institutional interest strengthens, ETH may push past $10,000 over the long term, especially if Ethereum remains the dominant smart contract platform. However, volatility remains a key risk, with price corrections likely along the way. Regulatory clarity and Ethereum‚Äôs shift to proof-of-stake (PoS) efficiency could also positively influence its long-term valuation. Will ETH reach $10,000? Ethereum is projected to exceed $10,000 as early as 2027, with its potential low starting at $10,003 and a high of $11,875. Will ETH reach $25,000? Ethereum is predicted to surpass the $25,000 level by 2029 and reach a potential high of $25,413. This optimistic outlook is based on Ethereum‚Äôs ongoing development, network security, and increasing adoption. However, cryptocurrency markets are highly volatile, so long-term projections should be cautiously approached. Will ETH reach $40,000? Based on our analysis, Ethereum will likely reach the $40,000 mark. The highest expected price is around $53,844 in 2031. Does Ethereum have a good long-term future? Most well-known altcoins are trading at lower levels, but ETH is trading above its average price of the last two years. However, a positive outbreak can be expected. The ETH/USD pair is expected to reach the $56,126 mark by 2031, so holding it longer can be beneficial. Recent news/ opinion on Ethereum At ETHGlobal, Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin emphasized the urgent need for privacy solutions, urging developers to focus on four critical areas: private money, identity, voting, and messaging. He framed privacy as a civilizational priority, particularly for decentralized applications encouraging the ecosystem to build tools that safeguard individual autonomy in an increasingly digital world. "On a civilizational level, there's quite alot of urgency in us figuring out privacy." @VitalikButerin urges builders at ETHGlobal to focus on 4 key categories of privacy apps to help solve for this: 1) private money 2) private identity 3) private voting 4) private messaging pic.twitter.com/1x49zNiVZm ‚Äî ETHGlobal (@ETHGlobal) May 30, 2025 Ethereum price prediction July 2025 In July 2025, Ethereum is projected to reach a minimum price of $3,772, an average price of $4,125, and a maximum price of $4,243 Price Prediction Potential Low ($) Average Price ($) Potential High ($) July 2025 $3,772 $4,125 $4,243 Ethereum price forecast 2025 Changes within Ethereum itself and the larger market will affect its path in 2025. Vitalik Buterin‚Äôs RISC-V project could make Ethereum‚Äôs infrastructure stronger, which could bring in more developers and make it easier to scale. If Ethereum can successfully roll out protocol upgrades and more people start using Layer 2, momentum could return. Market rules, business integration, and trends in the crypto industry will also be very important. While positive predictions say prices could reach $6,000, bearish conditions could bring ETH down to $4,578. By 2031, prices may surge and trade at $43,075. Ethereum historic price sentiment ETH price history | Coingecko Ethereum began trading at $1.83 on March 13, 2016. By June 16, it surged to $14.48, surpassing a $1B market cap, but it dropped 45% to $11.33 on June 18 due to the DAO hack. By December 5, after a hard fork, the price fell further to $6.83. Ethereum recovered to $46.35 by March 16, 2017, and soared to $401.49 by June 12, during the ICO boom. It dipped to $157.36 by July 16 but rebounded to $253 by September 15. Ethereum surpassed $1,000 in January 2018 but dropped to $91.01 by December. Prices remained volatile between 2020‚Äôs high of $735 and low of $130. ETH value decreased further in March as it dipped to the $2000 range. At the end of March, ETH further declined and traded at $1,827. At the start of April, ETH traded at $1,917. Ethereum ended April at $1786. At the start of May, the ETH price is trading between $1804 and $1867 Ethereum ended May at $2,521. In June, ETH is trading between $2,483 and $2,521. As of the beginning of July, Ethereum price is currently trading at $2,441.

title: BONK Holds Key Support as Volatility Grips Market
body: BONK traded in a wide 8% range from $0.0000328 to $0.0000358 between July 21 and July 22, ultimately falling 4% lower at $0.00003494 . Despite the decline, the Solana-based meme token demonstrated resilience by defending key support at the $0.000033 level, where heavy trading volume signaled strong buyer interest. A sharp rally saw BONK briefly spike to its daily high before retreating on profit-taking, as more than 100 billion tokens changed hands. Investor sentiment was shaped by several developments, including a $11.4 million BONK transfer to Binance by Galaxy Digital after building a $30 million position, and Binance‚Äôs removal of its ‚ÄúSeed Tag‚Äù risk label on BONK - an indicator of increasing institutional confidence. The BonkFun platform also continued to lead the memecoin launchpad sector, generating $19.3 million in fees for the second consecutive week. While short-term volatility remains elevated, the ability to maintain key technical support levels suggests underlying strength in BONK's market structure as it navigates renewed interest from both retail and institutional participants. title: Internet Computer Slides Amid Broader Altcoin Pullback
body: Internet Computer (ICP) dropped 4.85% to $5.9149 on Tuesday, posting a low of $5.81 after peaking at $6.25 the previous day. Despite bullish headlines - a new partnership between Internet Computer developers DFINITY Foundation and indexing firm Maestro - the token succumbed to broad market rotation out of altcoins, including AI- and DeFi-linked assets. Read more: Solana Defies Market Drop, Touches $200 as Altcoins Retreat: Crypto Daybook Americas Maestro's infrastructure, funded by DFINITY, aims to build a Bitcoin metaprotocol index on the Internet Computer, enabling institutional-grade access to Ordinals and Runes , two of the most prominent primitives in the Bitcoin DeFi ecosystem. However, technical action reflected a more pessimistic short-term outlook. After opening at $6.2230, ICP steadily declined, breaking below $6.00 around 01:00 UTC and accelerating losses toward $5.83 support. Volume swelled above 1.3 million tokens during this segment, signaling large selling pressure, according to CoinDesk's technical analysis data model. ICP fell 2% from $5.97 to $5.87 during the U.S. morning, with concentrated sell pressure visible as the price pierced multiple support zones. Despite a brief rebound attempt near $6.02, the token failed to reclaim bullish footing, suggesting short-term momentum remains with the bears unless the $6.00 resistance is convincingly reclaimed, the data showed. Technical Analysis Highlights Price Range: $5.8105‚Äì$6.2488, representing 7.3% intraday spread. Volume: 1.94 million tokens traded; highest during breakdown below $5.90. Resistance: Strong rejection at $6.00‚Äì$6.02 range with no sustained breakout. Support: Critical base formed at $5.83‚Äì$5.87 amid heavy buying interest. From 13:09 to 14:08 UTC, ICP fell 2%, driven by sharp volume spikes exceeding 50K tokens/minute. Volatility: Full-day spread of $0.4383 reflects heightened intraday instability. title: PUMP Price Crashes Below Key Level, More Pain Ahead?
body: TL;DR PUMP price breaks major support, traders now eye $0.0024 as the next likely target. Funds begin offloading tokens after the price dips below the private and public sale entry point. Bullish wedge pattern hints at a possible 50% rally if the asset reclaims the upper resistance zone. Support Break Signals Deeper Slide Pump.fun (PUMP) has dropped below a key support at $0.004035. This level had acted as a base over the past few sessions, with multiple attempts to hold. On July 22, the asset failed to stay above the zone, then attempted a brief recovery, but the rejection confirmed a bearish setup. As of press time, PUMP was trading at $0.00371. That marks a decline of nearly 15% over the last 24 hours and more than 34% in the past week. Moreover, it has now fallen below its private and public sale price of $0.004. Lookonchain data shows that two major funds, which bought in at that level, have already moved large portions of their holdings to exchanges. One sent 17 billion tokens, while the other has offloaded its entire 12.5 billion allocation. The $PUMP price has dropped below its private/public sale price of $0.004. ‚ÄúPUMP Top Fund 1‚Äù spent 100M $USDC to buy 25B $PUMP at $0.004 in the private sale. So far, he has deposited 17B $PUMP ($89.5M) to exchanges via #FalconX and still hold 8B $PUMP ($29.58M). ‚ÄúPUMP Top Fund‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/xibWUaCOxz ‚Äî Lookonchain (@lookonchain) July 22, 2025 Analyst CryptoPatel pointed to a likely move toward the $0.0024 level, which sits roughly 40% below current price levels and aligns with a previous demand area. Bearish Pressure Builds, Bulls Wait Notably, the recent breakdown mirrors a similar move from July 14‚Äì16, when the price fell by over 40%. The current pattern suggests that sellers remain in control. Unless PUMP reclaims the zone between $0.004035 and $0.004061, the trend remains tilted to the downside. This range now acts as resistance. In contrast to the bearish scenario, another analyst, Captain Faibik, shared a different chart. Their view shows a bullish ‚ÄúPO3‚Äù pattern alongside a falling wedge on the 1-hour chart. These structures, when confirmed, often result in a move to the upside. Source: X The chart outlines a shift from accumulation to manipulation, with the asset now hovering at the edge of a potential distribution zone. If the wedge breaks upward, the price could rally by as much as 50%, according to Faibik‚Äôs projection. Kraken Airdrop and Token Loss Event Pump.fun held a $500 million ICO on July 13, which sold out in 12 minutes. However, some users could not complete their purchases. Kraken confirmed it will airdrop PUMP tokens to affected accounts. Separately, one user accidentally burned 10 million tokens worth around $75,000 through a wallet operation shortly after launch. Data shows the coins were removed either by a default tool or user error. The post PUMP Price Crashes Below Key Level, More Pain Ahead? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Gamified Onboarding Done Right: What Makes FUNToken‚Äôs Flow So Effective
body: FUNToken is targeting the massive global market of 3 billion mobile gamers by building a seamless, reward-driven onboarding process that feels more like play than crypto adoption. That effort is already paying off: not only in user growth but also in strong price performance and market trust. Real-Time Price and Market Context FUNToken currently trades around $0.0100, with a 24‚Äëhour trading volume of approximately $15 million and a market cap near $108 million. This pricing reflects consistent investor confidence linked to steady utility adoption across gaming, DeFi, and community engagement channels. Explosive Community Growth and User Adoption FUNToken‚Äôs onboarding mechanics have translated into robust community momentum. The AI-powered $FUN Telegram bot now boasts over 105,000 active users, growing at approximately 12% weekly, while its Telegram group maintains an average daily activity rate of 15% among 95,000+ members. This rapid growth underscores the appeal of FUN‚Äôs gamified entry: immediate value, fun interactions, and consistent rewards. Active and engaged, the community fuels network effects - where first-time participants often bring in others once they see real utility and daily incentives. How FUNToken Makes Onboarding Easy and Rewarding FUNToken‚Äôs onboarding process is engineered to blend gaming familiarity with immediate gratification through clear, gamified actions: 1. Instant Engagement with AI Rewards Bot The AI-powered Telegram bot acts as a virtual tutorial and reward engine. New users can join the chat, participate in simple tasks - like quizzes or emoji reactions - and immediately earn $FUN. The bot already has 100,000+ active users, creating structured habit loops around token interaction. This low-friction entry keeps users curious and invested from Day One. 2. Educational but Fun Progression Rather than overwhelming new participants, the onboarding flow introduces wallet setup, token rewards, and in-game actions gradually. Users unlock a ‚Äòquestline‚Äô - such as spinning the bot‚Äôs reward wheel, earning staking tokens, and eventually exploring mobile gameplay - without ever needing advanced crypto knowledge. 3. Bridge to Gaming Without Complexity By integrating play immediately, FUNToken removes roadblocks for mobile gamers. The roadmap highlights the launch of a mobile wallet in Q3‚ÄìQ4 2025 which will enable easy in-app staking and token swaps. As soon as users feel comfortable with the bot, they naturally transition to deeper use: swapping and staking to prepare for upcoming gameplay. 4. Revenue-Backed Burn Reinforces Value Every reward given out leads to real economic impact. Since FUNToken burns 25 million $FUN from quarterly revenue. This ensures user rewards aren‚Äôt inflationary. This integration of reward and burn mechanics builds trust in the system‚Äôs long-term viability. Built on Security and Transparency Onboarding only works when users trust the system. FUNToken secures its platform through: ‚óè A CertiK audit of smart contracts, which confirmed immutability and no minting backdoors.‚óè Continuous monitoring with CertiK Skynet, ensuring live contract integrity.‚óè Transparent burn execution each quarter using revenue-generated tokens, not reserves or investor funds. This builds a confidence cycle: safe onboarding attracts users, user activity grows revenue, revenue funds burn, and burns support token scarcity, which in turn builds trust. Market Performance Reflects Onboarding Success This onboarding design is moving markets. FUNToken currently trades around $0.0100‚Äì$0.0118, with a market cap near $108‚Äì$121 million and daily trading volumes ranging from $7 million to over $15 million. Analysts attribute this momentum not only to the revenue-backed 25M burn, but also to strong engagement through the Telegram AI bot and certainty provided by the CertiK audit. These factors together have elevated FUNToken from a speculative token to a utility-rich ecosystem with measurable retention and growth. Roadmap Driving Continuous Progress The onboarding flow is closely aligned with roadmap milestones: Timeline Onboarding & Utility Activations Q3‚ÄìQ4 2025 Launch mobile wallet with gas-free token swaps and staking for deeper engagement Q4 2025 Expansion to 30 games connected to in-app wallet and bot experiences Q1 2026 Expansion to 1 million wallets as gaming and AI experiences mature Each step is designed to expand the funnel: bot ‚Üí wallet ‚Üí game. Users are gradually integrated into more serious utility as they gain experience and confidence. Why FUNToken‚Äôs Approach Works FUNToken‚Äôs onboarding design has not only attracted a growing community but has also contributed directly to the project‚Äôs market resilience and price appreciation. Over the past month, the token has experienced one of its most sustained periods of positive momentum to date. Here are some of the core reasons why this approach works. Mobile-friendly:One of the most important reasons FUNToken‚Äôs onboarding flow resonates with such a broad audience is that it feels familiar to anyone who has used a messaging app or a casual game. The entire process happens within Telegram and mobile interfaces, eliminating the need for complex external wallets or complicated seed phrase setups at the start. New users can create a basic account, engage with the AI bot, and start earning rewards all from their smartphones. This mobile-first approach is especially well suited to the global gaming community, which overwhelmingly prefers intuitive, app-based experiences over desktop-heavy workflows. Immediate rewards:Unlike many token ecosystems that require a steep learning curve before any tangible value appears, FUNToken delivers immediate incentives. As soon as users join the Telegram community and complete simple tasks, they receive $FUN tokens credited to their in-app balance. This creates a powerful feedback loop: people see value on day one, which motivates them to continue participating. It also lowers psychological barriers, making blockchain feel approachable and rewarding instead of abstract or intimidating. Clear progression:FUNToken treats onboarding as a structured journey rather than a single event. New users start by completing straightforward activities with the Telegram bot, which acts almost like a tutorial level in a game. Over time, they unlock more advanced interactions, such as learning how to stake tokens or preparing to use the upcoming mobile wallet. This progression mirrors the leveling systems familiar to gamers. It keeps engagement high because users can see their own advancement, track milestones, and experience a sense of accomplishment as they learn. Scarcity baked in:The final piece that makes FUNToken‚Äôs onboarding especially effective is the assurance that all these rewards are underpinned by a transparent deflationary model. With quarterly burns funded by platform revenue, including the recent 25 million FUN burn, users know that tokens earned today will not be constantly diluted by hidden supply increases. CertiK‚Äôs audit and Skynet monitoring reinforce this confidence by verifying that the contract is immutable and free of minting functions. As a result, new participants can trust that as adoption grows, scarcity also grows, supporting the long-term value of their tokens. Bottom Line FUNToken‚Äôs gamified onboarding is more than a marketing gimmick. It combines real incentives, structural design, and economic fairness. By targeting mobile gamers with reward loops that feel intuitive and ensuring those rewards support deflation, FUNToken is creating a self-sustaining adoption engine. title: Legal Expert Discredits XRP Escrow Dump Theory, Cites SEC‚Äôs Stance
body: Prominent Australian legal expert and XRP advocate Bill Morgan has issued a sharp rebuttal to the persistent belief that Ripple‚Äôs escrow system is being used to suppress XRP prices by systematically dumping tokens on retail investors. In a recent thread on X, Morgan cited both historical data and regulatory findings to dismantle what he labeled the ‚Äúmoronic escrow dump theory.‚Äù Ripple‚Äôs Escrow: Then and Now Morgan began his commentary by posting a side-by-side comparison of Ripple‚Äôs XRP escrow holdings over time. In late 2017, Ripple placed 55 billion XRP into escrow to assure the market of a structured and predictable release. As of mid-2025, that number has dropped to 35 billion, demonstrating Ripple‚Äôs adherence to its monthly release policy. The post drew criticism from X user Qubic 1, who mocked XRP holders for believing in the escrow‚Äôs integrity, saying, ‚ÄúHave fun being dumped on.‚Äù In response, Morgan clarified that even the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission did not share that view. Even the SEC recognised that the escrow was intended to buttress the price of XRP not deflate it. The SEC considered this to be one of the factors that would give investors an expectation of profits from the efforts of ripple. It is one of the scores of grounds I have posted to‚Ä¶ https://t.co/JcT6xCpFiY ‚Äî bill morgan (@Belisarius2020) July 22, 2025 SEC‚Äôs Recognition of Escrow‚Äôs Price-Stabilizing Intent According to Morgan, the SEC explicitly acknowledged during its multi-year litigation against Ripple that the purpose of the XRP escrow was to buttress the price of the token, not depress it. ‚ÄúEven the SEC recognised that the escrow was intended to buttress the price of XRP, not deflate it,‚Äù Morgan wrote. He further noted that the SEC cited this as one of the factors contributing to investor expectations of profit from Ripple‚Äôs efforts, a key argument in its broader case alleging that Ripple sold XRP as an unregistered security. This is an important distinction, Morgan argued, because the SEC‚Äôs recognition of the escrow‚Äôs stabilizing intent contradicts the theory that Ripple is using the mechanism to harm investors. Transparent Distribution, Not Market Dumping Ripple introduced the XRP escrow system in 2017 with a smart contract that locked up 55 billion XRP, releasing 1 billion XRP monthly over 55 months. Unused tokens are returned to the escrow, effectively creating a rolling lockup. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Morgan has consistently argued that Ripple‚Äôs use of the escrow has been transparent and predictable. The company routinely discloses its XRP holdings and sales in quarterly reports, with most sales directed toward institutional clients using Ripple‚Äôs On-Demand Liquidity (ODL) platform, not through open-market retail channels. Despite this transparency, the ‚Äúdump‚Äù narrative persists among certain segments of the crypto community. For Morgan, the irony is that critics are accusing Ripple of behavior even the SEC didn‚Äôt attribute to it. ‚Äú An Uber Thread?‚Äù Maybe, Maybe Not Morgan closed his response with a tongue-in-cheek comment, suggesting he might compile all his arguments against the escrow dump theory into one comprehensive post. ‚ÄúMaybe I should collate all the grounds into one Uber, but can I be bothered?‚Äù he mused. Whether or not that thread materializes, Morgan‚Äôs stance is clear: the escrow dump theory has no basis, legal reasoning, or regulatory interpretation. Backed by years of legal scrutiny and regulatory documentation, the XRP escrow mechanism remains one of the most transparent token distribution systems in the industry, and a far cry from the speculative claims still circulating online. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: Solana DeFi Rebirth: TVL Breaks Past $14 Billion Amid Price Surge
body: Solana‚Äôs price rally reached a new milestone on Monday. SOL traded at $195.50 per coin, pushing the total valuation to over $105 billion for the first time since January‚ÄØ25. Related Reading: Too Pricey? Expert Says XRP Beats Bitcoin And Ethereum Right Now That jump reflects growing optimism around the token. Short‚Äëterm gains have been strong, but questions remain about how deep the recovery really runs. DeFi TVL Rises With Price Based on reports, Solana‚Äôs total value locked in DeFi hit $14.18 billion. That‚Äôs the highest level in six months, back to where it stood in January when SOL first reached its all‚Äëtime high. A big chunk of that gain comes from the token‚Äôs own price climbing. When SOL moves up, every coin locked in lending pools and vaults gets worth more on paper. Users haven‚Äôt needed to rush in and lock fresh tokens to boost TVL numbers. The overall ecosystem feels larger. Yet true usage growth may be slower than those headline figures suggest. Experts are keeping a close eye on how many new deposits actually show up. After all, token value and real‚Äëworld demand don‚Äôt always rise at the same pace. DEX Trading Activity Shows Uptick Between July‚ÄØ14 and July‚ÄØ20, Solana‚Äôs decentralized exchanges handled over $22 billion in trading volume. That‚Äôs up from close to $19 billion the week before. Raydium led with $8.4 billion, followed by Orca at almost $6 billion and Meteora at $5.3 billion. Based on data, traders are coming back. But weekly volumes still sit far below the $98 billion peak set in mid‚ÄëJanuary. That gap signals a market that‚Äôs warming up but not yet boiling over. Volume gains show renewed interest among active users. It also hints that fresh strategies and new tokens may be finding feet after a slower spell. Staking Dominates Network Security According to on‚Äëchain figures, about 355‚ÄØmillion SOL remain staked with validators. That stake is worth roughly $69 billion, or about 65% of all tokens in circulation. Those coins aren‚Äôt counted in DeFi TVL or in DEX volumes. Instead, they‚Äôre busy securing the network and validating transactions. Related Reading: XRP Over Everything? Expert Tells New Investors To Go All In Meanwhile, SOL is predicted to increase another 3.50% and hit $210 by August‚ÄØ21, 2025. Sentiment is currently bullish while the Fear & Greed Index is at 71 (Greed). In the past 30 days, SOL experienced 19/30 green days and 8.61% price fluctuations, indicating both strength and volatility in today‚Äôs market, data from CoinCodex shows. title: US Justice Department has dropped its criminal investigation into Kraken founder Jesse Powell
body: U.S. federal authorities, the FBI, have dropped an investigation into crypto exchange Kraken founder and former CEO Jesse Powell, over his dispute with art center Verge. The DOJ has reportedly ordered the FBI to return all electronic devices seized from its raid on Powell‚Äôs Brentwood Los Angeles residence in 2022. According to government documents seen by Fortune on Monday, the US Department of Justice concluded its probe on Powell, who was accused of illegally accessing digital accounts belonging to Verge Center for the Arts, a nonprofit he co-founded in Sacramento in 2007. The FBI searched Powell‚Äôs Brentwood residence in March 2022 and took dozens of laptops and devices. It was acting on claims made by Verge that Powell had blocked access to emails and Slack channels used by the organization. Powell proves Verge‚Äôs accusations were false In July 2023 , The New York Times published a report that confirmed the FBI was investigating the 45-year-old Kraken founder. At the time, he was accused of interfering with the nonprofit‚Äôs communications systems and stalking members of the group through their digital footprint. Investigators from the FBI and the US Attorney‚Äôs Office for the Northern District of California had been looking into the matter since at least fall 2021. Powell‚Äôs lawyer, Brandon Fox, confirmed the allegations were ‚Äúin no way related to Mr. Powell‚Äôs employment or his conduct in the crypto business.‚Äù In response to the government‚Äôs dropped investigations this week, Fox said the Department of Justice sent them a ‚Äúdeclination letter‚Äù stating the case was now closed. ‚Äú We sought the letter to help offset the damage done to Jesse‚Äôs reputation and to Kraken‚Äôs operations in a highly regulated industry, ‚Äù Fox told reporters. Powell has been denying the accusations both in court and in the press, and even filed a civil lawsuit in 2024 at the California state court, in which he propounded that Verge board members were conducting a power grab. ‚Äú I did not hack or stalk anyone, or cut off access to the accounts ,‚Äù Powell wrote in the court filing. ‚Äú Verge executives conspired to remove me from the board, and quietly put in place a new domain name and created new workplace accounts before doing so.‚Äù According to Powell, the devices seized by the FBI have messages and internal memos from Verge that corroborate his statements. ‚Äú The FBI‚Äôs raid on my house was devastating both personally and professionally . It is still shocking that the raid was premised on Verge Center for the Arts‚Äô baseless accusations against me. I knew that I had done nothing wrong, and discovery in my defamation case against Verge has shown this is undeniable, ‚Äù he told NYT. Per court filings, Powell sued two members of Verge‚Äôs board for failing to turn over documents during the discovery process. One of them is Phil Cunningham, the nonprofit‚Äôs legal counsel, who wrote to Kraken about the former CEO‚Äôs ‚Äúmisconduct‚Äù in the Verge. His attorneys argue that Cunningham broke the law by withholding documents in the organization‚Äôs case against Powell, which could exonerate the latter. According to Powell‚Äôs attorneys, the public revelation of the case caused reputational harm to the American entrepreneur. Kraken‚Äôs rough relationship with law enforcement The 45-year-old crypto businessman was cleared of the Verge‚Äôs accusations, but Kraken has been fined severally by US financial authorities for breaking regulatory laws. In 2023, Kraken paid a $360,000 fine in a settlement with the Treasury Department for violating US sanctions and allowing users in Iran to conduct crypto transactions. Then, in February 2024, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) fined the exchange $30 million over an investment product the agency found to be unregistered securities. Meanwhile, Nasdaq-listed biotech company Windtree Therapeutics has formed a partnership with the exchange to oversee its BNB-based crypto treasury operations, the two firms announced on Tuesday. Under the agreement, Kraken will provide custody services, facilitate trading, and handle over-the-counter (OTC) execution of Windtree‚Äôs BNB holdings. title: Federal Reserve‚Äôs Future: Trump‚Äôs Shocking Prediction for Jerome Powell‚Äôs Exit
body: BitcoinWorld Federal Reserve‚Äôs Future: Trump‚Äôs Shocking Prediction for Jerome Powell‚Äôs Exit The world of finance and politics often intertwines in fascinating, and sometimes startling, ways. Recently, a statement from former U.S. President Donald Trump sent ripples through economic circles, reigniting debates about the independence of central banks and the future of monetary policy. According to a report by the Walter Bloomberg economic news account on X, Trump made a bold prediction: Jerome Powell, the current Chairman of the Federal Reserve , will soon be out of his position. This isn‚Äôt just political banter; it carries significant weight for markets, including the dynamic cryptocurrency space. Unpacking the Rumor: Trump‚Äôs Stance on the Federal Reserve and Jerome Powell Donald Trump‚Äôs pronouncements have a unique way of capturing attention, and his latest remarks regarding Jerome Powell are no exception. The report, circulating via the well-known Walter Bloomberg economic news account on X, suggests an imminent change at the helm of the U.S. central bank. Trump‚Äôs history with Powell is well-documented; during his presidency, he frequently expressed dissatisfaction with the Federal Reserve‚Äôs interest rate decisions, often advocating for lower rates to stimulate economic growth. This recent statement is a continuation of that narrative, signaling his persistent desire for a more accommodative monetary policy. But why does this matter so much? The Chairman of the Federal Reserve is arguably one of the most powerful economic figures globally. Their decisions on interest rates and monetary policy profoundly influence everything from borrowing costs for homes and businesses to the valuation of assets across all markets, including the often-volatile cryptocurrency market. Trump‚Äôs declaration, therefore, isn‚Äôt just a political soundbite; it‚Äôs a potential harbinger of significant shifts in economic strategy. The Federal Reserve‚Äôs Pivotal Role: Guardians of the Economy? To understand the gravity of Trump‚Äôs statement, it‚Äôs crucial to grasp the role of the Federal Reserve . Often referred to simply as ‚Äòthe Fed,‚Äô it serves as the central bank of the United States. Its primary mandates, set by Congress, are to achieve maximum employment and maintain stable prices (i.e., control inflation). The Fed uses several tools to achieve these goals, most notably adjusting the federal funds rate, which influences interest rates throughout the economy. A cornerstone of modern central banking is the concept of independence. The idea is that monetary policy decisions should be made free from short-term political pressures, allowing the Fed to make tough choices that might be unpopular but are necessary for long-term economic stability. However, this independence has always been a point of contention, especially when presidents disagree with the Fed‚Äôs direction. Trump‚Äôs repeated criticisms of Powell and the Fed‚Äôs rate hikes during his term highlighted this tension vividly. His latest comment reignites the debate: how much influence should political leaders have over the institution tasked with safeguarding economic stability? The 1% Interest Rate Debate: What Does it Mean for the Federal Reserve and You? Beyond the prediction of Powell‚Äôs departure, Trump also stated that interest rates should be maintained at 1%. This is a significantly lower target than current rates and represents a clear philosophical stance on monetary policy. For context, the Federal Reserve typically adjusts rates to either cool down an overheating economy (by raising rates) or stimulate a sluggish one (by cutting rates). Trump‚Äôs call for 1% rates aligns with the views of some prominent figures, including Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, who recently asserted that the Fed ‚Äòshould be cutting rates now.‚Äô What are the potential implications of such a low-interest-rate environment? For Borrowers: Lower rates mean cheaper loans for mortgages, car loans, and business investments, potentially stimulating spending and economic activity. For Savers: Low rates can erode the returns on savings accounts and fixed-income investments, making it harder for individuals to grow their wealth through traditional means. Inflation Concerns: Extremely low rates, especially if maintained for prolonged periods, can lead to inflationary pressures as money becomes cheaper and more abundant. Asset Bubbles: Cheap money can sometimes inflate asset prices (stocks, real estate, and even cryptocurrencies) beyond their fundamental value, creating the risk of bubbles. The debate between stimulating growth through low rates and guarding against inflation and asset bubbles is a complex one that the Federal Reserve constantly navigates. A move to 1% would signal a significant shift towards a highly accommodative stance. Navigating the Ripple Effect: How Potential Federal Reserve Changes Impact Markets, Especially Crypto Any significant shift in the leadership or policy direction of the Federal Reserve sends tremors through global financial markets. Investors closely watch the Fed‚Äôs signals, as they dictate the cost of capital and the overall economic outlook. Here‚Äôs how potential changes could play out: Traditional Markets: Lower interest rates generally make stocks more attractive by reducing borrowing costs for companies and making future earnings more valuable in present terms. Bond yields would likely fall, potentially leading to capital gains for existing bondholders but lower returns for new investors. The Dollar: Lower interest rates can weaken the U.S. dollar, as it makes dollar-denominated assets less attractive to foreign investors seeking higher yields. Cryptocurrency Market: This is where it gets particularly interesting for our readers. Historically, periods of low interest rates and quantitative easing have often coincided with bull runs in the crypto market. When traditional investments offer lower returns, investors tend to seek out higher-risk, higher-reward assets like Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. A consistently low-rate environment could potentially fuel greater interest and investment in digital assets, viewing them as an alternative store of value or a hedge against inflation (though this is debated). However, it‚Äôs not a simple one-to-one correlation. Market sentiment, regulatory developments, and technological advancements within the crypto space also play crucial roles. Still, the underlying monetary policy set by the Federal Reserve acts as a powerful current, influencing the tides of the broader financial ocean. The Road Ahead: Challenges and the Future of the Federal Reserve If Donald Trump‚Äôs prediction were to materialize, the transition would undoubtedly be scrutinized. A new Federal Reserve Chairman, especially one appointed with a clear mandate for lower rates, would face a multitude of challenges. These include managing inflation expectations, maintaining the Fed‚Äôs credibility on the global stage, and navigating potential political pressures. The implications extend beyond just the U.S. economy. The Federal Reserve‚Äôs actions have a ripple effect worldwide, influencing global capital flows, exchange rates, and commodity prices. The ongoing debate highlights the delicate balance between political accountability and the need for an independent central bank capable of making sound, long-term economic decisions. Conclusion: Awaiting the Next Chapter in Federal Reserve Leadership Donald Trump‚Äôs recent statements regarding Jerome Powell and the Federal Reserve have once again thrust the crucial role of central bank independence into the spotlight. While the immediate future remains uncertain, his words underscore the potential for significant shifts in U.S. monetary policy. Whether Powell‚Äôs tenure concludes soon or not, the conversation around interest rates and the Fed‚Äôs autonomy will undoubtedly continue to shape economic discourse. For investors, particularly those in the dynamic crypto market, understanding these potential shifts is paramount to navigating the evolving financial landscape. Keeping a close watch on developments at the Federal Reserve will be key to anticipating market movements and making informed decisions. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. Who is Jerome Powell and what is his significance? Jerome Powell is the current Chairman of the Federal Reserve , the central bank of the United States. He is one of the most influential economic figures globally, as his decisions on interest rates and monetary policy directly impact the U.S. and global economies, affecting everything from inflation to employment and asset prices. 2. What is the Federal Reserve‚Äôs primary role? The Federal Reserve‚Äôs primary role, as mandated by Congress, is to foster maximum employment and maintain price stability (control inflation). It achieves this through various tools, including setting the federal funds rate, which influences broader interest rates, and conducting open market operations. 3. How do interest rates affect the economy and crypto markets? Lower interest rates generally make borrowing cheaper, stimulating economic activity and making riskier assets (like stocks and cryptocurrencies) more attractive as traditional savings offer lower returns. Conversely, higher rates can slow down the economy and make safer investments more appealing, potentially drawing capital away from crypto. 4. What does ‚ÄúFed independence‚Äù mean? ‚ÄúFed independence‚Äù refers to the idea that the Federal Reserve should be able to make monetary policy decisions free from short-term political pressures. This is intended to ensure that decisions are based on long-term economic stability rather than political expediency. 5. Has a U.S. President tried to remove a Fed Chair before? While U.S. Presidents have often expressed disagreements with Federal Reserve Chairs, attempts to remove a Chairman before their term ends are extremely rare and highly controversial. Historically, the Fed‚Äôs independence has largely been respected, though political tensions can certainly arise. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your network on social media to spark further discussion about the future of the Federal Reserve and its impact on the global economy and crypto markets! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Federal Reserve‚Äôs Future: Trump‚Äôs Shocking Prediction for Jerome Powell‚Äôs Exit first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Bitcoin Promoter Strategy (STR) Market Cap Is Being Miscalculated, According to TD Cowen Analysts! Here's Why
body: TD Cowen countered criticism that Strategy‚Äôs (STR) market capitalization should be indexed solely to Bitcoin assets, stating that this approach is logically flawed. TD Cowen: Strategy's Premium Value Justified by Bitcoin Capital Cycle Analysts argue that the company's aggressive share issuance increases investors' stake in the stock rather than diluting it. Strategy's market capitalization currently stands at $124.3 billion, with a total Bitcoin holding of approximately $72 billion. This puts the company's trading premium over its net asset value (NAV) at 72.6%. TD Cowen analysts Lance Vitanza and Jonnathan Navarrete say this premium cannot be explained by the ‚Äúbig fool theory.‚Äù ‚ÄúCritics argue that Strategy's valuation is based solely on another investor in the market buying at a higher price. But this is an incomplete perspective that ignores both its business model and its capital deployment strategy,‚Äù they said. According to TD Cowen, the Strategy increases the amount of Bitcoin per share by channeling low-cost capital into Bitcoin. This strategy provides an advantage that neither individual investors nor competing institutional firms can easily replicate. It emphasizes that the company is able to raise capital through low-interest borrowing at 0.421%, which directly translates into Bitcoin returns. 900,000 BTC Target in 2027 Last week, Strategy raised $739.8 million through the sale of 1.6 million new shares and three preferred stock issuances as part of its $21 billion at-the-market program. With this capital, it purchased 6,220 Bitcoins at an average price of $118,940. According to TD Cowen, this transaction increased the company's BTC per share by 20.8% compared to January 1st. While maintaining its $680 target price for Strategy shares, TD Cowen predicts the company could reach 900,000 BTC by the end of 2027. This amount equates to 4.3% of the all-time Bitcoin supply. The company also opened a new funding stream on Monday with the launch of a fourth series of perpetual preferred stock called Stretch (STRC). With reserves of 607,770 BTC as of July 21, Strategy is currently the world's largest publicly traded Bitcoin holder. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Bitcoin Promoter Strategy (STR) Market Cap Is Being Miscalculated, According to TD Cowen Analysts! Here's Why

title: Unveiling Diplomacy: Trump‚Äôs Reported China Visit Sparks Global Speculation
body: BitcoinWorld Unveiling Diplomacy: Trump‚Äôs Reported China Visit Sparks Global Speculation In a development that has sent ripples across global political and financial landscapes, former U.S. President Donald Trump has reportedly stated that he received an invitation to visit China from President Xi Jinping. This revelation, initially reported by ‚ÄòSolid Intel on X‚Äô, immediately ignited widespread speculation about the future of U.S.-China relations and its potential ramifications for international markets, including the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies. Understanding the Context: What Does a Potential Trump China Visit Mean? The prospect of a Trump China visit is not just a diplomatic courtesy; it‚Äôs a potential watershed moment given the complex history between the two global superpowers. During his presidency, Trump‚Äôs approach to China was characterized by significant trade disputes, technological competition, and heightened rhetoric. A new visit, if it materializes, could signal a shift in diplomatic engagement or simply be a strategic maneuver ahead of a potential U.S. presidential election. Here‚Äôs why this news is particularly significant: Historical Precedent: Trump‚Äôs previous interactions with China were often confrontational, aiming to rebalance trade deficits and address intellectual property concerns. A new visit could either continue this assertive stance or explore avenues for de-escalation. Global Economic Impact: U.S.-China relations profoundly influence global trade, supply chains, and economic stability. Any sign of rapprochement or renewed tension can trigger market reactions worldwide. Geopolitical Chessboard: Beyond economics, the relationship touches on sensitive geopolitical issues, including Taiwan, the South China Sea, and human rights. A high-level meeting could signal intentions on these fronts. The Ripple Effect: How Geopolitics Influences Financial Markets It‚Äôs no secret that major geopolitical events send tremors through financial markets. The news of a potential Trump China visit is no exception. Investors often react to uncertainty by moving capital into perceived safe-haven assets, or by pulling back from riskier ventures. This dynamic is particularly relevant for the cryptocurrency market, which, despite its decentralized nature, is not immune to macroeconomic and geopolitical forces. Consider the following: Scenario Potential Market Reaction (General) Potential Crypto Market Reaction Increased Stability/Rapprochement Positive sentiment, increased investment in growth assets, stronger global trade. Reduced volatility, potential for steady growth as investor confidence rises in broader markets; increased institutional interest. Heightened Tensions/Conflict Negative sentiment, flight to safety (e.g., gold, U.S. dollar), market downturns. Increased volatility; Bitcoin might be seen as a digital safe haven in some circles, while altcoins could suffer; regulatory scrutiny might intensify. Uncertainty/No Clear Outcome Sideways trading, cautious investment, wait-and-see approach. Choppy markets, price discovery, trading volumes might fluctuate as participants await clarity. What Does This Mean for Your Crypto Portfolio? For cryptocurrency enthusiasts and investors, the implications of a significant geopolitical event like a potential Trump China visit are multifaceted. While crypto markets are often driven by their own internal dynamics, they are increasingly influenced by macro trends. A stable global environment generally fosters risk-on appetite, which can benefit cryptocurrencies. Conversely, escalating tensions can lead to a flight from risk, impacting crypto prices. Here are some key considerations: Bitcoin as a Digital Gold? In times of geopolitical uncertainty, Bitcoin‚Äôs narrative as ‚Äòdigital gold‚Äô often gains traction. Some investors might view it as a hedge against traditional market instability or currency devaluation. Altcoin Volatility: Smaller, less established altcoins tend to be more volatile and can experience sharper price swings during periods of market stress. Regulatory Landscape: Geopolitical shifts can sometimes influence regulatory attitudes towards cryptocurrencies. Increased international cooperation or tension might lead to different approaches to crypto regulation. Navigating the Unknown: Actionable Insights for Investors In a world where political developments can rapidly shift market sentiment, staying informed is paramount. While it‚Äôs impossible to predict the exact outcome of a potential Trump China visit , investors can adopt strategies to mitigate risks and capitalize on opportunities. Consider these actionable insights: Diversify Your Portfolio: Don‚Äôt put all your digital eggs in one basket. A diversified crypto portfolio can help spread risk across different assets. Stay Informed: Keep a close eye on geopolitical news, not just crypto-specific updates. Major political shifts can have a delayed but significant impact on your holdings. Risk Management: Implement stop-loss orders and define your risk tolerance. Volatility is a given in crypto, and external shocks can amplify it. Long-Term vs. Short-Term: Decide if you are a long-term hodler or a short-term trader. Geopolitical events often create short-term noise that can be irrelevant for long-term strategies. Consider Stablecoins: In periods of high uncertainty, parking some capital in stablecoins can provide a temporary refuge from volatility, allowing you to re-enter the market when clarity emerges. The Broader Picture: Beyond the Headlines While the immediate focus is on the invitation itself, the broader implications extend to the ongoing global power dynamics. A visit could be an exploratory step towards dialogue, a means to exert influence, or simply a strategic move in the intricate dance of international diplomacy. For the crypto community, understanding these macro forces is crucial because they shape the economic environment in which digital assets operate. The future of global trade, technological innovation, and even currency stability are all intertwined with the relationship between these two economic giants. The reported invitation serves as a powerful reminder that the world is interconnected. What happens in the halls of power can reverberate through trading floors and, ultimately, impact the value of your digital assets. As the narrative around this potential visit unfolds, market participants will be watching closely, ready to adapt to whatever new chapter U.S.-China relations might bring. Summary: A New Chapter in Global Relations? The reported invitation from Chinese President Xi Jinping to former U.S. President Donald Trump for a visit to China marks a significant moment in international relations. While details remain sparse, the mere possibility of a Trump China visit has sparked considerable debate and speculation about its potential impact on global markets, trade policies, and geopolitical stability. For the cryptocurrency sector, such events underscore the importance of understanding macro-level influences, as shifts in U.S.-China dynamics can introduce volatility or create new opportunities. As always, informed decision-making and a well-thought-out strategy remain key for navigating the evolving landscape of both traditional and digital finance. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Has the Trump China visit been officially confirmed? A1: As of the latest reports, the invitation has been stated by Donald Trump, as reported by ‚ÄòSolid Intel on X‚Äô. An official confirmation from either the U.S. or Chinese government regarding the visit‚Äôs scheduling or details has not yet been widely publicized. Q2: How might a potential Trump China visit affect global trade? A2: A visit could either signal a thawing of trade tensions, potentially leading to new agreements or relaxed tariffs, or it could highlight persistent disagreements, maintaining or even escalating trade disputes. The outcome would significantly impact global supply chains and commodity prices. Q3: Why is this news relevant to cryptocurrency investors? A3: Major geopolitical events, especially involving economic superpowers like the U.S. and China, can cause significant volatility in traditional financial markets. This volatility often spills over into the crypto market, influencing investor sentiment, capital flows, and the perception of digital assets as safe havens or risk-on investments. Q4: What are the biggest challenges in U.S.-China relations that a visit might address? A4: Key challenges include trade imbalances, intellectual property rights, technological competition (especially in areas like AI and semiconductors), human rights issues, and geopolitical disputes concerning Taiwan and the South China Sea. A visit could be an attempt to address any or all of these complex issues. Q5: What should crypto investors do in response to such geopolitical news? A5: Investors should prioritize staying informed about both geopolitical developments and their potential macroeconomic impacts. Diversifying portfolios, implementing risk management strategies, and understanding the long-term vs. short-term implications of market movements are crucial. Avoid making impulsive decisions based solely on headlines. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it with your network on social media. Your support helps us continue providing timely and relevant analysis on the intersection of geopolitics and digital finance! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action . title: Dogecoin Price Prediction: DOGE Clears Key Resistance ‚Äì $10 Next Target?
body: The Dogecoin price has fallen by 2% in the past 24 hours, with the meme token dropping to $0.2667 on a day of correction for major tokens. Despite its slip, DOGE remains up by 39% in the past week and by 70% in the last 30 days, after the market benefitted from the passage of the GENIUS Act and growth in ETF inflows . And what‚Äôs particularly bullish for Dogecoin is that it has very recently cleared a key resistance level on its one-week chart, indicating that it has now entered a growth phase. Given its ongoing popularity as a meme token, and given the overall trajectory of the market right now, this points to a strong Dogecoin price prediction for the rest of the year, and beyond. Dogecoin Price Prediction: DOGE Clears Key Resistance ‚Äì $10 Next Target? Looking at DOGE‚Äôs one-week chart, we see that its indicators are beginning to recover from oversold positions. Its relative strength index (yellow) has recently risen over 50, and looks like it could be on its way to 70 or higher, bringing the Dogecoin price with it. Source: TradingView Perhaps even more encouragingly, Dogecoin‚Äôs MACD (orange, blue) is close to turning positive again, after spending several months in a negative position. And as noted above, the Dogecoin price has cleared the descending channel its tops and bottoms had formed since December. This is a strong indication of a breakout, although some perspective is in order, since we have seem similar patterns in the past, without a new top emerging. For instance, its big rally in 2021 saw a peak in the MACD just before July, but subsequent bounces (after July) failed to restore the coin to the ATH it achieved in May. It‚Äôs therefore arguable that something similar could happen this time around, and that despite clearing a resistance level, the Dogecoin price may not return to the $0.466 level it posted in early December. Like if you believe #Dogecoin can hit $1 before August 2025! $DOGE $1 pic.twitter.com/FvrvtNVBUq ‚Äî ElonMusk / Parody (@elonmuskTODAYY) July 20, 2025 Despite this possibility, the Dogecoin community is remaining hopeful that the meme token will rise to new highs as a result of this apparent breakout, with some setting a target of $1 before Q4. This is ambitious, but given that DOGE retains the support of entrepreneur Elon Musk, there‚Äôs always a chance that it could benefit from a big pump sooner or later. Based on this possibility, and based on the assumption that the market will finish 2025 strongly, a more realistic prediction may be $0.4 by Q4, and $0.6 by 2026. They can then choose how much to wager on this prediction, while also selecting how much leverage to use, so as to multiply their potential winnings (as well as their potential losses). It‚Äôs as simple as that, with users then able to watch as their selected crypto either rises or falls. They can cash out at any time, while they can also set stop loss orders in order to limit liabilities. This whole process doesn‚Äôt actually involve the purchasing or selling of any crypto, meaning that it gives users exposure to crypto without having to hold any. title: Kraken BNB Treasury: Pioneering $200M Biotech Partnership Unlocks New Crypto Era
body: BitcoinWorld Kraken BNB Treasury: Pioneering $200M Biotech Partnership Unlocks New Crypto Era In a groundbreaking move that signals a significant shift in corporate finance, Nasdaq-listed biotech firm Windtree Therapeutics has forged a strategic alliance with leading cryptocurrency exchange Kraken. This isn‚Äôt just another partnership; it‚Äôs a bold leap into the digital asset space, specifically centered around a substantial Kraken BNB treasury plan. For those closely watching the convergence of traditional finance and the crypto world, this development offers a fascinating glimpse into the future. What‚Äôs Behind the Windtree-Kraken Alliance? Exploring the Kraken BNB Treasury Windtree Therapeutics, known for its innovative work in developing therapies for acute cardiovascular and pulmonary diseases, has decided to diversify its corporate treasury by including a substantial allocation to BNB, the native cryptocurrency of the BNB Chain. This strategic decision to establish a Kraken BNB treasury isn‚Äôt merely speculative; it represents a calculated move to explore new avenues for asset management and potential growth in a rapidly evolving financial landscape. The initial phase of this ambitious program involves managing a $60 million allocation, with the potential to scale up to an impressive $200 million. This expansion, however, is contingent upon crucial shareholder and regulatory approvals, underscoring the careful and compliant approach Windtree is taking. CoinDesk, a reputable source in crypto news, first brought this significant development to light, highlighting the growing trend of traditional companies exploring digital assets. Why Are Traditional Firms Embracing Crypto Treasury Strategies? The decision by a biotech firm like Windtree to establish a Kraken BNB treasury isn‚Äôt an isolated incident but rather indicative of a broader trend. Companies are increasingly looking beyond traditional fiat currencies and fixed-income assets for their treasury management for several compelling reasons: Diversification: Adding crypto assets like BNB can provide diversification away from traditional market volatilities and inflation risks. Potential for Growth: While volatile, cryptocurrencies offer significant upside potential that traditional assets might not. Technological Advancement: Embracing digital assets aligns companies with cutting-edge financial technologies and the broader Web3 movement. Accessibility and Liquidity: Major cryptocurrencies offer 24/7 liquidity, which can be advantageous for treasury operations. Inflation Hedge: Some view cryptocurrencies, particularly those with capped supplies, as a potential hedge against inflation. For Windtree, integrating a Kraken BNB treasury could mean leveraging the growth potential of the digital asset space to enhance its financial resilience and long-term strategic positioning. Kraken‚Äôs Critical Role: Custody, Trading, and OTC Services for the Kraken BNB Treasury Kraken‚Äôs selection as the partner for Windtree‚Äôs Kraken BNB treasury plan speaks volumes about its reputation and capabilities in the institutional crypto space. As one of the oldest and most trusted cryptocurrency exchanges, Kraken brings a robust suite of services essential for managing a corporate crypto treasury: Service Provided Significance for Windtree‚Äôs Kraken BNB Treasury Custody Kraken will securely hold Windtree‚Äôs BNB assets, employing industry-leading security measures like cold storage, multi-signature wallets, and robust auditing protocols to protect against theft and unauthorized access. This is paramount for institutional trust. Trading Facilitating efficient buying and selling of BNB on Kraken‚Äôs highly liquid exchange. This allows Windtree to execute its treasury strategy with minimal slippage and ensures they can enter or exit positions effectively. OTC Services Over-the-Counter (OTC) services are crucial for large institutional trades. Kraken‚Äôs OTC desk will enable Windtree to execute significant BNB transactions without impacting the broader market price, providing tailored liquidity and privacy. The provision of these comprehensive services ensures that Windtree can manage its Kraken BNB treasury with the same level of professionalism and security expected in traditional financial markets, bridging the gap between legacy systems and the digital economy. Navigating the Regulatory Landscape: What‚Äôs Next for the Kraken BNB Treasury? The path to fully realizing the $200 million Kraken BNB treasury plan is not without its hurdles. As reported, the expansion is subject to both shareholder and regulatory approval. This highlights the ongoing evolution of how traditional regulatory bodies perceive and govern digital assets. Shareholder approval signifies the need for transparency and consensus within the company regarding such a significant strategic shift. It ensures that the board and investors are aligned with the potential risks and rewards associated with holding a substantial amount of cryptocurrency. Regulatory approval, on the other hand, is crucial for legitimacy and compliance. As jurisdictions worldwide grapple with defining crypto‚Äôs legal status, firms like Windtree must navigate a complex web of existing financial regulations and emerging crypto-specific rules. This careful, phased approach by Windtree, seeking explicit approvals, sets a precedent for other publicly traded companies considering similar ventures, emphasizing prudence and adherence to governance standards. The Broader Impact: Institutional Adoption and the Future of Finance The partnership between Windtree Therapeutics and Kraken for a Kraken BNB treasury strategy is more than just a corporate decision; it‚Äôs a testament to the growing mainstream acceptance of cryptocurrencies. This move signals several key trends: Increased Institutional Confidence: When a Nasdaq-listed biotech firm, traditionally conservative in its financial management, opts for crypto, it sends a strong signal of confidence to the broader institutional market. Diversification Beyond Bitcoin: While Bitcoin has often been the first choice for corporate treasuries (e.g., MicroStrategy, Tesla), Windtree‚Äôs choice of BNB indicates a growing comfort with a wider array of established altcoins. BNB‚Äôs utility within the Binance ecosystem and its significant market capitalization likely played a role in this decision. Demand for Enterprise-Grade Crypto Services: Kraken‚Äôs involvement underscores the critical need for secure, compliant, and professional services tailored for institutional clients. This demand will likely drive further innovation and maturation in the crypto service provider sector. Blurring Lines Between Traditional and Digital Finance: Partnerships like this accelerate the integration of crypto into mainstream financial operations, potentially leading to new financial products, investment vehicles, and treasury management strategies. This development suggests that the question is no longer ‚Äòif‚Äô but ‚Äòwhen‚Äô and ‚Äòhow‚Äô more traditional companies will integrate digital assets into their balance sheets. What Does This Mean for the Crypto Landscape? For the crypto community, Windtree‚Äôs Kraken BNB treasury move is unequivocally positive. It provides further validation of cryptocurrencies as legitimate assets for corporate treasuries, potentially inspiring other companies to follow suit. This increased institutional participation can lead to greater market stability, liquidity, and overall legitimacy for the crypto space. It also highlights the importance of regulatory clarity. As more companies consider similar strategies, the pressure on regulators to provide clear guidelines will intensify, which could ultimately benefit the entire industry by fostering a more predictable and secure environment for digital asset adoption. Conclusion: A New Horizon for Corporate Finance The partnership between Windtree Therapeutics and Kraken to manage a substantial Kraken BNB treasury marks a significant milestone in the journey of digital assets towards mainstream acceptance. It exemplifies a forward-thinking approach to corporate finance, embracing diversification and the potential for growth offered by the crypto market. While challenges remain, particularly concerning regulatory clarity and market volatility, this bold step by Windtree, supported by Kraken‚Äôs robust infrastructure, paves the way for a new era where digital assets play an increasingly integral role in corporate treasury management. This alliance is not just a financial transaction; it‚Äôs a powerful statement about the evolving nature of value and investment in the 21st century. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the primary purpose of Windtree Therapeutics establishing a Kraken BNB treasury? A1: Windtree Therapeutics aims to diversify its corporate treasury and potentially enhance asset growth by strategically allocating funds into BNB, managed through Kraken‚Äôs secure custody, trading, and OTC services. Q2: How much is Windtree Therapeutics investing in its BNB treasury initially, and what is the potential maximum? A2: Windtree has initially allocated $60 million for its BNB treasury. The program has the potential to expand significantly, reaching up to $200 million, pending necessary approvals. Q3: What specific services will Kraken provide for Windtree‚Äôs Kraken BNB treasury? A3: Kraken will provide comprehensive services including secure custody of BNB assets, efficient trading capabilities on its exchange, and specialized Over-the-Counter (OTC) services for large-volume transactions to minimize market impact. Q4: Why is shareholder and regulatory approval important for the expansion of the Kraken BNB treasury? A4: Shareholder approval ensures internal consensus and transparency for a major financial strategy. Regulatory approval is crucial for compliance with existing financial laws and emerging cryptocurrency regulations, ensuring the legitimacy and legality of holding digital assets. Q5: How does Windtree‚Äôs adoption of a Kraken BNB treasury reflect broader trends in corporate finance? A5: It signifies a growing trend among traditional companies to diversify beyond fiat currencies, explore new growth avenues, and embrace technological advancements in digital assets, indicating increased institutional confidence in the crypto market. Q6: Is BNB a common choice for corporate treasuries, or is this unique? A6: While Bitcoin has been a more common choice for corporate treasuries in the past, Windtree‚Äôs selection of BNB is notable and reflects a growing comfort among institutions with a broader range of established, high-market-cap altcoins, signaling diversification beyond just BTC. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it with your network! Your shares help us bring more in-depth analyses of the evolving crypto landscape to a wider audience. Let‚Äôs keep the conversation going! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping institutional adoption. title: TON Wallet Launches in US, Bringing Crypto Features to Telegram Users
body: TON Wallet is now available to American users. This is a crypto wallet built into the Telegram messenger. Users can now send, receive, store, and withdraw crypto assets directly within the app. Telegram users in the US have gained access to the TON Wallet, a crypto wallet built into the app. This information was confirmed by the TON Foundation. The TON Wallet is a non-custodial crypto wallet developed by The Open Platform (TOP) on The Open Network (TON) blockchain in 2023. With this US launch, local users will be able to send, receive, and store crypto assets directly in the messenger. According to a release obtained by CNBC , this is the first such move in the US market. TOP had planned the expansion for some time but was unable to proceed earlier due to regulatory restrictions. Access to the TON Wallet will also allow users to interact with the broader Open Network ecosystem through mini-apps. Andrew Rogozov, CEO of TOP, told CNBC that the goal of this solution, as well as the company's mission as a whole, is to simplify and democratize access to crypto assets. ‚ÄùYou don't need to download a wallet or remember a seed phrase. That's how we simplify everything,‚Äù he noted. TON Wallet also allows users to restore access if they lose their key. Part of the seed phrase is linked to the user's Telegram account, and the other part is linked to their email, Rogozov noted. Deposits and withdrawals are handled through intermediaries, most notably MoonPay. TON Wallet can also offer built-in financial products, including staking.

title: Coinbase and PNC Bank team up to offer crypto to bank clients
body: PNC Bank, a top regional banking provider in the United States, and Coinbase, the largest US-based cryptocurrency exchange, have announced a strategic partnership that will see the bank‚Äôs customers access cryptocurrencies via their accounts. The partnership between Coinbase and PNC Financial Services Group will allow PNC clients to to buy, sell and hold crypto through their bank‚Äôs account. Collaboration between the two market giants, with PNC the seventh-largest bank in the country, comes amid a growing foray into the digital assets ecosystem by major banks and other financial markets behemoths. PNC plans to tap into Coinbase‚Äôs Crypto-as-a-Service solution to allow the bank to secure and scale its crypto offering, with clients able to buy, hold and sell Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies directly with their PNC accounts. Big news for PNC Bank clients Coinbase shared the huge news via its X account, with the initiative also capturing headlines from mainstream media. ‚ÄúThe easier we can make it to buy and hold crypto, the faster adoption happens,‚Äù said Coinbase founder and chief executive officer Brian Armstrong. ‚ÄúExcited to be working with PNC Bank, one of the largest banks in the US, to give their clients easy access to buying and holding crypto and using USDC, powered by Coinbase.‚Äù Brett Tejpaul, head of Coinbase Institutional, also commented on the partnership as one that will benefit both the crypto exchange and PNC. The deal supports PNC‚Äôs entry into the crypto market, with the bank set to leverage the exchange‚Äôs suite of crypto tools and solutions to bring the best of cryptocurrency to a growing clientele. Coinbase üõ°Ô∏è @coinbase ¬∑ Follow Customers of one of the largest banks in the US wanted easier access to crypto.So we‚Äôve partnered with them to make it happen. @PNCBank clients will soon be able to buy, sell and hold crypto. Watch on Twitter View replies 5:58 pm ¬∑ 22 Jul 2025 745 Reply Copy link Read 95 replies In a comment, PNC chairman and chief executive officer William Demchak said: ‚ÄúPartnering with Coinbase accelerates our ability to bring innovative, crypto financial solutions to our clients. We will also provide PNC‚Äôs best-in-class banking services to Coinbase. This collaboration enables us to meet growing demand for secure and streamlined access to digital assets on PNC‚Äôs trusted platform.‚Äù Crypto-friendly US PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. is a publicly-listed company on the New York Stock Exchange. It offers diversified financial services via various institutions in the US. Notably, its retail and business banking solutions include asset-based lending products, corporate banking, real estate finance and wealth management. Banks and large financial institutions continue to embrace crypto. Overall optimism has surged as the regulatory landscape in the US shifts markedly from what it was during the four years of Joe Biden‚Äôs administration. One of the moves is banking regulators softening their stance on banks engaging in crypto activities. Fresh regulations such as the GENIUS Act are also encouraging Wall Street, with cryptocurrencies recently rallying amid the exuberance. All this comes as the US looks to become the crypto capital of the world under President Donald Trump. The post Coinbase and PNC Bank team up to offer crypto to bank clients appeared first on Invezz
