title: Unveiling the Exciting iOS 26 Beta 4: Liquid Glass and AI News Summaries Return
body: BitcoinWorld Unveiling the Exciting iOS 26 Beta 4: Liquid Glass and AI News Summaries Return In the fast-paced world of technology, where every update can redefine our digital interactions, Apple continues to push boundaries. The recent arrival of iOS 26 beta 4 marks another significant step, bringing refinements that promise a more intuitive and visually appealing user experience. For those navigating the dynamic crypto space, staying informed with reliable and timely news is paramount. This latest Apple software update, with its re-introduced AI-powered news summaries and stunning Liquid Glass redesign, offers a glimpse into how our devices are evolving to meet these demands, ensuring that even the most complex information is accessible at a glance. Unpacking the Latest iOS 26 Beta 4 Features Apple‚Äôs release of the fourth developer beta for its upcoming major software update, iOS 26 beta 4 , introduces several notable changes. This release, arriving just before the public beta, is crucial for mobile app developers to ensure their applications are compatible and optimized for the new operating system. For years, Apple has offered public betas following its Worldwide Developers Conference in June, allowing eager iPhone users to experience new features early, albeit with fewer stability issues than the initial developer releases. This latest developer beta largely mirrors what users can anticipate in the forthcoming public beta. Key initial changes in iOS 26 beta 4 include: A new ‚ÄòWelcome‚Äô splash screen upon updating the software. Introductory screens for various core features, such as Siri and its enhanced AI-powered notification summaries and prioritization options. A revamped Camera app, signaling potential improvements to photo and video capabilities. The Return of AI News Summaries: A Cautious Comeback One of the most discussed features in the iOS 26 beta 4 is the re-introduction of AI-powered notification summaries for news. Earlier this year, Apple had to pause this feature following a significant complaint from the BBC. The British broadcaster reported that the AI had misrepresented one of its headlines, falsely claiming that Luigi Mangione, charged with the murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, had died by suicide. This incident highlighted the critical need for accuracy in AI-generated content. In response to these concerns, Apple committed to releasing a software update that would clarify when text displayed was an AI summarization. The setup screen for this AI summarization feature, which is still in beta, now includes a clear warning message under the ‚ÄòNews & Entertainment‚Äô section. This warning states: ‚ÄòSummarization may change the meaning of the original headlines‚Äô and explicitly advises users to ‚ÄòVerify information.‚Äô This transparent approach aims to mitigate potential misinformation, emphasizing user responsibility in confirming facts, a vital aspect for any user, especially those relying on quick updates for financial decisions in the crypto market. Liquid Glass Redesign: A Visual Evolution The Liquid Glass redesign continues to be a central focus of Apple‚Äôs user interface refinements in iOS 26 beta 4 . This design language, characterized by its transparent and dynamic elements, has seen continuous adjustments throughout the beta cycle. While beta 3 had reportedly pulled back on some of the more transparent aspects in certain applications, beta 4 appears to reverse this trend, reintroducing more of the signature transparency. Testers have observed updates across various native applications, including the App Store, Photos, and Apple Music, indicating a broader application of the Liquid Glass aesthetic. A notable enhancement is seen in the Notification Center, which now incorporates a dynamic tint that adjusts as users scroll through notifications. This subtle but effective change aims to improve visual comfort and readability, making notifications less intrusive and more integrated with the overall user experience. The background behind notifications now gradually darkens as you read, enhancing text visibility and reducing eye strain, a testament to Apple‚Äôs commitment to refined user interaction. Beyond the Core: New Apple Software Enhancements Beyond the headline features, Apple software updates in iOS 26 beta 4 include additional visual and functional improvements that contribute to a more polished user experience. One such enhancement is the introduction of a new dynamic wallpaper. This wallpaper changes colors, adding a fresh and personalized touch to the device‚Äôs home and lock screens. Additionally, new CarPlay wallpapers have been added, providing more customization options for users on the go, ensuring consistency in design across Apple‚Äôs ecosystem. Alongside the release of iOS 26 beta 4 , Apple also rolled out new versions of its other operating system betas. These include iPadOS 26 beta 4, macOS 26 beta 4, watchOS 26 beta 4, tvOS 26 beta 4, visionOS 26 beta 4, and Xcode 26 beta 4. This simultaneous release across multiple platforms underscores Apple‚Äôs unified development strategy, ensuring that all its devices benefit from the latest innovations and improvements, from performance enhancements to minor bug fixes, even if full release notes are not immediately available. What These iPhone Updates Mean for You These latest iPhone updates in iOS 26 beta 4 offer a compelling preview of what‚Äôs to come for the broader user base. For everyday users, the refinements in Liquid Glass mean a more visually comfortable and integrated interface. The re-introduction of AI news summaries, coupled with clear warnings, empowers users to get quick information while also being mindful of verifying critical details, a practice that aligns well with the need for due diligence in any fast-moving information environment, including cryptocurrency markets. While developer betas are primarily for app makers, the stability and feature set of beta 4 suggest that the upcoming public beta will provide a robust experience for those eager to try out the new software. The continuous refinement of features like dynamic wallpapers and CarPlay enhancements further illustrate Apple‚Äôs dedication to an ecosystem that is both powerful and user-friendly. Users can anticipate a more refined, intuitive, and visually appealing experience when iOS 26 officially launches in the coming months, solidifying Apple‚Äôs position at the forefront of mobile innovation. The release of iOS 26 beta 4 showcases Apple‚Äôs ongoing commitment to evolving its core operating system. From the refined aesthetics of Liquid Glass to the cautious re-introduction of AI-powered news summaries, these updates are designed to enhance both functionality and user experience. As Apple moves closer to the public launch of iOS 26, these beta releases provide valuable insights into the future of mobile technology, emphasizing innovation, user control, and visual sophistication. To learn more about the latest AI news trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI models features. This post Unveiling the Exciting iOS 26 Beta 4: Liquid Glass and AI News Summaries Return first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: FBI Drops Criminal Probe Into Kraken Founder Jesse Powell
body: Federal authorities have dropped a criminal investigation into Jesse Powell, co-founder and former CEO of cryptocurrency exchange Kraken. The FBI investigation, which began in 2023, was looking into the non-profit Verge Center for the Arts' allegations that Powell hacked its computer accounts and obstructed access to emails . His home was also searched when the investigation began and computers, laptops and cellphones were seized at the time, the New York Times reported last year. In April this year, federal prosecutors informed Powell's attorney Brandon Fox that the government had concluded its investigation into the Verge allegations and it was not bringing criminal charges against Powell, documents filed to the Superior Court of the State of California on Monday showed. Prosecutors also said at the time they would return the devices they had seized from Powell's home, Fox said. On June 9, his lawyer later received a letter from the U.S. Attorney‚Äôs Office for the Northern District of California confirming that the federal government had closed this investigation on April 8 this year. Fox initially asked for this letter to be sent to Powell. ‚ÄúThe FBI's raid on my house was devastating both personally and professionally. It is still shocking that the raid was premised on Verge Center for the Art‚Äôs baseless accusations against me," Powell said in a statement. "I will continue to pursue the appropriate legal remedies against those who created this disaster by making false statements to law enforcement,‚Äù he added. The closure of the case comes as Kraken weighs the possibility of an initial public offering by the first quarter of 2026 . Powell stepped down as the exchange's CEO in 2023 according to his LinkedIn, but remains on its board of directors. Kraken remains one of the largest U.S.-based crypto exchanges and has been the target of increased regulatory scrutiny in recent years. In 2023, it settled with the Securities and Exchange Commission and shut its U.S. staking services. Parts of this article was generated with assistance from AI tools and reviewed by our editorial team to ensure accuracy and adherence to our standards . For more information, see CoinDesk‚Äôs full AI Policy .

title: Internet Computer has dropped 4.85% as volume has swelled above 1.3 million tokens
body: Today, Internet Computer (ICP) has dropped 4.85% to $5.91, posting a low of $5.81 after peaking at $6.25 yesterday. However, this is across the board. The last 24 hours have painted a vivid picture of market volatility, with major liquidation volumes in the crypto market. ICP fell 2% from $5.97 to $5.87 during the US morning, with concentrated sell pressure visible as the price pierced multiple support zones. Volume swelled above 1.3 million tokens during this segment. ICP can't seem to close the day above $6.22, even after caffeine ai. This was the 4th attempt. Not trying to FUD, but, if it can't break up, it might break down :). Actually, it could also continue to consolidate. The lower end of the channel, btw, is below $5! pic.twitter.com/dyvvFbc6Ef ‚Äî ICP Informer (@icpinformer_x) July 22, 2025 Even after a brief rebound attempt near $6.02, the token failed to reclaim a bullish footing. Data suggested that short-term momentum remains with the bears unless the $6.00 resistance is convincingly reclaimed. Bullish headlines give bearish results Maestro, the infrastructure provider for Bitcoin DeFi, has been awarded a grant from the DFINITY Foundation to build an enterprise-grade, native Bitcoin metaprotocol indexer for ICP. The partnership creates a fast ICP canister that can give real-time info on Ordinals and Runes within ICP‚Äôs Bitcoin integration. Maestro Co-Founder and CEO Marvin Bertin said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm thrilled to collaborate with the DFINITY Foundation to extend ICP‚Äôs Bitcoin integration with secure Runes and Ordinals indexing necessary for financial apps like Liquidium and Odin.fun. This partnership further strengthens ICP‚Äôs lead in the Bitcoin DeFi ecosystem and unlocks new functionality for users.‚Äù More than 1,000 developers have worked with Maestro‚Äôs infrastructure, which runs more than 200 apps. The indexer will be fully open-sourced. This will give developers a strong and clear way to make native Bitcoin apps for everything from DeFi to games. VP of Growth at the DFINITY Foundation said, ‚ÄúNow we‚Äôre able to provide developers with direct, trustless access to Ordinals and Runes data to further enable the massive wave of innovation that relies on Chain Fusion‚Äôs unique ability to interact with Bitcoin without bridges or intermediaries.‚Äù Even after the bullish headlines, the token succumbed to broad market rotation out of altcoins, including AI- and DeFi-linked assets. Altcoins pullback, analysts call it a healthy correction The crypto market has calmed down over the last 24 hours. Tuesday, altcoins went down as markets calmed down after last week‚Äôs Trump-led rise, after stablecoin legislation was signed into law. As investors took their money back after double-digit gains, Ethereum fell 2.6% and Dogecoin dropped 1.5%. In the bigger decline, Stellar fell 4.1% and Cardano fell 2.8%. Analysts saw The drop as a ‚Äúhealthy correction‚Äù after overbought signs and euphoric gains. üìà ETH led the alt season and now it‚Äôs leading the pullback. (SOL doesn‚Äôt care, of course.) No surprise to see some cooling here. ETH had stretched to 11% above the 10d EMA and is now pulling back toward 6%. Some digestion or consolidation would be healthy if this move is going‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/Wkovox4Yzv ‚Äî PCT (@pct_trading) July 22, 2025 On the other hand, although BTC fell from Monday‚Äôs new high of 123,000, it showed strength by rising 1% to over 119,000. However, ETH continues to draw attention, outperforming BTC over multiple sessions and contributing to a rising chorus of voices declaring the onset of altcoin season. Bitcoin dominance crashed to 59.7% while the Altcoin Season Index jumped to 56. With the Fear and Greed Index sitting at 67. As a result, traders are going full degen mode chasing anything that isn‚Äôt Bitcoin. From a structural view, the BTC pullback could reflect a psychological shift, with capital rotating into altcoins while still anchored by strong institutional flows into crypto more broadly. Market watchers say the break is normal after the signing of the GENIUS Act on Friday, which set up the rules for stablecoin regulation. The markets are only expecting two rate cuts this year, so Fed Chair Powell‚Äôs last speech before the 10-day silence period adds to the stress. title: Crypto Beast Exposed As The $190 Million $ALT Pump-and-Dump Unravels
body: In one of the most shocking revelations of 2025, an online promoter known as Crypto Beast has been exposed for orchestrating a massive $190 million pump-and-dump scheme centered around the altcoin $ALT. At first glance, it seemed like another promising project. Crypto Beast hyped $ALT across social platforms, describing it as ‚Äúthe next big gem.‚Äù He dropped chart-heavy threads on X (formerly Twitter), blasted Telegram channels, and promised followers life-changing 100x returns. His posts built hype quickly. Traders rushed in, eager not to miss out. Then, it all came crashing down. $ALT From Moon to Meltdown On July 14, 2025, $ALT‚Äôs price plummeted heavily. What was once trading at $0.19 fell sharply to just $0.003‚Äîa drop that sent shockwaves through the community. According to CoinMarketCap data, the token‚Äôs market cap sank from $190 million to $3 million in hours. Panic set in. The FOMO that had fueled the run-up turned into anger and confusion. Thousands of retail traders were left holding the bag. People started asking ‚ÄúWho did this?‚Äù ZachXBT, Onchain Truth Hunter Renowned blockchain investigator ZachXBT took on the case. Known for his forensic-level tracking of crypto scams, Zach began tracing $ALT‚Äôs onchain activity. What he uncovered was staggering. He identified over 45 insider wallets that had dumped more than $11 million worth of $ALT right before the crash. Each wallet‚Äôs transactions were carefully documented and timestamped, revealing a well-orchestrated exit. 1/ An investigation into how @cryptobeastreal scammed followers by lying they were not behind the $190M -> $3M $ALT market cap crash where 45+ connected insider wallets sold $11M+ on July 14, 2025. pic.twitter.com/AmnY1xux7a ‚Äî ZachXBT (@zachxbt) July 22, 2025 And all signs pointed back to one man: Crypto Beast. One address stood out early in the investigation: Ledzo5cdS1RYfX4h391fYC8TF6xkwAC8U77F2pCaH4L This wallet had been publicly shared by Crypto Beast in previous posts. Zach followed the breadcrumbs. He noticed small deposits being routed through multiple instant exchanges‚Äîincluding KuCoin nested, Sideshift, Binance nested, and HTX. These deposits ended up in dozens of side wallets. All of those wallets dumped $ALT at its peak. And they were all connected to one funding source: a Celestia node address. celestia1chflqywwp0k8rjzgp3w4447fquyk9ynnc6zws5 This node turned out to be the hub. Between May and July 2025, it funded every insider wallet that participated in the dump. The blockchain didn‚Äôt just tell a story‚Äîit lit up a clear, undeniable connection between Crypto Beast and the wallets that drained the market. Crypto Beast Delete and Disappear Once the crash became public, Crypto Beast did what scammers often do: he vanished. He deleted all of his promotional posts. He removed ‚Äúbuy now‚Äù tweets and Telegram messages. He deactivated his X account. He even claimed he had been hacked, hoping to deflect blame. But the blockchain doesn‚Äôt forget. It showed a clear pattern. The same Celestia node funded every wallet involved in the dump. The digital evidence was impossible to ignore. Still Holding the Bag‚Ä¶ and the Tokens Despite offloading millions, the story doesn‚Äôt end there. Wallets linked to Crypto Beast still hold over 89 million $ALT tokens‚Äîroughly 10% of the total supply. That‚Äôs a massive stash, capable of crashing the market again if dumped. For many seasoned traders, this wasn‚Äôt surprising. Crypto Beast has run the same playbook before‚Äîon tokens like $ALPHA, $RICH, $YE, $RUG, $ACE, and $JOHN. The cycle is always the same: Create hype. Pump the token. Dump on retail traders. Delete everything. Reappear with a new handle and a new ‚Äúgem.‚Äù Is Another $ALT 2.0 Coming Soon? Don‚Äôt be surprised if Crypto Beast returns under a new name, pushing a fresh low-cap token with phrases like ‚Äústealth launch,‚Äù ‚Äúwhale entry,‚Äù or ‚Äúundervalued gem.‚Äù He‚Äôll build FOMO again. He‚Äôll hype new charts. He‚Äôll repeat the cycle. And when the token peaks, he‚Äôll dump, delete, and disappear‚Äîagain. What Can We Learn? ZachXBT‚Äôs investigation is a reminder that blockchains may be public, but interpreting them takes real skill. His work connected wallets, nodes, and exchanges into a single story‚Äîone that proved this pump-and-dump scheme wasn‚Äôt accidental. It was coordinated. It was strategic. And it was entirely avoidable with proper caution. If you‚Äôre trading altcoins, here‚Äôs the takeaway: Trust the data, not the hype. Follow transaction flows over social threads. Be skeptical when things look too good to be true. Because in the crypto space, the next Crypto Beast is always waiting. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services. title: Republican Lawmaker Seeks Criminal Probe Into Fed Chair Powell Over Perjury Accusations
body: Republican Anna Luna sent a letter to the U.S. Department of Justice alleging misconduct by Jerome Powell. He may be tried for perjury. She also accused him of deliberately concealing excessive costs related to a construction project. Republican and ally of U.S. President Donald Trump, Anna Paulina Luna, has asked the U.S. Department of Justice to initiate a criminal case against Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell, according to an official letter published by Fox News Digital . On June 25, 2025, Powell testified under oath during a hearing before the U.S. Senate Banking Committee. According to Luna, who voted against advancing the crypto legislation, Powell denied that luxury amenities were included in a new plan to redevelop the Eccles Building, the Federal Reserve's headquarters. In her letter, Luna states that Powell ‚Äùmade materially false statements‚Äù regarding: the presence of a VIP dining room, marble finishes, water installations, a roof garden, and modern elevators; the scale and cost of the reconstruction, which increased from $1.9 billion to $2.5 billion. ‚ÄùAccording to documents that congressional investigators have already reviewed, the changes were neither minor in nature nor insignificant in scope,‚Äù Luna wrote. In addition to making allegedly false statements, the congresswoman emphasized that Powell intentionally presented the updated reconstruction plan as simplified in order to hide excessive spending. She cites letters sent to the director of the Office of Management and Budget, Russell Vought, in which Powell downplayed the scale of the changes. Luna stressed that these statements contradict both: official plans filed with the National Capital Planning Commission, and the original statements of Director Vought himself. According to media reports, Powell denies all allegations of perjury and has initiated an internal investigation into the reconstruction costs. While Luna previously¬†wroteon X (formerly Twitter) that she expects Trump to fire Powell, Trump himself¬†stated back in April that he has no intention of firing the Fed chief. According to the publication, moderate Republicans and Powell supporters say that dismissing the Fed chief would lead to additional instability in various financial markets. However, the conflict between Trump's conservative allies and the Fed chief is escalating, especially amid criticism that Powell has not cut interest rates as much as Trump has demanded.

title: Solana NFTs Explode as Market Volume Surges Past $2 Million, Highest in 113 Days
body: The Solana NFT market is roaring back to life. In the past 24 hours, trading volume on Solana topped $2 million,its highest daily figure in 113 days, according to CoinMarketCap. The surge signals a renewed wave of momentum across the NFT landscape, and Solana is leading the charge. At the forefront of the revival is Taiyo Robotics, now sitting at the top of Solana‚Äôs NFT food chain. Its floor price has climbed to 56.71 SOL (approximately $11,129), after rallying 640% over the past month, according to CoinGecko. NFT Market Momentum, Not Just On Solana The action isn‚Äôt limited to Solana. The broader NFT ecosystem is heating up fast: Total NFT market-cap sales just surpassed $6 billion, with $1 billion added in a single day. Weekly trade volume just hit a six-month high. Ethereum blue-chip collections are flashing green,Bored Apes are inching up, CryptoPunks continue grinding higher, and Azuki is holding steady. NEWS: @Solana NFT trading volume surpassed $2 million in the last 24 hours, the highest in 113 days. Meanwhile, @TaiyoRobotics has become the #1 NFT collection on Solana by floor price, up over 640% in the past month. pic.twitter.com/YzxfvPH0qK ‚Äî SolanaFloor (@SolanaFloor) July 22, 2025 The question on everyone‚Äôs mind would be if this is the start of a new NFT bull cycle? Altcoin Season Fuels NFT Hype Retail investors are clearly back in play. The Altcoin Season Index, a metric that gauges when altcoins are outperforming Bitcoin, has jumped to 57%, up from 39% just a week ago. Google Trends data also shows peak search interest for ‚Äúaltcoin‚Äù this month,signaling rising curiosity and growing FOMO among retail traders. Solana‚Äôs Secret? Speed + Demand Solana‚Äôs infrastructure is perfectly positioned to meet this surge. Low fees and high throughput allow for seamless trading even during volume spikes. Collections once considered ‚Äúdead‚Äù are coming back to life. Floor prices across top and mid-tier projects are tightening as new liquidity flows in. Whales are circling, eyes fixed on upcoming project drops. With gas fees low, small-cap traders are staying competitive,fueling a broader sense of inclusivity. Bullish Signs: Feedback Loops Are In Play This kind of environment creates a powerful feedback loop: Rising volume increases floor price pressure. Higher floors attract more buyers. NFT lending protocols see healthier loan-to-value (LTV) ratios. Liquidity frees up. Premiums drop. More trading follows. It‚Äôs a flywheel that‚Äôs difficult to stop once it gets spinning. What‚Äôs Driving This, and What‚Äôs Next Several key dynamics are pushing the NFT market forward: New Drops Incoming: High-profile launches are on the radar. Whitelists are filling fast. These drops will test how deep the new demand really is. Floor Divergence: Watching the gap between top-tier collections and second-tier projects is critical. If that gap widens again, it could signal the start of profit-taking or cooling momentum. On-Chain Sentiment: Metrics like active wallets and unique buyers will show if this surge is sustainable,or just a speculative pop. Meanwhile, institutional players are watching closely. Gaming guilds, NFT ETFs, and metaverse funds are scouting for entry points. Several funds have already increased their Solana exposure, seeing NFTs as the new entry point for retail,without Ethereum‚Äôs gas headache. The development side of the ecosystem is also accelerating. New tools like: Cross-chain NFT bridges Fractional ownership protocols Real-world asset tokenizers are in the works. The long-term vision? NFTs that go beyond art,imagine World Cup tickets, concert passes, or equity shares as liquid, yield-generating assets. A Cautious Note The energy is real,but so are the risks. A sudden cool-down in altcoin momentum could spook NFT markets. Rug pulls remain a threat in low-liquidity corners. And broader macro pressures,interest rate hikes, regulatory crackdowns,could pour cold water on the fire. Still, right now, the trend is bullish. Data is strong. Sentiment is rising. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services. Follow us on Twitter @nulltxnews to stay updated with the latest Crypto, NFT, AI, Cybersecurity, Distributed Computing, and Metaverse news !

title: Lawyers For Roman Storm May File For A Mistrial After Key Witness Testimony
body: The legal defense team of Roman Storm is considering whether to file for a mistrial after they were unable to trace key witness testimony back to Tornado Cash, the crypto mixer developer‚Äôs lawyers said on Monday. Roman Storm Defense Team Considers Mistrial Filing According to reports, Storm‚Äôs legal team told U.S. District Judge Katherine Polk Failla they could not verify that funds belonging to witness Hanfeng Leng‚Äîwho lost $250,000 to a pig butchering scam in 2021‚Äîwere eventually sent through Tornado Cash. ‚ÄúBased on our research over the weekend, we can‚Äôt find that any of Ms. Lin‚Äôs fund went to Tornado Cash,‚Äù Inner City Press reported Storm‚Äôs counsel as saying. ‚ÄúWe need to confer with Mr. Storm about moving for a mistrial.‚Äù P.S. ‚Äì after jury leaves, before they repair to "alternate jury room," Storm's lawyer Patton: Based on our research over the weekend, we can't find that any of Ms. Lin's fund went to Tornado Cash. We need to confer with Mr. Storm about moving for a mistrial ‚Äî Inner City Press (@innercitypress) July 21, 2025 If Failla should approve the mistrial motion, Storm‚Äôs trial could be dismissed altogether or the DeFi developer could face retrial. Serious Errors In Tornado Cash Case, Defense Lawyers Say News of Storm‚Äôs potential mistrial filing comes over a week after the defense claimed in a July 12 court document that the prosecution‚Äôs case against the high-profile developer contains ‚Äúserious errors‚Äù and ‚Äúfactual inaccuracies‚Äù that purportedly ‚Äúcall into question the integrity of its intended presentation to the jury.‚Äù Storm‚Äôs lawyers alleged that key Telegram messages from reported co-conspirator Alex Pertsev‚Äôs phone, which the prosecution plans to present in court, are ‚Äúcherry-picked‚Äù and ‚Äúmissing information identifying the author of messages that are forwarded.‚Äù ‚ÄúIt appears the Telegram messages that were extracted are not accurate,‚Äù Storm‚Äôs lawyers state in the court filing. ‚ÄúThe fact that they are plainly missing critical information undermines their reliability.‚Äù On the same day, the crypto mixer employee begged his social media followers for contributions to his legal defense fund. ‚ÄúI need to raise $500K in the next few days and $1.5M within a couple of weeks to sustain our fight‚Äîcovering escalating legal fees, expert witnesses, and research as the case extends beyond the initial 2-week projection,‚Äù Storm wrote. ‚ÄúMy team is working nonstop to defend code as free speech, protect software development, and push back against government overreach that threatens us all,‚Äù he added. It is still unclear whether Storm will go forward and push for a mistrial. The post Lawyers For Roman Storm May File For A Mistrial After Key Witness Testimony appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Bitcoin Cash Price Prediction as Uptrend Continues ‚Äì How Quickly Can BCH Hit $1,000?
body: A bullish Bitcoin Cash price prediction is gaining traction as BCH continues to print higher lows, fueled by a fresh wave of retail liquidity ‚Äì an early sign that a broader uptrend may be taking shape. While the altcoin is down 2.85% today, it‚Äôs still up 6% over the past week, pointing to strong underlying momentum. The market warming catalyst now takes the forefront, with pro-crypto regulatory momentum unlocking sidelined capital for risk-on assets and easing the Geopolitical and macroeconomic FUD narrative. With the GENIUS Act still under consideration in Congress and the CLARITY Act expected to follow in October, bullish catalysts now extend well beyond ‚Äú Crypto Week ‚Äù setting the stage for continued upside. Crypto Czar David Sacks: Market Structure Clarity Act To Pass By October pic.twitter.com/N06UKHAdRo ‚Äî Altcoin Daily (@AltcoinDaily) July 19, 2025 Can Bitcoin Cash Keep Growing? Bitcoin Cash does not directly benefit from the GENIUS Act without a native stablecoin in its ecosystem. Instead, it gains from the act as a broader market-warming catalyst. Its core value proposition as a payment solution positions BCH well to benefit from the CLARITY Act. With clearer regulatory guidelines, BCH could see momentum as a viable option for U.S. merchant adoption. Until then, it continues to ride the momentum of the wider market, with the altcoin season index rising from 20 to 53 since the start of the month‚Äîstill shy of the 75 considered a full altseason. Altcoin Season Index. Source: Coinglass. Retail investors are re-entering the market with renewed appetite for alternatives to Bitcoin, positioning Bitcoin Cash for further growth. Bitcoin Cash Price Analysis: How Soon Can $1000 Come? With altcoin season gearing up, the ascending channel forming since the mid-April market bottom may finally have the momentum it needs to reach a breakout. BCH / USDT 4-hour chart, ascending channel breakout nears. Source: TradingView, Binance. The Bitcoin Cash price currently trades within a consolidation zone between strong support at $490 and stiff resistance at $555, capping its latest upward move. However, a consistent pattern of higher lows since mid-July suggests growing bullish momentum, setting BCH on track to retest resistance with stronger footing. The RSI sets up the next higher low, now near the neutral 50 level after its most recent rejection saw buy pressure exhausted, breaching into oversold territory at 74. The MACD line also shows early signs of a reversal as its histogram shows a slowdown, opening the doors for a crossover back above the signal line ahead of a new swing high. A breakout above $555 remains the last barrier for a channel breakout. If successful, the next key resistance is the December 2024 high around $640. If $640 flips to support, the push could go on toward its $720 all-time high, and potentially enter price discovery near $1,000, especially if momentum builds ahead of the anticipated CLARITY Act in October. This milestone would represent a 90% upside from current levels. Bitcoin Could Have the Edge, With Some Help Those who jumped to Bitcoin Cash over the original may be forced to reconsider as the Bitcoin ecosystem finally addresses its most significant limitation: scalability. Slow transactions, high fees, and limited programmability have held it back from competing with EVM and Solana networks ‚Äì until now. And this shift starts with Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) , Bitcoin‚Äôs first real-time Layer 2 that brings Solana-level speed and smart contracts directly to the Bitcoin ecosystem. Powered by the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM) and anchored by a decentralized Canonical Bridge, it enables fast, cheap, and composable dApps while remaining secured by Bitcoin. With over $4 million raised in its ongoing presale , investors are already rallying behind $HYPER , potentially credited to its high 231% APY on staking that rewards early investors. You can keep up with Bitcoin Hyper on X and Telegram , or join the presale on the Bitcoin Hyper website . The post Bitcoin Cash Price Prediction as Uptrend Continues ‚Äì How Quickly Can BCH Hit $1,000? appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: SharpLink Gaming became the largest public Ether holder again after a $258.9 million Ethereum purchase
body: SharpLink Gaming reclaimed its spot as the biggest publicly traded Ether holder in the world after its latest purchase. On Tuesday, the company purchased 79,949‚ÄØETH, bringing its total to 360,807‚ÄØEthereum, worth about $1.3‚ÄØbillion at current prices. SharpLink paid about $3,238 per coin, shelling out roughly $258.9‚ÄØmillion for this latest purchase. Only days earlier, last Monday, it had disclosed a $49‚ÄØmillion purchase that also helped lift its balance to the same 360,807‚ÄØETH mark, based on data by CoinGecko. This latest acquisition lets SharpLink reclaim its lead in the fierce contest among public firms building up Ethereum reserves. Just weeks ago, BitMine Immersion Technologies nudged ahead after it announced a private placement worth $250‚ÄØmillion on June 30th. BitMine revealed last Thursday that it held 300,657‚ÄØEthereum, worth $1‚ÄØbillion, tipping it briefly past SharpLink‚Äôs 280,706‚ÄØETH at that time. Investors have been watching the contest closely, drawing parallels to MicroStrategy‚Äôs high‚Äëprofile Bitcoin purchases. Both companies‚Äô stocks have surged as traders compare their strategies. Ark Invest bought 4.4‚ÄØmillion shares of BitMine On Monday, ARK Invest purchased 4.4‚ÄØmillion BitMine shares (BMNR) in a deal worth almost $175‚ÄØmillion. It came after billionaire Peter Thiel picked up 5.09‚ÄØmillion shares of BMNR in the previous week, giving him a stake of 9%. At the same time, BitMine‚Äôs stock exploded, jumping over 700% in July, data from TradingView shows. The shares momentarily climbed above $140 on 3rd July before closing at $39.60 on Monday. SharpLink‚Äôs own stock (SBET) has also risen, though more modestly. It has gained about 130‚ÄØpercent over July, ending Monday around $26 per share. Ethereum ETFs attract $296 million in daily inflows Meanwhile, the broader crypto ETFs have seen a shift of funds. Spot Bitcoin ETFs broke a 12‚Äëday streak of net inflows, posting outflows of $131.35‚ÄØmillion on Monday. Ark & 21Shares‚Äô ARKB led the redemptions with $77.46‚ÄØmillion withdrawn. Major players, including Fidelity, Grayscale, VanEck, and Bitwise, also saw net outflows. BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT, the biggest BTC ETF by assets, reported no change, alongside six other funds. This was the first day of net outflow for Bitcoin ETFs since July‚ÄØ1, a period that had seen $6.12‚ÄØbillion pour in. In contrast, Ethereum‚Äëbased ETFs continued their inflow streak to 12 consecutive days, drawing $296.6‚ÄØmillion on Monday alone. Fidelity‚Äôs FETH topped the list with $126.93‚ÄØmillion in new money, followed by $102‚ÄØmillion into BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA. Grayscale‚Äôs Mini Ethereum Trust and Bitwise‚Äôs ETHW also registered net inflows. These Ether‚Äëfocused funds have now amassed $3.53‚ÄØbillion over their 12‚Äëday run, marking some of the strongest early demand since their launch on July‚ÄØ24. Analyst Min Jung of Presto Research said the data point to a ‚Äúfamiliar rotation‚Äù from Bitcoin into Ethereum, often a prelude to broader activity in other tokens. ‚ÄúBitcoin has rallied significantly this year,‚Äù Jung noted, ‚Äúand for investors who feel they‚Äôve ‚Äòmissed‚Äô the BTC trade or are looking for the next opportunity, Ethereum is becoming the natural next step.‚Äù KEY Difference Wire : the secret tool crypto projects use to get guaranteed media coverage

title: Ethereum: The Explosive Surge Driven by Institutional Demand
body: BitcoinWorld Ethereum: The Explosive Surge Driven by Institutional Demand In the dynamic world of cryptocurrencies, where market tides can turn swiftly, a significant shift is currently capturing the attention of investors and analysts alike. While Bitcoin often dominates headlines, it‚Äôs Ethereum that has recently emerged as a standout performer, demonstrating an impressive surge that has left many wondering about its underlying drivers. According to insights from Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan, this isn‚Äôt just a fleeting trend; it‚Äôs a profound ‚Äúdemand shock‚Äù that is reshaping the crypto landscape and propelling Ethereum to new heights. But what exactly is fueling this remarkable ascent, and what does it mean for the future of digital assets? What‚Äôs Fueling Ethereum‚Äôs Phenomenal Rise? The narrative around Ethereum ‚Äòs recent outperformance is compelling, rooted in a fundamental shift in market dynamics. Matt Hougan, a respected voice in the crypto investment space, points directly to a dramatic increase in institutional and corporate demand as the primary catalyst. This isn‚Äôt merely anecdotal; the numbers speak volumes, painting a clear picture of unprecedented capital inflow into the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. Unprecedented Inflow: Since mid-May, over $10 billion worth of ETH has been acquired by institutions and corporations. To put this into perspective, this staggering figure is approximately 32 times more than the total amount of new ETH issued during the same period. This imbalance between supply and demand is the very essence of a ‚Äúdemand shock.‚Äù Scarcity and Value: When demand vastly outstrips supply, the natural economic consequence is an upward pressure on price. Unlike traditional markets where production can be ramped up to meet demand, the issuance of new Ethereum is programmatically controlled and deflationary in nature following upgrades like EIP-1559 and the Merge. This inherent scarcity amplifies the impact of the surging institutional interest. Strategic Accumulation: Large entities aren‚Äôt just buying; they‚Äôre accumulating. This suggests a long-term strategic view on Ethereum ‚Äòs potential, moving beyond speculative trading to integrate ETH into broader investment portfolios and corporate strategies. This level of sustained buying indicates deep conviction in its future utility and value proposition. This ‚Äúdemand shock‚Äù signifies a maturation of the Ethereum market, moving beyond retail speculation to embrace significant capital from established financial players. Their entry not only injects liquidity but also lends credibility and stability to the asset, attracting further interest from other institutional participants. Ethereum vs. Bitcoin: A Shifting Dynamic For years, Bitcoin has been the undisputed king, its price movements often dictating the broader crypto market. However, recent months have seen a noticeable divergence, with Ethereum not only keeping pace but significantly outperforming its larger counterpart. This shift is clearly illustrated in key market metrics, signaling a potential rebalancing of influence within the digital asset ecosystem. According to data highlighted by Crypto Briefing, the performance gap between the two leading cryptocurrencies has widened considerably: ETH‚Äôs Impressive Gains: In just three months, Ethereum has soared by an astonishing 105%. This remarkable growth trajectory underscores its robust momentum and the strong buying pressure it has experienced. Bitcoin‚Äôs Steady Ascent: In contrast, Bitcoin has seen a more modest, albeit respectable, gain of 23% over the same period. While still positive, it pales in comparison to Ethereum ‚Äòs explosive rally. This disparity is further reflected in the evolving relationship between the two assets: Key Performance Indicators: ETH vs. BTC (Past 3 Months) Metric Ethereum (ETH) Bitcoin (BTC) Price Gain +105% +23% ETH/BTC Ratio Climbed to 0.031 N/A Market Dominance Increasing Fell to 61% The rising ETH/BTC ratio to 0.031 is a particularly telling indicator. This ratio signifies how many Bitcoins one Ethereum is worth. A climbing ratio means that Ethereum is gaining value faster than Bitcoin, or losing value slower. Simultaneously, Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance‚Äîits share of the total cryptocurrency market capitalization‚Äîhas slipped to 61%. While still dominant, this decline suggests that capital is flowing into altcoins, particularly Ethereum , at a faster rate, diversifying the market‚Äôs concentration. This trend implies that investors are increasingly recognizing the unique value proposition of Ethereum , moving beyond Bitcoin‚Äôs ‚Äúdigital gold‚Äù narrative to embrace the broader utility and innovation offered by the Ethereum network. Beyond the Numbers: Why Institutional Investors are Eyeing Ethereum? The institutional embrace of Ethereum isn‚Äôt solely about its recent price performance; it‚Äôs a deeper acknowledgment of its foundational role in the burgeoning Web3 ecosystem. While Bitcoin is primarily seen as a store of value, Ethereum is the programmable blockchain that underpins a vast array of decentralized applications and innovations. This fundamental difference is a key driver for sophisticated investors looking for more than just a hedge against inflation. What makes Ethereum uniquely attractive to these large players? The Backbone of Decentralized Finance (DeFi): Ethereum is the undisputed leader in DeFi, hosting the vast majority of decentralized exchanges, lending protocols, and other financial innovations. Institutions are keen to participate in this new financial paradigm, and owning ETH provides direct exposure to its growth. NFTs and Digital Ownership: The explosion of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) has largely occurred on the Ethereum blockchain. From digital art to gaming assets, NFTs represent a new frontier of digital ownership, and institutions are recognizing their potential for brand engagement, intellectual property, and new revenue streams. Scalability and Sustainability Roadmaps: With the successful transition to Proof-of-Stake (the Merge) and ongoing developments like sharding (Danksharding) and Layer 2 solutions, Ethereum is actively addressing its scalability challenges. This commitment to future-proofing the network makes it a more viable long-term investment for entities concerned with enterprise-grade performance and environmental sustainability. Developer Ecosystem and Network Effect: Ethereum boasts the largest and most active developer community in the blockchain space. This vibrant ecosystem continually builds new applications, tools, and infrastructure, creating a powerful network effect that reinforces Ethereum ‚Äòs position as the leading smart contract platform. Institutions are investing in the platform where innovation is most prolific. Yield Opportunities: With the move to Proof-of-Stake, staking ETH offers attractive yield opportunities for institutional holders, providing a passive income stream that can enhance overall portfolio returns. This makes holding ETH more appealing than simply holding a non-yielding asset. These factors collectively paint a picture of Ethereum as not just a cryptocurrency, but a foundational technology powering the next generation of the internet. Institutional investors are positioning themselves to capitalize on this transformative potential, viewing ETH as a strategic asset rather than a mere speculative gamble. Navigating the Market: Actionable Insights for Ethereum Enthusiasts The recent outperformance of Ethereum , driven by significant institutional demand, offers both exciting opportunities and important considerations for individual investors and market participants. Understanding the broader context and potential implications can help enthusiasts navigate this evolving landscape more effectively. Key Benefits for Ethereum Holders: Validation of Utility: Institutional interest validates Ethereum ‚Äòs fundamental utility beyond speculative trading. It reinforces the idea that ETH is a critical component of the future digital economy. Increased Liquidity and Stability: The entry of large capital often brings greater market depth and stability, potentially reducing extreme volatility over the long term, though short-term fluctuations remain inherent. Positive Price Momentum: Sustained demand from large players creates a strong bullish sentiment, which can translate into continued price appreciation, especially given Ethereum ‚Äòs deflationary mechanisms. Exposure to Web3 Growth: Holding Ethereum provides direct exposure to the growth of DeFi, NFTs, and the broader decentralized internet, areas poised for significant expansion. Potential Challenges and Considerations: Regulatory Scrutiny: As Ethereum gains prominence, it may attract increased regulatory attention, which could introduce new compliance requirements or market uncertainties. Scalability Hurdles (Ongoing): While progress is significant, Ethereum still faces challenges in achieving truly mass-scale adoption without high transaction fees or network congestion during peak times. Layer 2 solutions are mitigating this, but the core network continues to evolve. Competition: Other smart contract platforms are emerging, aiming to compete with Ethereum . While Ethereum has a strong first-mover advantage and network effect, competition could influence its long-term trajectory. Market Volatility: Despite institutional interest, the crypto market remains inherently volatile. Price corrections and sharp swings are always a possibility, requiring a robust risk management strategy. Actionable Insights: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Always conduct thorough research before making investment decisions. Understand Ethereum ‚Äòs technology, its roadmap, and its place in the broader crypto ecosystem. Consider Diversification: While Ethereum shows strong potential, a diversified portfolio can help mitigate risks. Consider balancing your holdings across different assets. Stay Informed on Developments: Keep abreast of Ethereum ‚Äòs ongoing technical upgrades (e.g., Dencun, future sharding) and the evolving regulatory landscape. These can significantly impact its future. Long-Term Perspective: Institutional investors typically have a long-term horizon. Adopting a similar perspective can help weather short-term market fluctuations and capitalize on Ethereum ‚Äòs growth potential. The ‚Äúdemand shock‚Äù highlighted by Bitwise underscores Ethereum ‚Äòs transition from a promising altcoin to a cornerstone of the decentralized economy. For those interested in participating, understanding these dynamics is crucial. In conclusion, the recent outperformance of Ethereum is far from a mere market anomaly; it‚Äôs a robust indicator of its growing maturity and indispensable role in the digital economy. The insights from Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan vividly illustrate that this surge is powered by a significant ‚Äúdemand shock‚Äù from institutional and corporate players, who have poured over $10 billion into ETH since mid-May, dwarfing new issuance by 32 times. This unprecedented inflow has propelled Ethereum to gains of 105% in three months, dramatically outpacing Bitcoin and causing a notable shift in market dominance. As the backbone of DeFi, NFTs, and the broader Web3 movement, coupled with its continuous technical advancements and a vibrant developer community, Ethereum is increasingly seen as a strategic, long-term asset rather than just a speculative play. This institutional validation not only reinforces its utility but also sets the stage for its continued evolution and potential to redefine the future of finance and the internet. For investors and enthusiasts alike, understanding these profound shifts is key to navigating the exciting trajectory of Ethereum . Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What does ‚Äúdemand shock‚Äù mean in the context of Ethereum? A1: A ‚Äúdemand shock‚Äù for Ethereum refers to a situation where the demand for ETH significantly and suddenly outstrips its available supply. In this case, it‚Äôs driven by massive institutional and corporate buying (over $10 billion since mid-May), far exceeding the rate at which new ETH is issued, leading to strong upward price pressure. Q2: Why are institutions increasingly interested in Ethereum over Bitcoin? A2: While Bitcoin is valued as ‚Äúdigital gold,‚Äù institutions are drawn to Ethereum for its utility as a programmable blockchain. It powers Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), and the broader Web3 ecosystem. Its ongoing scalability upgrades and vibrant developer community also make it a strategic long-term investment. Q3: How has Ethereum‚Äôs performance compared to Bitcoin recently? A3: In the past three months, Ethereum has seen an impressive gain of 105%, significantly outperforming Bitcoin‚Äôs 23% gain. This has led to the ETH/BTC ratio climbing and Bitcoin‚Äôs market dominance slightly decreasing, indicating a shift in investor focus towards Ethereum ‚Äòs growth potential. Q4: What are the main benefits of holding Ethereum? A4: Holding Ethereum offers exposure to the rapidly growing Web3 economy (DeFi, NFTs), potential for significant price appreciation due to demand shock and deflationary mechanisms, and the ability to earn yield through staking. Institutional interest also lends credibility and can contribute to market stability. Q5: What are some potential challenges or risks associated with Ethereum? A5: Key challenges include potential increased regulatory scrutiny, ongoing scalability hurdles (though actively being addressed by Layer 2 solutions), competition from other smart contract platforms, and the inherent volatility of the cryptocurrency market. Investors should always conduct thorough research and manage risks. Did you find this deep dive into Ethereum ‚Äòs ‚Äúdemand shock‚Äù insightful? Share this article with your friends, colleagues, and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media to spread awareness about the exciting developments shaping the digital asset space! To learn more about the latest Ethereum trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum ‚Äòs institutional adoption. This post Ethereum: The Explosive Surge Driven by Institutional Demand first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Ozzy Osbourne‚Äôs Final Bow Sparks a CryptoBatz NFT Revival
body: At 76, Ozzy Osbourne, the heavy metal icon who redefined rock and rebellion, has passed away. But even in death, his influence refuses to fade. His final performance‚Äîa raw, soul-stirring rendition of Crazy Train‚Äîtook place at Villa Park in Birmingham. Seated due to his health, Ozzy belted out the song that made him a legend. The crowd erupted. Ozzy roared. It was more than a concert‚Äîit was a goodbye etched in rock history. Now, the world of Web3 is reacting. CryptoBatz based-NFT Rises from the Grave Ozzy‚Äôs Ethereum-based NFT project, CryptoBatz, is experiencing an unexpected revival. Within just 24 hours of the news, its floor price jumped from 0.02 ETH to 0.1 ETH. Trading volume surged as fans and collectors scrambled to claim a piece of his digital legacy. Originally launched in January 2022, CryptoBatz was Ozzy‚Äôs quirky, creative foray into the NFT space. The concept was bizarre yet brilliant: each bat NFT had the ability to ‚Äúbite‚Äù other collections and mutate‚Äîcreating new hybrids in a mechanic that felt straight out of a gothic sci-fi dream. It wasn‚Äôt just a gimmick. It felt‚Ä¶Ozzy. At the time, the collection saw an initial floor price of around 0.6 ETH, with over 5,000 unique holders. But as the bear market tightened its grip, activity dwindled. Prices dropped. Attention faded. CryptoBatz slipped into obscurity‚Äîuntil now. The Ozzy‚Äôs Nostalgia Surge Ozzy‚Äôs passing has reignited interest in a way no marketing campaign ever could. What was once dismissed as another celebrity NFT drop is now being re-evaluated as a digital time capsule‚Äîpart collectible, part memorial. ‚ÄúThis is no longer an NFT. It‚Äôs a digital shrine,‚Äù ‚Äî wrote @RiddlerNFT, a respected voice in the NFT space. BREAKING NEWS ‚Äì @OzzyOsbourne just died and his ETH NFT collection is going wild. The Cryptobatz NFT floor has gone from 0.02 ETH to 0.1 ETH and volume is rising‚Ä¶is this the first NFT collection from a celebrity who has died? pic.twitter.com/5MBTGtIcD7 ‚Äî RIDDLŒûR (@RiddlerNFT) July 22, 2025 On X, conversations are lighting up. Influencers are watching. Long-dormant holders are logging back in. Even non-crypto metalheads are joining the movement, viewing CryptoBatz less as digital art and more as cultural memorabilia. The collection, which includes 9,666 bat NFTs, has seen a 300% spike in trading volume over the last day, according to CoinMarketCap. Hold or Sell? The Debate Begins Among Collectors With prices climbing, collectors are torn. Some see this as a rare moment to cash in. Others believe it‚Äôs something deeper‚Äîa piece of rock history that belongs on-chain forever. For many, CryptoBatz feels less like an investment and more like a vinyl record from a final tour‚Äîa permanent reminder of an artist who left it all on stage. There‚Äôs also speculation around unreleased ‚Äúmutations‚Äù Ozzy teased back in 2022. Could they make a comeback? It‚Äôs unclear. But the renewed attention has fans hoping for surprises‚Äîone last encore, even in the digital realm. Legacy Over Hype CryptoBatz‚Äôs sudden rise is sparking broader conversation about celebrity NFT projects . Many flopped. Most were dismissed as cash grabs. Even CryptoBatz faded for a time. But now it‚Äôs proving something powerful: legacy matters. Timing matters. And when tied to cultural icons like Ozzy, digital tokens can become more than just collectibles‚Äîthey can become emotional anchors. Because for fans, this isn‚Äôt just about NFTs . It‚Äôs about remembering a voice that defined generations, a personality that challenged norms, and a musician who lived and died on his own terms. A Final Encore‚ÄîOn the Blockchain In the end, CryptoBatz may not just be an art project. It‚Äôs a memory chain, a digital keepsake from one of music‚Äôs most unforgettable legends. Whether you collect for nostalgia, tribute, or investment, one thing‚Äôs clear: Ozzy‚Äôs legacy just got immortalized on Ethereum. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services. Follow us on Twitter @nulltxnews to stay updated with the latest Crypto, NFT, AI, Cybersecurity, Distributed Computing, and Metaverse news !

title: Trader Says One Dogecoin Competitor Primed for New Leg Up, Predicts New All-Time Highs for Bitcoin
body: A widely followed crypto analyst says that one Dogecoin ( DOGE ) competitor may be on the verge of an explosive breakout. In a new strategy session, pseudonymous crypto trader Bluntz tells his 325,400 followers on the social media platform X that the dog-themed meme asset Floki ( FLOKI ) is printing a bullish triangle pattern. Bluntz is a practitioner of Elliott Wave theory, which aims to predict price movements in series of waves that are based on crowd psychology. He says that Floki may have completed an ABCDE triangle, foreshadowing a strong rally once the pattern is complete. ‚ÄúFive days of sideways for Floki here. I reckon next leg up is pretty close now that its had time to chill for a bit.‚Äù Source: Bluntz/X Looking at his chart, the analyst suggests that Floki may eventually hit a price target of more than $0.0001600. Floki is trading for $0.0001412 at time of writing, down marginally on the day. Next up, the analyst says that Bitcoin ( BTC ) may print new all-time highs of more than $125,000 after potentially forming an ABC correction to the $115,000 level. Under Elliott Wave theory, a bullish asset tends to witness new rallies after concluding an ABC pullback. ‚ÄúBTC looking like an early week sweep of $116,000 is on the cards before it can start pushing higher later in the week. Expecting any early week weakness to get bid back up around Tuesday or so.‚Äù Source: Bluntz/X Bitcoin is trading for $119,105 at time of writing, up marginally on the day. title: Bitcoin Final Push? Wave (5) Could Deliver A Spectacular Breakout
body: Bitcoin is turning heads once again as it climbs steadily within a rising channel, teasing a potential explosive move. According to chart watchers, the current rally aligns with Wave (5) of an Elliott Wave structure, historically the phase that unleashes the most aggressive price action. With momentum building and institutional demand ramping up, could this be the final leg before Bitcoin launches toward uncharted territory? Rising Channel Holds Firm As Wave (5) Builds Steam In a recent update, market analyst LSplayQ pointed out that Bitcoin is steadily climbing within a clearly defined rising channel, with the price now trading close to $118,000. This structured upward movement signals strong market confidence, with buyers consistently stepping in at higher levels to support the trend. Related Reading: Hold On For Dear Life: This Bullish Bitcoin Metric Just Touched A 15-Year High The analysis ties this momentum to an unfolding Elliott Wave formation, where Wave (5) is currently in play. The previous waves have displayed a clean pattern of higher highs and higher lows‚Äîa signature of impulsive bullish behavior. This suggests that Bitcoin‚Äôs price action is not random but follows a predictable rhythm often seen during strong uptrends. With Wave (5) potentially in progress, LSplayQ believes that Bitcoin could soon challenge the upper boundary of its rising channel. If this plays out as expected, the next target zone could be around the $140,000 region, a level that aligns with the broader technical projection of this ongoing wave structure. A breakout above the rising channel could spark even more aggressive upside, while any signs of weakness near these resistance levels might indicate a short-term pullback. However, the bullish setup remains intact for now as Wave (5) continues to unfold with precision. Institutional Buys Push Forward, But Technicals Urge Patience With institutions like Strategy continuing to accumulate, LSplayQ suggests that Bitcoin still has room to push higher. The growing interest from large-scale investors adds weight to the ongoing bullish momentum, further fueling optimism for an extended rally. Related Reading: Bitcoin Price Eyes $123K Explosion‚ÄîTraders Brace for Breakout However, there are signs that the market may be nearing a temporary exhaustion point. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) is edging toward overbought territory, hinting at a potential cooling-off period. This doesn‚Äôt necessarily signal the end of the trend but could open the door for a short-term correction. Should a pullback occur, traders will likely shift their focus to key support zones. According to LSplayQ, the $99,531 level stands out as a critical area where buyers may step in to defend the uptrend. Holding above that threshold could set the stage for the next leg upward once the consolidation phase concludes. Featured image from Pixabay, chart from Tradingview.com

title: Accumulation of Major Bitcoin Investors and Whales Powering BTC Uptrend As Ethereum Witnesses Trend Reversal in Buyer Behavior: Glassnode
body: Analytics firm Glassnode says that large Bitcoin investors are gobbling up BTC , fueling the crypto king‚Äôs ascent above $100,000. In a post on the social media platform X, Glassnode says that all major Bitcoin cohorts by wallet size are now back in ‚Äúnear-perfect‚Äù accumulation mode. The analytics firm released a Trend Accumulation Score chart by cohort, revealing that wallets holding less than one BTC to those with over 10,000 BTC show scores of 1 or near 1, signaling strong accumulation across all investor segments. ‚ÄúEven >10,000 BTC whales are participating at levels last seen in Dec 2024. The alignment across wallet sizes suggests broad-based conviction behind the current BTC uptrend.‚Äù Source: Glassnode/X At time of writing, Bitcoin is trading at $117,412. Turning to Ethereum, Glassnode notes a renewed influx of first-time ETH investors following a prolonged period of declining interest from the group. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre seeing the first signs of a trend reversal in ETH buyer behavior. Since early July, the supply held by first-time buyers has increased by ~16%, suggesting renewed interest and inflows from fresh market participants.‚Äù Source: Glassnode/X At time of writing, Ethereum is worth $3,765. As for the layer-1 protocol Solana, Glassnode says that SOL may be poised for a huge upside burst after taking out a key resistance area. ‚ÄúThe next major resistance for SOL may sit around $190, where investors have accumulated over 8 million SOL. Above this level, supply becomes less dense ‚Äì suggesting that, if demand persists, the uptrend could accelerate due to reduced overhead resistance.‚Äù Source: Glassnode/X At time of writing, SOL is trading at $197, well above Glassnode‚Äôs resistance point. title: This XRP Whale‚Äôs Recent Action Shows Something Is Coming
body: A major alert from well-known crypto analyst Steph Is Crypto has stirred the XRP community. In a post on X, he announced: ‚ÄúBreaking: Whale just closed a massive $5.68M XRP long. What does he know?‚Äù The move immediately caught the market‚Äôs attention, raising questions about whether this high-stakes decision signals an impending shift in XRP‚Äôs trajectory . XRP Price Update: Where Things Stand As of report time, XRP is trading at $3.52, after briefly reaching an intraday high of $3.62 and dipping as low as $3.43. This slight daily decline follows a strong rally, with the token still up more than 20% over the past week and nearly 480% year-to-date. XRP now commands a market capitalization of over $208 billion, and its 24-hour trading volume exceeds $8.5 billion, reflecting continued market interest and liquidity. BREAKING: WHALE JUST CLOSED A MASSIVE $5.68M #XRP LONG. WHAT DOES HE KNOW??? pic.twitter.com/Mp1WFwcrHF ‚Äî STEPH IS CRYPTO (@Steph_iscrypto) July 22, 2025 What the Whale Exit Could Mean Closing a $5.68 million long position is no ordinary move; it‚Äôs a deliberate and calculated action. Whether this whale is securing profits after the recent price surge or anticipating a short-term correction remains to be seen. In crypto, such large-scale position changes are often viewed as signals. When a seasoned player exits the market, it usually means they‚Äôve seen something others haven‚Äôt, yet. Some traders believe the whale is simply cashing in gains as XRP approaches a known resistance zone around $3.60‚Äì$3.70. Others speculate the move could be tied to broader market risks or an upcoming shift in momentum. The Bigger Picture: Bullish Foundation Still Strong Despite this headline-making exit, XRP‚Äôs fundamentals remain solid. Earlier this year, Ripple secured a significant legal victory against the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), gaining clarity that XRP is not a security in secondary market sales. This outcome paved the way for XRP to be relisted across U.S. exchanges and opened the door for institutional-grade products like XRP-based ETFs. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 On the technical side, XRP has broken out of a long-term triangle pattern. Analysts see the potential for a continued move upward , with near-term targets ranging from $5.80 to $6.00. On-chain metrics show that the majority of XRP holders are now in profit, a key signal that often precedes sustained bullish moves. Something Is Coming, But What? The closure of this massive long position might be a short-term headwind, or it could be a savvy whale resetting for an even bigger play. Either way, it adds intrigue to XRP‚Äôs current market structure. With rising institutional interest, strong technical momentum, and renewed regulatory clarity, all signs still point toward further upside, though not without pauses along the way. Steph Is Crypto‚Äôs post may be short, but its implications are loud. The market is watching, and as the dust settles, it‚Äôs clear: something is coming. title: SEC Chair Paul Atkins Drops Bullish Bitcoin And Crypto Bombshell
body: The U.S. SEC Chair, Paul Atkins , recently discussed Bitcoin and crypto in general while making some bullish statements for the industry. He again affirmed his commitment to providing a regulatory-friendly environment for the industry. Paul Atkins Talks Bullish on Bitcoin and Other Cryptos In a CNBC interview , Paul Atkins remarked that Trump‚Äôs signing of the GENIUS Act into law was a great watershed for the crypto industry. He added that for the first time, the U.S. Government has also given its stamp of approval for stablecoins. He described these types of digital assets as ones that will be very important for the market, as they help lower costs and mitigate market risk. The SEC Chair noted that the GENIUS Act and stablecoins don‚Äôt exactly concern the Commission, unlike the way they have focused on Bitcoin and other cryptos. However, affirmed that his agency is committed to enabling the smooth implementation of this crypto legislation. Atkins had also previously stated that they would consider additional steps that might help assist SEC registrants using payment stablecoins, including for settlement and margining. Furthermore, during the interview, the SEC Chair dropped a bombshell when he confirmed that Ethereum is not a security, just like Bitcoin. He added that the Ethereum blockchain is a key component for a lot of other digital assets, suggesting that tokens are also not necessarily securities. Akins made this comment while answering a question on companies that were looking to emulate Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy by buying Bitcoin while some are pivoting to Ethereum. He remarked that he is not in a position to tell these companies what assets to buy or not. However, the SEC Chair acknowledged that it is encouraging to see these digital assets being embraced by the markets. He added that this will provide a good foundation for future development and innovation in the sector. GENIUS Act Will Benefit Ethereum The Most Ether Machine Chairman Andrew Keys was also on CNBC to discuss the passing of the GENIUS Act. He declared that Ethereum is the largest beneficiary of the crypto legislation. He explained that the majority of stablecoins are issued on the network, meaning that Ethereum is likely to witness greater adoption following the signing of the GENIUS Act. Keys further remarked that Ethereum is experiencing power-law dynamics, whereby ‚Äú90% of tokenized assets and stablecoins‚Äù are deployed on the network. It is worth noting that Ether Machine has opted to become an Ethereum treasury company rather than one that holds Bitcoin like Strategy. The company will list on the Nasdaq through a merger and is expected to raise over $1.6 million. The company aims to launch with 400,000 ETH on its balance sheet, competing with companies like SharpLink Gaming .

title: SharpLink Gaming Boosts Its Ethereum Treasury With 80k ETH Bet
body: SharpLink Gaming, backed by Consensys co-founder Joseph Lubin, has increased its Ethereum holdings by nearly 80,000 ETH. According to a press release , this addition brings the company‚Äôs total Ethereum holdings to 360,807 ETH, which is a 29% increase from last week. SharpLink Competes With Ether Machine The strategic purchase comes as Ethereum reaches a six-month high, with growing interest from institutions driving this momentum. Reports also revealed that ETH concentrations rose to 3.06, a 53% increase since the company launched its digital treasury strategy in June 2025. Likewise, the total Ethereum staking rewards have increased to 567 ETH. Notably, SharpLink‚Äôs recent acquisition puts it in a strong position as competition grows from Ether Machine, a new company quickly building its Ethereum reserves. Ether Machine plans to challenge SharpLink‚Äôs role as the largest public corporate holder of Ethereum, leading to a competition for control in the Ethereum treasury market. While SharpLink currently leads, industry experts are closely watching to see how Ether Machine responds. As both companies compete for dominance in the Ethereum market, this rivalry could increase market activity and attract more interest from large investors. SharpLink Expands Stock Sale to Boost ETH Treasury Recall that the Minneapolis-based tech company added $515 million worth of ETH to its treasury some days ago. The company announced it would increase the amount of common stock it can sell by an additional $5 billion. As such, it is raising its planned offering from $1 billion, initially filed on May 30, to $6 billion. SharpLink stated that it plans to use most of the proceeds from this expanded stock offering to acquire Ether. It will also allocate funds for working capital, operating expenses, and its affiliate marketing operations. If the company were to deploy the full $6 billion to purchase ETH at current prices, it would control nearly 1.38% of Ethereum‚Äôs circulating supply. It is worth noting that this will position SharpLink as a significant corporate holder in the ecosystem. SharpLink Reinforces its Position in the ETH Ecosystem SharpLink‚Äôs acquisition of ETH further deepens its association with the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. It is already touted as the world‚Äôs largest publicly traded company to adopt Ethereum as its primary treasury reserve asset. SharpLink (SBET) stock has also experienced a 130% surge in the past month, with the shares closing at nearly $26 on Monday. Meanwhile, as of the time of writing, Ethereum is trading at $3,721.25, according to data from CoinMarketCap . This brings the value of SharpLink‚Äôs holdings to approximately $1.3 billion, but DeFiLlama pegged the value at $933.92 million at the time of writing. The post SharpLink Gaming Boosts Its Ethereum Treasury With 80k ETH Bet appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: XRP price prediction 2025-2031: Will XRP reach $5?
body: Key takeaways: The XRP price prediction suggests that the coin‚Äôs price will rise to $4.06 by the end of 2025. The growing adoption rate of the XRP Ledger Protocol could push XRP to $10.15, with a possible maximum trading value of $10.83 in 2028. In 2031, the target price for XRP is between $16.24 and $17.59, with an average price of $16.92. XRP has a strong community of supporters and developers and continues to see tremendous potential in Ripple‚Äôs technology and products. Despite short-term price fluctuations and a bear market, many analysts believe XRP has a bright future. Whether it will reach new highs or continue to grow steadily remains to be seen, but this crypto asset will undoubtedly play an important role in global financial institutions. So, how high can XRP realistically go? Will XRP reach 5 dollars? Let‚Äôs answer these questions in our XRP price prediction. Overview Cryptocurrency Ripple Token XRP Price $3.56 Market Cap $211.21B Trading Volume (24 Hour) $9.44B Circulating Supply 59.18B All-time High $3.65 Jul 18, 2025 All-time Low $0.002802 July 07, 2014 24-hour High $3.58 24-hour Low $3.43 XRP price prediction: Technical analysis Metric Value Price Volatility 18.75% 50-Day SMA $2.43 200-Day SMA $1.8276 Sentiment Bullish Fear & Greed 72 (Greed) Green Days 21/30 (70%) XRP price analysis: XRP bull run slows On July 22, XRP dipped in 24 hours, reflecting a profit-taking event after an 80% rally this month. The event was accompanied by a 5% drop in trading volumes to $9.38B showing waning interest from traders. XRP‚Äôs dip appears corrective rather than structural, fueled by overheated technicals. XRP price analysis on the daily timeframe XRPUSD chart by TradingView XRP‚Äôs 14-day relative strength index crossed into overbought territory earlier this month, maintaining the stance for weeks. Its value is now at 85.66. The William Alligator trendlines show that XRP‚Äôs volatility rose over the same period. Notably, the MACD histograms now show dropping positive momentum as XRP‚Äôs price faces rejection at $3.66. The 1-day technical indicators show market overextension and rising pressure for a price reversal. XRP price analysis on the 4-hour chart XRPUSD chart by TradingView Zoomed in, the 4-hour chart shows XRP is consolidating at the top. The short candles are suggestive of an indecisive market. The MACD histograms, however, indicate negative market momentum, suggesting that a downward breakout is highly probable. XRP technical indicators: Levels and action Daily simple moving average (SMA) Period Value ($) Action SMA 3 3.02 BUY SMA 5 3.25 BUY SMA 10 3.11 BUY SMA 21 2.75 BUY SMA 50 2.43 BUY SMA 100 2.33 BUY SMA 200 1.8276 BUY Daily exponential moving average (EMA) Period Value ($) Action EMA 3 2.72 BUY EMA 5 2.55 BUY EMA 10 2.39 BUY EMA 21 2.29 BUY EMA 50 2.31 BUY EMA 100 2.28 BUY EMA 200 1.988 BUY What to expect from the XRP price analysis next? Ripple price analysis shows a highly bullish coin that is yet to define a top after breaking its previous all-time high last week. The wider crypto market remains bullish. The charts show that traders chose to close profits in the last 24 hours as its price and trading volume dipped. Looking ahead, a break above $3.66 will be critical in determining whether XRP will remain bullish; otherwise, it remains highly overbought and volatile. Is XRP a good investment? XRP, a cryptocurrency specifically designed for quick and cost-effective cross-border transactions, holds promise in global finance. The easing of regulatory hurdles for Ripple and the rising adoption might boost the XRP price. Additionally, several recent acquisitions and CBDC development make XRP a good investment option in the long term. As with any investment, the outlook for XRP remains uncertain, necessitating a cautious approach and thorough due diligence. It is advised to proceed with caution Why is XRP up? The XRP/USD crypto pair price has increased as buying momentum took hold, increasing the price to $3.59 during the day. The RSI increased to 85.95 at the same time and is in the overbought territory. How much will XRP cost in 2025? XRP is expected to trade at an average price of $3.38 by the end of 2025. Will XRP reach $5? For XRP to reach $5, its value would need to double. Considering the current bullish trend and XRP‚Äôs price action, a surge to $5 by the middle of next year is not entirely out of the question, particularly if demand for XRP tokens continues to rise and its growth trajectory remains consistent. However, it‚Äôs crucial to remember that XRP‚Äôs all-time high stands at $3.84, achieved on January 7, 2018. Can XRP reach $20? According to Ripple‚Äôs price prediction, XRP has a lesser chance of reaching $20 by 2031. However, it is expected to reach this level if the XRP ecosystem adoption by major financial institutions continues, making it a good option to buy XRP. Will XRP reach $100 dollars? Though there are rumors of XRP reaching $100 in the market, and some pro-XRP analysts are also promoting it, many are raising questions about this possibility. XRP may not reach $100 in the near future, at least. Will XRP reach $1000? If one XRP coin is worth $1000, its market cap must be more than $100 trillion. Comparatively, the total global stock market cap is about $110 trillion. Therefore, it is unlikely that XRP will reach $1000, based on current market dynamics. Does XRP have a good long-term future? XRP is expected to increase in value gradually over the coming years, giving good yields to XRP holders and institutional investors. The coin is trading at five times its value from last year, and it is expected to reach the highest price of $17.59 by 2031. This makes it a valuable asset for multiple gains after significant market capitalization with continuous efforts by Ripple Labs. However, regulatory uncertainties still linger with the Ripple lawsuit. Considering these factors, investors must carry out their own research. Recent news/opinions on the Ripple Network Dune Analytics data shows that almost 60% of transactions on XRPL are payments. Weekly payments on the network increased by more than 430% in less than two years. Dune Analytics also indicates that weekly payment transactions on the network moved from around 1.5 million in 2023 to over 8 million in 2025. Read more about it here . Lawyer Fred Rispoli states that the SEC and Ripple could settle how XRP sales to institutions will be conducted in a way the SEC finds acceptable. Meanwhile, Ripple plans to further integrate XRP into institutional finance by acquiring Hidden Road for $1.25 billion. Read more about it here . XRP price prediction July 2025 According to XRP price prediction, in July 2025, XRP could reach a maximum price of $2.70. The average trading price is expected to be $3.38 for the month, while the lowest it can go, as per XRP cost estimation, is $1.72, considering the current XRP sentiment. We expect an average trading price of $3.28 and a floor price of $1.50.
